original: vasanti kḷptānandaste muktā bhuñjanti netarāḥ // PS_1,1.12 //

kṣaṇaḥ tri namiṣaḥ proktaḥ kāṣṭhā ākhyā kṣaṇa pañcakāt
kāṣṭhābhiḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ laghukālaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
laghubhiḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ vināḍikā prakīrtitā
vināḍikā ṣaṣṭhibhiḥ yā nāḍikā ekā bhaviṣyati
tābhyām muhūrta triṃśadbhiḥ ahorātram iti īritam
aṣṭama aṃśān nyūna sapta ghaṭikābhiḥ ca saptabhiḥ
sapāda saptabhiḥ vā api sārdha saptabhiḥ eva vā
yāmaḥ kāla uṣṭabhiḥ vā api kāla bhedena coditaḥ
yāmaiḥ caturbhiḥ ahar syāt tāvadbhiḥ yāminīmatā
ahorātra triṃśatā ca māsaḥ pakṣa dvaya ātmakaḥ
tābhyām ayanam parikīrtitam

original: karkādi kārmukānteṣu yadā carati bhaskaraḥ // PS_1,3.13 //
analyzed: karka ādi kārmuka anteṣu yadā carati bhaskaraḥ
dakṣiṇāyanam uddhiṣṭam devānām rātri saṃjñakam
yāvat nakra ādike bhānau mithuna anteṣu tiṣṭhati
uttarāyaṇam uddhiṣṭam tāvatkālam vicakṣaṇaiḥ
ayanābhyām vatsaraḥ tu dvi ṣaṣ māsa ātmakaḥ smṛtaḥ
ṣaṣṭhī uttara triśatakaiḥ ahorātraiḥ ca vatsaraḥ
aṣṭāviṃśat sahasraiḥ tu lakṣa saptadaśa abdataḥ
kḷptaḥ kṛta yugaḥ tasmāt tretā pāda ūnam ucyate
saṃmitaḥ
tretā yugaḥ tatas pāda nyūnaḥ
aṣṭa lakṣam iti smṛtaḥ
dvāpara rāt tu kaliḥ tasmāt ardha pādam iti smṛtaḥ
dvi ṣoḍaśa sahasra itāt catur lakṣa ātmakaḥ kaliḥ
kṛta tretā dvāparaḥ ca kaliḥ ca iti caturyugāḥ
catur yuga ātmakaḥ kālaḥ mahāyugaḥ iti īryate
viṃśat sahasra ita lakṣa tri catvāriṃśat abdakaiḥ

original: kḷptaḥ kālaḥ kāladṛgbhiḥ mahāyuga itīryate // PS_1,3.21 //
analyzed: kḷptaḥ kālaḥ kāla dṛgbhiḥ mahāyugaḥ iti īryate
ṣaṣṭhī uttara abda triṃśatāt devānām
tādṛś abda sahasrāṇām catuṣkoṇaḥ kṛta āhvayaḥ
tretā tu tri sahasra abdāḥ dvi sahasra abda saṃmitaḥ
dvāparaḥ tu tatas nyūna sahasra abda mitaḥ kaliḥ
kṛtasya ādau kṛta ante ca pṛthak abdaḥ catur śatam
sandhiḥ tretā yuga ādi ante pṛthak abda śata trayam
sandhiḥ tu dvāpara ādi ante pṛthak abda śata dvayam
śata abdaḥ saṃmitaḥ kālaḥ sandhiḥ ādi antayoḥ kaleḥ
evam daivena mānena dvadaśa abdāḥ sahasrataḥ

original: kḷptaḥ kālaḥ kālavidbhiḥ mahāyuga itīryate // PS_1,3.26 //
analyzed: kḷptaḥ kālaḥ kāla vidbhiḥ mahāyugaḥ iti īryate
sārdha aṣṭādaśa lakṣa abde yugānām ekasaptati
militaḥ manu sandhāta bhoga kālaḥ udīritaḥ
dvi ṣaṣ śata abda samitaḥ layaḥ svāyambhuva uttaraḥ
svārociṣa ādikānām tu ṣaṇṇām api antare layaḥ
pañcādaśa śata abda ātmā layaḥ kālaḥ udīritaḥ
caturdaśa śata abda ātmā layaḥ kālaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
tad anya manvantareṣu niyamāt sarvadā eva tu
catur yuga sahasram tu brahmaṇaḥ dine udivam ucyate

original: rītriśca tāvatī tasya ahorātrā tu tādṛśā /
analyzed: rītriḥ ca tāvatī tasya ahorātrā tu tādṛśā
ṣaṣṭhī uttara triśatakāt vatsaraḥ jasya kīrtitaḥ
evam vidha śata abda ātmā kālaḥ jasya āyuṣaḥ mataḥ
vāsudevāt sūkṣma tanum sva śata abdāt ime kṣaṇe
yaḥ prāpa sa śata abda āyuḥ tad rūpāṇi itarāṇi tu
māsa traya adhikāt abda ṣaṭkāt pūrvatanāt abhūt
sṛjyānām sūkṣma sāṃśānām sūkṣma sṛṣṭiḥ catur tanoḥ
sṛṣṭānām sūkṣmataḥ pūrvam sthūla dehaḥ tatas bhavat
nārāyaṇāt ajāt rudrāt kramāt kāla anusārataḥ

original: yāvatāṃ sūkṣmataḥ sṛṣṭiḥ sthūlasṛṣṭistu tāvatā // PS_1,3.35 //
analyzed: yāvatām sūkṣmataḥ sṛṣṭiḥ sthūla sṛṣṭiḥ tu tāvatā
aṇḍāt ūrdhvam ca āvṛtayaḥ sthūla dehāḥ ca tad mayāḥ

original: ādyasya brahmaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ pañcāśadvatsarānti me // PS_1,3.36 //
analyzed: ādyasya brahmaṇaḥ pūrvam pañcāśat vatsarānti me
dine vyatīte tad rātrau aṇḍa sṛṣṭiḥ atha abhavat
tad antar svapataḥ viṣṇoḥ jala madhya gatasya tu
na abhyutthitāt loka mayāt prākṛtāt padmakośataḥ
pādmaḥ brahma utthitaḥ sārdham saptatriṃśat ca tanmaye
dina antime niśāyām ca nāśaḥ ṇḍasya jagatpateḥ
vyutkramāt pūrva mānena sthūla sūkṣmasya nāśanam
evam śata āyuṣaḥ pūrṇed viparārdha ātmaka āyuṣī
svayam ca ātma svarūpāṇām ekībhāvam karoti ajaḥ
yāvat kālena ātma sṛṣṭiḥ ekībhāvaḥ tu tāvatā
ekībhūte api ramati tathā ekībhūta māyayā
tāvatkālam tatas paścāt supta vat svāpayati ajaḥ
sārdha dvi ṣaṣ brahmavarṣam iti śiṣṭe me
bhāge punar pūrvavat ca ātma sṛṣṭi ādim īśvaraḥ
karoti puruṣaḥ tasya na āyuḥ mānam vidhīyate
evam vidha aparimita ananta ananta para ātmake

original: kāle bhāvinyapi hariḥ sṛṣṭyādīśaḥ kariṣyati // PS_1,3.44 //
analyzed: kāle bhāvini api hariḥ sṛṣṭyāt īśaḥ kariṣyati
svantantrasya asya maryādā asvatantraiḥ na śakyate

original: laṅghituṃ pūrṇaśakterhi vaśe sarvaṃ carācaram // PS_1,3.45 //
analyzed: laṅghitum pūrṇaśakteḥ hi vaśe sarvam carācaram
ye nanta kālataḥ tasya mṛti janma jarā ādayaḥ
āyāsa duḥkha daurbhāgya cintā santāpa pūrvakāḥ
ajñāna īrṣyā asūya pīḍā kāma krodha bhaya ādayaḥ
kṛśa tā roga durita puṇya lepa ādayaḥ tathā
āśā hāniḥ ca vṛddhiḥ ca kṣudh tṛṣ kampa ādayaḥ tathā
na āsan doṣāḥ na uttaratra bhaviṣyanti akhila īśvare
tad tad durjana saṅghaiḥ ca ye kalpyāḥ doṣa sañcayāḥ
tat tat virodhi su guṇa ānantya pūrṇasya mīluṣaḥ
tad doṣa leśa gandhaḥ api na viṣṇoḥ iti niścayaḥ
yaḥ kālaḥ paramāṇu ādi dvi parārdha avasānakaḥ
teṣu sarveṣu kāleṣu tad tad nāmnā ramāpatiḥ
tad sāmarthya vyañjakaḥ ca sthitvā rakṣati ajaḥ prabhuḥ
nityaḥ kāla pravāhaḥ yam anityāḥ tu kṣaṇa ādayaḥ

original: naṣṭeṣu satsukāleṣu vartamāneṣu vai kramāt // PS_1,3.52 //
analyzed: naṣṭeṣu satsu kāleṣu vartamāneṣu vai kramāt
a vināśya sva rūpā usau tad pravāhasya rakṣakaḥ
śata abdaḥ saṃmitaḥ kālaḥ brahmaṇaḥ para saṃjñakaḥ
sakālaḥ tu nimeṣa ākhyaḥ ahar ca parameśituḥ
iti ajña jana buddhīnām śuddhi artham upacaryate
atas āhuḥ mahā prājñāḥ kālataḥ anantam īśvaram
atha api para kāla antam brahmāṇam janayan vibhuḥ
aṅgīkaroti tam kāla mahaḥ yat akhila īśvaraḥ
rātrim ānādi śūnyaḥ api tāvantam kālam īśvaraḥ
rātri tvena carati evam brahma ādīn svāpayati ajaḥ
niśāyāḥ carame bhāge ātma sṛṣṭi ādim īśvaraḥ
karoti puruṣaḥ tasya āyuḥ mānam vidhīyate
evam vidha aparimita ananta ananta para ātmakaḥ
sṛṣṭi ādi kartuḥ viṣṇoḥ parātmanaḥ
sva rūpa indriya vat yaḥ asau kālaḥ rūpa ādi varjitaḥ
pūrva pūrvasu kāleṣu naṣṭeṣu anye bhavanti hi
uttaratra āyāsyamāna paramāṇu pravāhataḥ
saṃyojya ghaṭikā ādyāḥ tu kālaḥ jñeyaḥ samānatas
ghaṭikā yāmam āsādyāḥ na ekadā sambhavanti hi
āyuḥ māna vihīnasya ananta ananta para ātmakaiḥ
viṣṇoḥ kāla ānantya mitau kāla jñānanam
prayojakam
vedānām akṣarāṇām ca deśanyā avyākṛtasya ca
ramāyāḥ sarva jīvānām muktānām liṅga saṃyujām
samasta liṅga dehānām jaḍāyāḥ prakṛteḥ tathā
eteṣām asvatantrāṇām svatantra vaśavartinām
prayojakam
anityā a anantā
nām jaḍānām ca sūkṣma sthūla śarīriṇām
āyuḥ māne śarīrāṇām kāla jñanam prayojakam

original: evaṃ kālagatiṃ jānan kālabhītiṃ tariṣyati // PS_1,3.66 //
analyzed: evam kālagatim jānan kāla bhītim tariṣyati
ekasmin para kāle tu eka maṇḍam jagadguruḥ
daśa āvaraṇa saṃyuktam sṛjati avati hanti ajaḥ
na ekadā ajāṇḍa bahulam sraṣṭum icchati keśavaḥ

original: brahmāṇaṃ garuḍaṃ śeṣam idraṃ prāṇaṃ raviṃ surān // PS_1,3.68 //
analyzed: brahmāṇam garuḍam śeṣam idram prāṇam ravim surān
ekam ekam
para kāle karoti ajaḥ
tathā api ajāṇḍa anantānām niyantā ajāṇḍa rūpavān
hariḥ tādṛś mahā rūpa ananta anantāni vai hareḥ
roma aṅkureṣu ananteṣu saṃvasanti iti hi śrutiḥ
tādṛśa ananta rūpāṇām anantya ānantya yogataḥ
adhas ca ūrdhvam ca aṣṭa dikṣu saṃyuktānām anantaśas
rūpa ānantyaiḥ apūrṇa uru deśe pūrṇa tanuḥ hariḥ
nirviśeṣaḥ sarva gataḥ sūkṣma sthūla ādi rūpakaḥ
sama adhika vihīnaḥ ca ramayā ananta rupayā
sahasva adhīnayā satya aśeṣa cit jaḍa bhṛt hariḥ
sva bhinnāyāḥ śriyāḥ bhinnāḥ
bhinnaiḥ nitya jaḍaiḥ satyaiḥ bhinnaiḥ jīva īśvaraiḥ sadā

original: vibhinno viśvato viṣṇuḥ deśato guṇato vibhuḥ /
analyzed: vibhinnaḥ viśvatas viṣṇuḥ deśataḥ guṇataḥ vibhuḥ
ananta ananta rūpeṇa abhinnaḥ bhinna vat hariḥ
pūrṇaḥ api jaḍa cit rūpam sṛjati avati hanti ajaḥ

original: iti śrī paratattavanarṇaye prakāśasaṃhitāyāṃ prathamaparicchede tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī para tattavanarṇaye prakāśa saṃhitāyām prathama paricchede tṛtīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī haṃsaḥ uvāca

original: sūkṣmaṃ sarvajagadbījaṃ mitaṃ trātaṃ ca viṣṇunā /
analyzed: sūkṣmam sarva jagat bījam mitam trātam ca viṣṇunā
pradhānam avyaktam iti yat vadanti manīṣiṇaḥ
mahāmāyā iti avidyā iti prakṛtiḥ mohinī iti ca
triguṇa ātmakam avyaktam tri rūpam tat tri śaktimat
avidyā kāma karma ādi bījam iti api tām viduḥ
rakṣitam pralaye sṛṣṭau eva
anādi karma granthi iti bandhaḥ bandhakam iti api
ajām ananya vaśagām kalā ṣoḍaśa saṃyutām
tīvra duḥkha ātmakām nānā yoni prāpakam īritam
nārikela sama ākāram pariccheda traya ātmakam
mūrdhni chidra yutam divyam ratna vat bhāsvaram sadā
viṣṇunā ramaya ācchanna a chidra garbha avakāśa vat

original: sṛṣṭau laye ramā tasya māninī ca nirantaram /
analyzed: sṛṣṭau laye ramā tasya māninī ca nirantaram
sṛṣṭau eva brahma vāyū sa bhāryau abhimāninau
rajaḥ sattva tamaḥ saṃjña bhāga traya samanvitam
sattva bhāgaḥ śukla varṇaḥ rakta varṇaḥ tu rājasaḥ
nīla varṇaḥ tamaḥ bhāgaḥ iti bhāga traya ātmakaḥ
jñāna karmendriya kalāḥ rajaḥ bhāge vyavasthitāḥ
tamaḥ bhāga gatāḥ pañca tanmātra saṃjñitāḥ kalāḥ
manaḥ kalā satva bhāga gatā sarvapradhānikā
manaḥ buddhiḥ ahaṅkāraḥ cittam ca iti caturvidham
kāma krodha mahā lobha mada mātsarya mohakāḥ
dveṣa ahaṅkāra mamakāra īrṣyā sūyā bhaya ādayaḥ
manaḥ doṣāḥ tad vihīnam manaḥ jñānāya sādhanam
manaḥ caturvidham nityam jaḍa prakṛti gam matam

original: tajjanyamapyanityaṃ syāttatra cittaṃ na doṣayuk // PS_1,4.13 //
analyzed: tad janyam api anityam syāt tatra cittam na doṣa yuj
manaḥ svarṇa ādi aneka artham apekṣām janayiṣyati
buddhiḥ niṣiddha bhoḥ icchām sadā saṃkalpayiṣyati
ahaṅkāraḥ pumarthānām ghātakaḥ sa uttamaiḥ saha
spardhām viṣṇu sura dveṣam kalpayati api sarvaśas
cittam sat sādhana gatam karoti puruṣam sadā
sat sādhanam ahaṅkāra kalitam pāpam eva hi
ahaṅkāra vihīnam tat cittam vijñāna sādhanam

original: racite bhārate varṣe yathā mānuṣasattanum // PS_1,4.17 //
analyzed: racite bhārate varṣe yathā mānuṣa sat tanum
labdhvā guru kula āvāsam kṛtvā aneka su janmabhiḥ
kṛtvā ātma yogya sat karma labdha sat guru sevayā
prasannaiḥ upadiṣṭa uru sat śāstra śravaṇa ādibhiḥ
vṛtti jñāna pradam tat ca vṛtti bhakti ādi sādhakam
tābhyām svārūpika jñāna bhaktiḥ vyaktiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: svārūpikaṃ mano nityaṃ tataḥ svārūpikī matiḥ // PS_1,4.20 //
analyzed: svārūpikam manaḥ nityam tatas svārūpikī matiḥ

original: vyaktā bhavati nityā sā bhaktiḥ svārūpikī tathā /
analyzed: vyaktā bhavati nityā sā bhaktiḥ svārūpikī tathā
sā eva ānanda sva rūpeṇa nityā mukteṣu tiṣṭhati
indriyāṇām golakāni dṛśyāni āhuḥ samagraśas
atīndriyāṇi indriyāṇi jñāna karma mayāni ca
śrotra tvac netra rasana ghrāṇa ādyāḥ jñāna śaktayaḥ
vāc pāṇi pāda pāyu upasthāḥ sarve karma śaktayaḥ
śrotram śabda grāhi śabdaḥ dvividhaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
śabdaḥ dhvanya ātmakaḥ varṇa ātmakaḥ ca iti tad ādimaḥ
ahaṅkārāt samudbhūtaḥ ākāśa utpatti kāraṇaḥ
dhvanya ātmakaḥ tu śabdaḥ tu prathamaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
jñāna karma indriya manaḥ mātrāḥ sūkṣmāḥ ahi anādayaḥ
nityāḥ ca pralaye sṛṣṭau anityāḥ te prakīrtitāḥ
varṇa ātmakaḥ tu yaḥ śabdaḥ nityaḥ sarva gataḥ vibhuḥ

original: dravyamityeva sarveṣāṃ na guṇaḥ kasyacinmate // PS_1,4.27 //
analyzed: dravyam iti eva sarveṣām na guṇaḥ kasyacid mate
vedāḥ padāt varṇataḥ ca śabdataḥ svarataḥ tathā
anādi nityāḥ te sarve api apauruṣeya guṇa utkarāḥ
viṣṇoḥ māhātmya vijñaptau sat prameye ca sādhakāḥ
śāstrāṇi ca purāṇāni pauruṣeyāṇi kṛtsnaśas
yathārthāni praṇītāni hariṇā atha sura ṛṣibhiḥ
nityāni eva arthataḥ varṇa krama yogāt anityakāḥ
sātvikāni purāṇāni manu ādi smṛtayaḥ tathā

original: yathārtha eva tatroktaṃ grāhyaṃ śrīharitatparaiḥ // PS_1,4.31 //
analyzed: yathārthaḥ eva tatra uktam grāhyam śrī hari tatparaiḥ

original: vārāhaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ pādmaṃ vāyuproktaṃ ca gāruḍam /
analyzed: vārāham vaiṣṇavam pādmam vāyu proktam ca gāruḍam

original: śrīmadbhāgavataṃ caiva sātvikānīti hi śrutiḥ // PS_1,4.32 //
analyzed: śrīmat bhāgavatam ca eva sātvikāni iti hi śrutiḥ
brahmāṇḍam brahmavaivartam mārkaṇḍeyam ca vāmanam

original: bhaviṣyaṃ nārasiṃhaṃ ca rājasāni ṣaḍaiva hi // PS_1,4.33 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyam nārasiṃham ca rājasāni ṣaḍ eva hi

original: mātsyaṃ kaurmyaṃ tathā laiṅgyaṃ śaivaṃ skāndaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: mātsyam kaurmyam tathā laiṅgyam śaivam skāndam tathā eva ca

original: pāśupatasaṃjñikaṃ ceti tāmasāni vido viduḥ // PS_1,4.34 //
analyzed: pāśupata saṃjñikam ca iti tāmasāni vidaḥ viduḥ
grāhyam sarvam sātvika uktam yojanā bhedataḥ uthavā
veda vedānusāreṣu virodhe
itarāṇi viruddhāni pralambha bhrama jāni api
vyāsa uktāni purāṇāni sātvikāni api kṛtsnaśas
kvacid kvacid purāṇāni prāyas jñāna karāṇi api
āsura āveśa vaśataḥ tad anya uktāni anantaśas
śrotra agrāhyāṇi santi eva apramāṇāni tāni alam
para śukla traya uktāni nityam viṣṇu ājñayā eva tu
ati pramāṇāni daitya āveśa ajñāna ādi varjanāt
badhira tva ādayaḥ śrotrṛ doṣāḥ tad varjita indriyaiḥ yāḥ
etāni viṣayāṇi āhuḥ śrotavyāni sahasraśas
śabda doṣa vihīnāni grāhyāṇi manasā saha
tatra ukta ananta suguṇam jñeyam īśvaram

original: gamyaṃ satyaṃ ca sukhacinmayaṃ viṣṇuṃ sanātanam // PS_1,4.41 //
analyzed: gamyam satyam ca sukha cit mayam viṣṇum sanātanam
ātma īśvaram harim bhaktyā upāstyā
bhavanti hi
ku śāstreṣu ukta durmārge heya tā buddhi saṃyutam
iti śrī prakāśasaṃhitāyām prathama paricchede caturthaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī haṃsaḥ uvāca
jñāna indriyāṇi pañcāni pañca karmendriyāṇi ca
rajaḥ bhāga gatāni eṣu śrotra mātram
dyam viśiṣyate
śrāvaṇa āsya ādya bhakteḥ tu sādhaka tvāt guṇa adhikam
tvac carma golake sarva deha ge samupāśritā apasthitā
kuṣṭha bhaṅura pāma ādyāḥ tvakdoṣāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
avyakta ādi sparśa doṣa śūnyāḥ śīta uṣṇa pūrvakāḥ
sparśāḥ tad viṣayāḥ proktāḥ vāyu teja umbu bhūmayaḥ
padārthāḥ kecana guṇāḥ sa tvac indriya gocarāḥ
tvak sparśau prakṛti sthau dvau nityau sthūlau anityakau

original: tajjanyau prākṛtau vāyusaṃśrayau naśvarau matau // PS_1,5.5 //
analyzed: tad janyau prākṛtau vāyu saṃśrayau naśvarau matau
indriyāṇāntu viṣayāḥ guṇa amātrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: jñānātmakānāṃ te sarve dvividhāḥ parikīrtitāḥ // PS_1,5.6 //
analyzed: jñāna ātmakānām te sarve dvividhāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
viṣṇu vaiṣṇava sevāyai anukūlāḥ śubhāḥ matāḥ

original: aśubhāḥ pratikūlāśca punaste trividhā matāḥ // PS_1,5.7 //
analyzed: aśubhāḥ pratikūlāḥ ca punar te trividhāḥ matāḥ
tamaḥ yogya āśritāḥ nīcāḥ tad tad yogya su sādhanaiḥ
nīca madhya uttama sthāna prāpakāḥ krama yogataḥ
jīva sva rūpa bhūtāni manaḥ mātra indriyāṇi ca
tad svarūpāṇi nityāni uttameṣu śubhāni api
uttamāḥ mukti yogyāḥ tu nitya baddhāḥ tu madhyamāḥ
adhamāḥ tu tamaḥ yogyāḥ manomātra ādayaḥ tathā
svārūpikāḥ ca liṅga sthāḥ anityāḥ sthūla deha gāḥ
viṣṇoḥ a māyā brahma ādi muktānām krama yogataḥ
manaḥ mātra indriya jñāna sukha dhairya bala ādayaḥ
sva rūpāṇi eva viṣṇoḥ tu nitya vyāptāni kṛtsnaśas
svatantrāṇi svatantrasya karmāṇi tu
puruṣasya mahātmanaḥ
sva svarūpa sthitau yasya jñāne karmaṇi api sphuṭam

original: sarvasvarūpaceṣṭāsu parāpekṣā na yasya hi // PS_1,5.14 //
analyzed: sarva svarūpa ceṣṭāsu para apekṣā na yasya hi

original: sa svantantra iti proktaḥ sa viṣṇurnetaraḥ kvacit /
analyzed: sa svantantraḥ iti proktaḥ sa viṣṇuḥ na itaraḥ kvacid
hi
tad citta indriya mātrā astu nityā vyāptā sva rūpa kākāḥ
viṣṇu aika vaśa gāḥ tasyāḥ hari apekṣā sad asti hi
para apekṣā yuta tvāt sā asvatantrā prakīrtitā
brahma ādi mukta amuktānām asvatantryam anāditaḥ

original: siddhameva svarūpe ca jñāne karmaṇyapi sphuṭam /
analyzed: siddham eva svarūpe ca jñāne karmaṇi api sphuṭam
nīca anīca svarūpāṇām uttama uttama cetasām
prasādataḥ pravṛttiḥ hi jñāna bhakti ādi ca akhilam
jñāna ajñāna tamaḥ mokṣāḥ nitya anitya jaḍasya ca
na utpatti nāśau jīvānām trividhānām samastaśas
sva rūpa duḥkha dveṣa īrṣyā cintā santāpa pūrvakāḥ
na muktānām deha yogaḥ yāvat teṣām bhaya ādikam

original: bhayādīni ca yogyebhyaḥ uttameṣvalpameva ca // PS_1,5.21 //
analyzed: bhaya ādīni ca yogyebhyaḥ uttameṣu alpam eva ca

original: jñānaṃ muktirayogyasya na ca svapnepi dṛśyate /
analyzed: jñānam muktiḥ ayogyasya na ca svapne pi dṛśyate
svarūpa ajñāna tamasī yogyānām na kadācana

original: sṛṣṭiṃ sthitiṃ saṃhṛtiṃ ca niyatiṃ jagatosya tu /
analyzed: sṛṣṭim sthitim saṃhṛtim ca niyatim jagataḥ usya tu

original: jñānājñāne tamomokṣau viṣṇunaiva vido viduḥ // PS_1,5.23 //
analyzed: jñāna ajñāne tamaḥ mokṣau viṣṇunā eva vidaḥ viduḥ
brahma ādīnām svarūpantu atyanta aṇutamam matam

original: tadindriyāṇi sūkṣmāṇi sūkṣmāṇyeva sthirāṇi tu // PS_1,5.24 //
analyzed: tad indriyāṇi sūkṣmāṇi sūkṣmāṇi eva sthirāṇi tu
cakṣuḥ golaka gam netram rūpa grāhyam atīndriyam
nityam avyakta gam sthūlam anityam janyam akṣi ca
sva rūpa netra kalitam nitya anitye akṣiṇī ubhe
jñāna prade sākṣi saṃjñe sarva svārūpaka indriyam
uktānām vakṣyamāṇānām indriyāṇām samagraśas
svārūpa indriya sāhāyyam vinā śaktiḥ na vidyate

original: vṛddhiṃ hāniṃ ca labhate guṇairdeṣaiḥ svarūpataḥ /
analyzed: vṛddhim hānim ca labhate guṇaiḥ deṣaiḥ svarūpataḥ
sākṣi indriya ntu yogyānām sva uttama drohatām vinā
tatra api īṣat kutaścid tu tat sarvam kuṇṭhitam bhavet

original: paṭalaṃ kāmilā kācaḥ pratidīdhiti saṅgatiḥ // PS_1,5.29 //
analyzed: paṭalam kāmilā kācaḥ pratidīdhiti saṅgatiḥ
netra rogam vraṇa ādyāḥ ca paiti apratihatāḥ tathā
akṣi bhramaṇa śaitya ādyāḥ netra doṣāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
āra stha tvam dūra ga tvam saukṣmam ca vyavadhānataḥ
sthitiḥ samāna abhighātaḥ artha doṣāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
nirdeṣa viṣayāḥ ye ca nirdeṣa īkṣaṇa gocarāḥ
śuklam raktam śveta pīta harita ādīni kṛtsnaśas
citra ādīni svarūpāṇi cakṣuṣaḥ viṣayāṇi ca
udbhūta rūpa saṃyuktāḥ
cakṣuṣaḥ viṣayāḥ proktāḥ kecid sūrya udayaḥ marāḥ
jihvā golaka gam prāhuḥ rasanendriyam uttamam
atīndriyam aruci ādyāḥ tad hoṣa āsphoṭaka ādayaḥ
kaṣāyaḥ ca kaṭuḥ tiktaḥ lavaṇaḥ madhura amlakau
tathā citrarasaḥ ca iti rasana indriya gocarāḥ

original: doṣahīnasya ca rasajñānaṃ janayati sphuṭam // PS_1,5.36 //
analyzed: doṣa hīnasya ca rasa jñānam janayati sphuṭam
jñānam janayati kṣipram prākṛtam prakṛti sthitam

original: duṣṭā paryuṣitā yāmahīnā pūtiyutā rasāḥ // PS_1,5.37 //
analyzed: duṣṭā paryuṣitā yāma hīnā pūti yutāḥ rasāḥ

original: sadoṣā rasasambandhe rasanā jñānadā na hi /
analyzed: sa doṣā rasa sambandhe rasanā jñāna dā na hi
arthāḥ rasana indriya gocarāḥ
ghrāṇa golaka gam proktam nāsikendriyam ūrjitam
vyāmiśra ādyāḥ doṣa bhāgāḥ gandha doṣāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
vaktra golaka gam proktam vāc indriyam atīndriyam
nitya anitya vacān tasya satya asatya vacāṃsi ca
vacāṃsi yukta ayuktāni gīrvāṇa prākṛtāni ca
mūka tva ādi mahā doṣa hīna vāc gocarāṇi ca
gadgada tva aspaṣṭa tā ādyāḥ vāgdoṣāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
hasta golaka gam prāhuḥ pāṇi indriyam atīndriyam
vyaṅgula tva ādayaḥ tasya doṣāḥ
gṛhṇāti iva ha paratra api yat hitaḥ sva ātmanaḥ sadā
bhūmayā a ratna hema ādyāḥ bahu arthāḥ viṣaya āmatāḥ
tathābhāvāḥ hastayoḥ viṣaya āmatāḥ
kaṇṭaka ucchiṣṭa pāṣāṇa vṛścika ādyāḥ aniṣṭa dāḥ

original: heyā arthāśca hastābhyāṃ parityājyāḥ sadā matāḥ /
analyzed: heyāḥ arthāḥ ca hastābhyām parityājyāḥ sadā matāḥ
sā aniṣṭa dam hita karam hastayoḥ hita dam matam
aṅghri golaka gam prāhuḥ pāda indriya malam budhāḥ
paṅgu tva ādyāḥ aṅghri doṣāḥ
svārūpigam prakṛti gam prākṛtam trividham matam
yena indriyeṇa yat karma kriyate sādhubhiḥ sadā
tat tasya viṣayaḥ proktaḥ tad nāma indriya gocaram

original: pakvāpakvaṃ ca bhuktaṃ ca vātaṃ jīrṇaṃ ca kukṣigam // PS_1,5.49 //
analyzed: pakva apakvam ca bhuktam ca vātam jīrṇam ca kukṣi gam
kālena viparītam tu śakṛt iti ucyate budhaiḥ
tādṛś artha utsarga saṃjñā u pāyoḥ viṣayam īritam
bhagandhara ādayaḥ mūla vraṇa ādyāḥ pāyu saṃsthitāḥ

original: doṣāḥ nirodhātisārāḥ pāyorna yadi kāryakṛt // PS_1,5.51 //
analyzed: doṣāḥ nirodha atisārāḥ pāyoḥ na yadi kārya kṛt
strī puṃsoḥ bhaga meḍhra ādi golaka stham hi atīndriyam
upastha śiśna saṃjñe dve indriye doṣa varjite
rati utsṛtau prabhavataḥ asṛj śukla āśrayau matau
meha vraṇa ādyāḥ nirdeṣam svārtha sādhakam
prakṛtam prākṛtam ca eva svarūpa indriya saṃyutam

original: arthakriyākāri taddhi nānyathā bhavati dhruvam // PS_1,5.54 //
analyzed: artha kriyā kāri tat hi nā anyathā bhavati dhruvam
jñāna indriyāṇi pañca api pañca karmendriyāṇi ca
rajaḥ pariccheda gāni bhinna śakti yutāni ca
jñāna indriyāṇām viṣayāḥ kramāt śabdāt ayaḥ matāḥ
śabda sparśa a rūpa rasa gandhāḥ te ca guṇa āmatāḥ
bhūtāni mātrāḥ garbheṣu līnā āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ
bhāva rūpa ajñāna gatam pañcakam guṇa garbhakam
mātrāsu līna bhūteṣu saṃsthitam bhāva pañcakam
tamaḥ moha mahāmoha tāmiśra andhatāmisrakāḥ

original: tamaḥ śabdagataṃ prāhuḥ mohaḥ sparśagato mataḥ // PS_1,5.59 //
analyzed: tamaḥ śabda gatam prāhuḥ mohaḥ sparśa gataḥ mataḥ
mahāmohaḥ rūpa gataḥ tāmiśraḥ rasa gomataḥ
gandhe andhatāmisra ākhyaḥ te ete bhāva rūpakāḥ
etāni prakṛti sthāni nityāṇi aṇutarāṇi ca
sthūlāni bhūta vyaktāni anityāni āmananti hi
jīva svarūpam naivate tat vibhinnam liṅga deha gam
tad sādhanāt vyañjamāna sva rūpa jñāna bādhakam
yaḥ mohaḥ saḥ upadeśe pi mahāmohaḥ nivartayet
vidveṣa kāraṇam prāhuḥ tāmiśram upadeṣṭṛṣu
kuyuktibhiḥ kva agamyaiḥ ca gāḍha ajñāna eka sādhanam
andha tā miśra saṃjñā ākhyam anādya jñānam īritam
anādi kālam ārabhya ananta ananta aṇu mātrakāḥ
keśa ādi ayuta tulya alpa svarūpa ahi ātma gocarāḥ
tad tad svarūpaka ākāra hariṇā bimba rūpiṇā

original: rakṣitāḥ pralaye sṛṣṭā nityaṃ tadanapāyinā // PS_1,5.67 //
analyzed: rakṣitāḥ pralaye sṛṣṭāḥ nityam tad anapāyinā
etad kalpa ādi bhāvīnām tad tad kalpeṣu vai kramāt
sṛjyāḥ vilakṣaṇāḥ tulyāḥ atulyāḥ trividha ātmakāḥ
jīvāḥ anāditas sarve pi asvatantrāḥ ramā vaśāḥ
laye sṛṣṭau hariḥ sṛṣṭāḥ aṇḍāt bahis atha antare
sātvika anīca madhyāḥ ca antar sṛjyāḥ atātvikāḥ
niraṃśa amartya gandharva pūrvāḥ sarve tṛṇa antikāḥ

original: yogyā nityasṛtisthāśca tamo yogyāśca kṛtsnaśaḥ // PS_1,5.71 //
analyzed: yogyāḥ nitya sṛti sthāḥ ca tamaḥ yogyāḥ ca kṛtsnaśas

original: sarvepi liṅgasambaddhā ye te jīvā na cānyathā /
analyzed: sarve api liṅga sambaddhāḥ ye te jīvāḥ na ca anyathā
pūrva anantaka alpeṣu evam sva ucita sādhanaiḥ
muktāḥ madhyāḥ tamaḥ prāptāḥ santi śrī hari garbha gāḥ
na eṣām kvāpi kvacid pūrtiḥ bhavitā niyamāt hareḥ
iti śrī prakāśasaṃhitāyām prathama paricchede pañcamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī haṃsaḥ uvāca
niḥśeṣataḥ rātri māne
kṣaṇe tam viśvasṛj sraṣṭum icchām cakre khila svayaṃprabhuḥ
tatas sva garbha gān jīvān liṅga muktān vinā īśvaraḥ
prakṛti ātmaka liṅgena śarīreṇa āvṛtāḥ tridhā
vibhinnānām śuddha rājasān sātvikān prabhuḥ
sva udara sthān samudhṛtya sṛjyān puruṣa nāmakaḥ
prādāt sarvān jīvān jagatprabhuḥ

original: naiva sṛṣṭistu muktānāṃ baddhānāṃ na hi sarvaśaḥ // PS_1,6.4 //
analyzed: na eva sṛṣṭiḥ tu muktānām baddhānām na hi sarvaśas
sṛṣṭiḥ uktā ayuktaḥ saṃkhyā niyamāt sṛṣṭiḥ ucyate

original: sṛṣṭiḥ saṃkhyā niyamataḥ tātvikātātvikeṣu ca // PS_1,6.5 //
analyzed: sṛṣṭiḥ saṃkhyā niyamataḥ tātvika atātvikeṣu ca
niraṃśeṣu na saṃkhyā asti bahu tva atvāt bahudhā eva sā
brahmatva yogyāḥ ṛjavaḥ nāmataḥ nantaśas gaṇāḥ
teṣu pūrva ananta kalpaiḥ muktāḥ santi hi anantaśas
liṅga baddhāḥ api ananta anantaśas santi garbha gāḥ
hareḥ teṣām sarvaśas upi teṣu sṛjyāḥ tu kecana
ṛju ādi tātvikāḥ sarve anāditas hi aparokṣiṇaḥ
sāmānyatas viśeṣeṇa sva sva yogya aparokṣiṇaḥ
kṷpta kāla ucita mahā sādhanena bhavanti hi
yatanti hi a parokṣa artham ṛjavaḥ śata saṃmitāḥ
pūrva aparokṣiṇaḥ te ca śata saṃkhyā mitāḥ sadā
ananta veda ukta guṇa upāsanāyām hareḥ sadā
yatanti te api kramaśas hi upāsīta guṇa uccayāḥ
bhavanti vedhāḥ sampūrṇa sat guṇa upāstimān iha

original: kāle mukto bhavatyeva mucyate naikadaiva hi // PS_1,6.12 //
analyzed: kāle muktaḥ bhavati eva mucyate na ekadā eva hi
evam ca brahma mānena kalpa dvi śatakena ca
pūrṇa śaktiḥ pūrṇa guṇa upāstiḥ muktā bhavati alam
mukteḥ pūrva kṣaṇe bhogya su prārabdha kṣaye pi ca
evam evā uttaratra api saṃkhyā niyamataḥ surāḥ
mucyante tātvikāḥ vakṣyamāṇaiḥ kalpaiḥ ajasya tu
dvipañcāśat kalpa mitāḥ śeṣa ādyāḥ tu sa bhāryakāḥ
viṃśat kalpa mitāḥ tu indrajīvāḥ dvi nava kalpakāḥ
ahaṃprāṇa pada arhaḥ ca guru ādyāt vi aṣṭa kalpakāḥ
pravāhaḥ tu dvi ṣaṣ kalpaiḥ sūrya ādyāḥ daśa kalpakāḥ

original: mitrādīnāṃ ca navabhistūkta śeṣagaṇasya tu // PS_1,6.17 //
analyzed: mitra ādīnām ca navabhiḥ tu ukta śeṣa gaṇasya tu

original: aṣṭabhiḥ saptabhiḥ kalpaiḥ sanakādi gaṇasya tu /
analyzed: aṣṭabhiḥ saptabhiḥ kalpaiḥ sanakādi gaṇasya tu
ṣaḍbhiḥ parjanyam ārabhya puṣkara anta gaṇasya vai
aparokṣataḥ karma devāḥ pañca kalpa aparokṣiṇaḥ
caturbhiḥ ājāna jānāntu sa ardha kalpa trayeṇa tu
kṛṣṇa aṅga saṅga gopīnām tribhiḥ pitṛ gaṇasya tu

original: gandharvāṇāntu kalpābhyāṃ martyānāṃ tu tathaikataḥ // PS_1,6.20 //
analyzed: gandharvāṇām tu kalpābhyām martyānām tu tathā ekatas
ardha kalpam tṛṇa antānām yogyānām hari darśane
niyamaḥ yam sarva kalpeṣu evam eva na ca anyathā
klpa saṃkhyā brahma mānāt vijñeyā yogya cetanaiḥ
asurāṇām tamaḥ prāptiḥ brahmaṇaḥ dina kalpataḥ
bhavati eva jagaddhātuḥ ājñayā ittham sadā eva tu
indra ādi puṣkara antānām guṇa upāsanayā ucitaiḥ
proktaiḥ kalpaiḥ vimucyante tāvat kalpaiḥ tu sādhanam
tat pūrvam aparokṣasya kartavyam iti niścayaḥ
aṇḍa antarāle padma uttha brahmā yāvat hi tiṣṭhati
tāvat saṃvatsara gata prati prati dineṣu api
sāṃśāḥ atātvikāḥ sarve saṃkhyayā vakṣyamāṇayā
mitāḥ tu pratikalpe pi pada sthāḥ hi aparokṣiṇaḥ
urvaśī ādya apsarasaḥ śata antān ca aṣṭa saṃkhyayā

original: mitā ājānajaistulyāḥ karmadevaiḥ samāḥ parāḥ // PS_1,6.27 //
analyzed: mitāḥ ājāna jaiḥ tulyāḥ karma devaiḥ samāḥ parāḥ
śatam pitṝṇām sapta eva teṣu urvaśī ādibhiḥ samāḥ
anye ājāna jebhyaḥ tu nyūnāḥ tebhyaḥ varāḥ kramāt

original: gandharvāstu śataṃ teṣu aṣṭau tulyāstu karmajaiḥ /
analyzed: gandharvāḥ tu śatam teṣu aṣṭau tulyāḥ tu karma jaiḥ
śata koṭi mitāḥ sarve ṛṣayaḥ viṃśat uttamāḥ
ṛṣīṇām ca śatam karma devaiḥ talyam udīritam
hari āveśāḥ ca tad madhye viṃśat īṣat guṇa uttamāḥ
teṣu eva tātvikāḥ ca aṣṭau śatakam karma jaiḥ samam
tad anye jāna jebhyaḥ tu tulyāḥ agni sutāḥ api
dvi aṣṭau sahasrāṇi śatam triṃśat cāraṇa rakṣasām
sādhyasiddhāḥ tathā anyāḥ tu saptatiḥ sarva jātiṣu
ājāna jāḥ te sva nyūnam pitṛ gandharva saṃyutāḥ
pratīka ālambanāḥ sa aṃśāḥ niraṃśāḥ tu tatas varāḥ
pratīka ālambanaḥ teṣu śreṣṭhāḥ mānuṣa gāyakāḥ

original: tato nyūnāstu rājāno martyoccāstu tato 'dhamāḥ // PS_1,6.34 //
analyzed: tatas nyūnāḥ tu rājānaḥ martya uccāḥ tu tatas dhamāḥ
martya gandharva rāśi ādi sarva jīva gaṇeṣu api
ye mukti yogyāḥ te sarve pratīka stha avalambinaḥ
niraṃśāḥ aparokṣāt prāk ūrdhvam api aṇḍe eva hi
sṛjya an ūrdhvam yathā sa aṃśāḥ aparokṣa vivarjitāḥ
aparokṣiṇām tu sāṃśānām tātvikaiḥ bhinna cetasām
atātvikānām karma ādi sura gandharva mānuṣām
etāvat anta jīvānām sūkṣma āptiḥ aniruddhataḥ
aja utpatteḥ purā aja aṇḍe sthūla āptiḥ iti niścayaḥ
tātvikānām bahis ca aṇḍāt sūkṣma sthūla āptiḥ iṣyate
asaṃsṛṣṭa śarīrāḥ te ṇḍa utpatteḥ purā surāḥ
aṇḍa antarāle sarve saṃsṛṣṭāḥ sthūla dehakāḥ

original: laye sarve liṅgabaddhāḥ śūnyakukṣā vasanti hi // PS_1,6.40 //
analyzed: laye sarve liṅga baddhāḥ śūnya kukṣāḥ vasanti hi
teṣu mukta itare saṃkhyāḥ niyamāt sṛṣṭi saṃmatāḥ
ye ca tān nikhilān vāsudevaḥ sraṣṭum upākramat
jaḍa ākhyā prakṛtiḥ sarva jīvānām liṅga rūpiṇī
prakṛteḥ garbha gāḥ jīvāḥ liṅga deha yutāḥ matāḥ
anādi kālam ārabhya jīvāḥ saṃsṛti bandha gāḥ

original: tatra pūrvānantakalpe jīvāḥ satsādhanena ca // PS_1,6.43 //
analyzed: tatra pūrva ananta kalpe jīvāḥ sat sādhanena ca
miśreṇa viparītena jñānena atyakta bandhanāḥ
jīvāḥ ca trividhāḥ āsan śata koṭi sahasraśas
sṛjyeṣu liṅga baddheṣu pūrva sṛjyaḥ caturmukhaḥ

original: na caikakāle sarveṣāṃ sṛṣṭiḥ sā kālabhedataḥ // PS_1,6.45 //
analyzed: na ca eka kāle sarveṣām sṛṣṭiḥ sā kāla bhedataḥ
bhavati atas pūrva jātāḥ uttamān ye tatas varāḥ
laya ākhya para kāla ante vyatīte sṛṣṭi saṃmate
para kālāt ime jasya sṛṣṭiḥ anyasya kālataḥ

original: brahmaṇaḥ sṛṣṭitaḥ paścādvāyoḥ sṛṣṭiḥ śatābdataḥ // PS_1,6.47 //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ sṛṣṭitaḥ paścāt vāyoḥ sṛṣṭiḥ śata abdataḥ
tatas śata abdataḥ vāṇyāḥ bhāratyāḥ tad śata abdataḥ
tatas sahasra abdataḥ ca sṛṣṭiḥ tu vipa śeṣayoḥ
nīla ādīnām sahasraḥ ca vatsaraiḥ tāvatā punar
vāruṇī ādeḥ daśa sāhasra abdataḥ tu tatas param
sṛṣṭiḥ indrasya kāmasya api ayuta abdāḥ tathā apare
sṛṣṭāḥ asyuḥ hariṇāḥ ye ca nīcāḥ te
puṣkara antāḥ tātvikāḥ ca tathā eva atātvikāḥ pare
niraṃśāḥ nitya baddhāḥ ca tamaḥ yogyāḥ ca rākṣasāḥ
ayuta abdāt ha iva mānāt pūrva pūrva vyavasthayā
sṛṣṭiḥ bhavati sā sūkṣma sthūla bhedāt vidhā matā
tātvikānām pada sthānām sarveṣām aparokṣiṇām
aṇḍāt pūrvā eva bhavati tad anyeṣām tad antare
aṇḍāt bahis atha aṇḍa antar jāyamāna janasya tu
pūrva ukta kāla niyamāt sṛṣṭiḥ jñeyā yathākramam
liṅga baddhasya tu yadā sūkṣma deha āptiḥ iṣyate
tatas pūrva kṣaṇe liṅge guṇa vaiṣamyam iṣyate

original: bhūrnāmakendirā tatra ceṣṭakā tasya māninī // PS_1,6.56 //
analyzed: bhūḥ nāmakā indirā tatra ca iṣṭakā tasya māninī
satva bhāga spṛṣṭa rajaḥ pārśva gāḥ rājasa aṇavaḥ

original: daśapralayakāle tu bhūmyā satvasya pārśvagāḥ // PS_1,6.57 //
analyzed: daśa pralaya kāle tu bhūmyā satvasya pārśva gāḥ
bhavanti laya kāla ante tatra tiṣṭhanti sarvaśas
rājasa aṇuḥ sātvika aṃśa gataḥ tu ekaikaśas pṛthak
daśa eva tādṛśāḥ ete militāḥ dvādaśa aṇavaḥ
sātvikeṣu śata mitān rakta varṇān karoti alam
svabhāvataḥ satva bhāgāḥ śuklāḥ te satva saṃsthitāḥ
raktā sahasra saṃkhyākāḥ

original: bhavanti ca rajaḥ spṛṣṭāḥ satvapārśvagatā laye /
analyzed: bhavanti ca rajaḥ spṛṣṭāḥ satva pārśva gatāḥ laye
evam ekaḥ rājasa aṇuḥ rājasa aṃśa apasavya gam
tāmasam

original: atyalpaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ te raktoraktī karotyalam // PS_1,6.62 //
analyzed: ati alpam nīla varṇam te rakta uraktī karoti alam

original: ekaḥ śuddho rājasāṃśaḥ paricchede tu rājase /
analyzed: ekaḥ śuddhaḥ rājasa aṃśaḥ paricchede tu rājase

original: madhye tiṣṭhantyapi laye rājasāṇu samā ime // PS_1,6.63 //
analyzed: madhye tiṣṭhanti api laye rājasa aṇu samāḥ ime
tamaḥ pariccheda gatāḥ tāmasa aṇuḥ tu yādṛśāḥ
tāmasāḥ tādṛśāḥ ete militāḥ dvādaśa aṇavaḥ
rājasa paramāṇu pramāṇataḥ
adhikam guṇitāḥ tatra śata dvādaśa saṃmitāḥ
sahasra sātvika aṇavaḥ
lakṣāḥ bhavanti kārya upayuktāḥ ete bhavanti hi
tāmasāt tu paricchedāt viguṇaḥ rājasa smṛtaḥ
rājasāt tu paricchedāḥ dviguṇaḥ sātvikaḥ smṛtaḥ
eka ekasman paricchede pi anantāḥ paramāṇavaḥ
santi tatra niyantā ajaḥ viṣṇu brahma śiva ātmakaḥ

original: jaḍāyāṃ prakṛtau cāpi liṅgadehe tathaiva ca /
analyzed: jaḍāyām prakṛtau ca api liṅga dehe tathā eva ca
santi ananta aṇavaḥ teṣu pūrvoktāḥ kārya sādhakāḥ
rājasa aṃśāḥ laye rājasa sātvikān
vadanti tāmasa gatam rajaḥ rājasa tāmasam
rajaḥ pariccheda gatam santaḥ rājasa tāmasam

original: vadantyeva laye yogo bhavati śrīharīcchayā // PS_1,6.72 //
analyzed: vadanti eva laye yogaḥ bhavati śrī hari icchayā

original: sāmyāvasthāṃ budhāḥ prāhuḥ etāṃ prakṛtiliṅgayoḥ // PS_1,6.73 //
analyzed: sāmya avasthām budhāḥ prāhuḥ etām prakṛti liṅgayoḥ
iti śrī prakāśasaṃhitāyām prathama paricchede ṣaṣṭhaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī haṃsaḥ uvāca
nārīkela phala ākāraḥ liṅga dehaḥ trivṛt mataḥ
mūrdhni chidra yutaḥ garbha avakāśa kalitaḥ sadā
antar nibaddhāḥ jīvāḥ te trividhāḥ api mocane
na śaktaḥ ramaya āścat na mūrdhni chidrāḥ asanti alam
duḥkha spṛṣṭāḥ liṅga baddhāḥ duḥkha a spṛṣṭā ramā eva hi

original: yasmannakāle yasya sūkṣmaḥ nāśo bhavati viṣṇunā // PS_1,7.3 //
analyzed: yasman akāle yasya sūkṣmaḥ nāśaḥ bhavati viṣṇunā
aniruddhena bahis
tad uttara kṣaṇe liṅga dehe ca guṇa sāmya tā
bhūmyākṛtā bhavati sā svarūpa jñāna rūpiṇī
jīvānām jñāna rodhinī
svārūpika jñāna sukhe prayatna icchāḥ satām laye

original: ruddhā bhavanti sāmye tu vaiṣamye vyaktimañjasā /
analyzed: ruddhāḥ bhavanti sāmye tu vaiṣamye vyaktim añjasā

original: yāntyavasthādvayaṃ liṅge laye sṛṣṭau kramātkila // PS_1,7.6 //
analyzed: yānti avasthā dvayam liṅge laye sṛṣṭau kramāt kila

original: kṣaṇakṣaṇena bhramatāṃ sa tāṃ savyena cānyathā /
analyzed: kṣaṇa kṣaṇena bhramatām sa tām savyena ca anyathā
bhramatām liṅga deha stha guṇatraya su yogataḥ
sṛṣṭi kāle tridhā bhinnā jīvānām buddhiḥ iṣyate

original: sātvikī rājasī ceti tāmasīti samastaśaḥ // PS_1,7.8 //
analyzed: sātvikī rājasī ca iti tāmasī iti samastaśas
yogyānām sātvikī buddhiḥ bahulā anye lpake mate

original: madhyamānāntu jīvānāṃ rājasī tāmasī matiḥ // PS_1,7.9 //
analyzed: madhyamānām tu jīvānām rājasī tāmasī matiḥ
kramāt bahutare nyetu su alpa mātre bhaviṣyataḥ
anādya jñānam uddiṣṭam bāhyam asvārūpikam tu tat
sākṣi indriyāṇām tamasā
manasā yoge tat hi bhaviṣyati
sākṣi indriyāṇām satva stha manasā saṅgamaḥ yadi
bāhyā svārūpikan jñānam trividhānām citām iha
sākṣi indriyāṇām rajasā manasā saṅgamaḥ yadi

original: bāhyamasvārūpikaṃ ca kāmakrodhādikaṃ ca yat // PS_1,7.13 //
analyzed: bāhyam asvārūpikam ca kāma krodha ādikam ca yat
anādi kāmaḥ jīvānām trividhānām bhaviṣyati
rajaḥ pariccheda gatāḥ jñāna indriya kalāḥ yadi
sākṣi indriya yuta abāhya śabda ādi icchā bhaviṣyati
anādikāmaḥ sā proktā trividhānām citām iha
rajaḥ pariccheda gatāḥ karmendriya kalāḥ yadi
sākṣi indri yutāḥ karma janayanti api anādikam

original: bāhyaliṅgagataṃ karma na tu svārūpikaṃ matam /
analyzed: bāhya liṅga gatam karma na tu svārūpikam matam

original: anādyavidyākāmau cānādi karma ca liṅgagam // PS_1,7.17 //
analyzed: anādya vidyā kāmau ca anādi karma ca liṅga gam
madīyam iti matvā tu baddhaḥ bhavati cetanaḥ

original: kālena bhārate varṣe labdhajanmāpi mānuṣam // PS_1,7.18 //
analyzed: kālena bhārate varṣe labdha janmā api mānuṣam
brāhmaṇyam sat guroḥ saṅgam bhakti jñāna idhi gamya ca
prasādāt śrī hareḥ karma devatānām atha antare
aṇḍāt bahis tātvikānām vaikuṇṭha parigha ālaye
parāntya vṛtti paritas sthitevāri nimajya ca
abhivyakta sva rūpāṇām satām liṅga viparyaye
bhārate martya janmani
duḥsaṅga vṛddhāt aṇḍa antar liṅga dehasya nāśane
sati vāyoḥ gadā ghātāt asatām kāla yogataḥ
anādya vidyā kāmau ca anādi karma api naśyati

original: ato bāhyaṃ na svarūpā avidyādyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: atas bāhyam na sva rūpāḥ avidyā ādyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: jñānājñāne svarūpasthe nitye naiva ca naśvare // PS_1,7.24 //
analyzed: jñāna ajñāne sva rūpa sthe nitye nā eva ca naśvare
anādya vidyā kāma ādyāḥ sāmya avasthā yadā bhavet

original: tadā jīvasya sarvasya na bhavanti kadācana // PS_1,7.25 //
analyzed: tadā jīvasya sarvasya na bhavanti kadācana
rājasa aṇu śatāṃśa ābhāḥ dvi ṣaṭkāḥ tāmasa aṇavaḥ
laye teṣu rajasi ekaḥ satva pārśva gatāḥ daśa
bhavanti ekaḥ tamaḥ madhye saṃsthitaḥ bhavati dhruvam
rajaḥ gatā uṇuḥ tamasaḥ sataḥ dviguṇa rājasam
rājasa aṇu śata aṃśa ābhāḥ sa tvagāḥ tāmasa aṇavaḥ
daśa apidaśa tā utkṛṣṭān sātvika aṇūn laye dhruvam
nīlīkurvanti evam eṣā sāmya avasthā prakīrtitā

original: tāmasī rājasī ceti sāmyāvasthā dvidhā matā // PS_1,7.29 //
analyzed: tāmasī rājasī ca iti sāmya avasthā dvidhā matā

original: sāmyāvasthā sātvike tu na kvāpi kila vidyate /
analyzed: sāmya avasthā sātvike tu na kvāpi kila vidyate

original: dvābhyāntu sāmyavasthābhyāṃ liṅgastābhyāṃ janasya tu // PS_1,7.30 //
analyzed: dvābhyām tu sāmi avasthābhyām liṅgaḥ tābhyām janasya tu

original: laye sarvasya tāṃ nidrāṃ nāśaṃ prāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: laye sarvasya tām nidrām nāśam prāhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: yadā yogecchoparamaḥ tadā jñāpayati prabhuḥ // PS_1,7.31 //
analyzed: yadā yoga icchā uparamaḥ tadā jñāpayati prabhuḥ
ayogya icchā prayatna ādi kartuḥ āśām chinatti ca

original: vaiṣamye sati liṅge tu jananecchā hi jāyate // PS_1,7.32 //
analyzed: vaiṣamye sati liṅge tu janana icchā hi jāyate

original: yadecchā jāyate jantostadā sṛjati taṃ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: yadā icchā jāyate jantoḥ tadā sṛjati tam prabhuḥ
sṛjyānām sarva jīvānām aṇḍāt bahis ratha antare
na ekadā viṣama avasthā hi aja ādīnām kramāt bhavet
vyutkramāt pūrva mānena aṇḍa antar bahis eva ca
sāmya avasthā ca nīcānām prāk paścāt uttamasya ca

original: laye satvapraviṣṭā ye daśate rājasāṇavaḥ // PS_1,7.35 //
analyzed: laye satva praviṣṭāḥ ye daśate rājasa aṇavaḥ
sva śata adhika sattva stha paramāṇu samanvitāḥ

original: sṛṣṭikāle śriyānunnā rajo bhāgaṃ viśanti hi // PS_1,7.36 //
analyzed: sṛṣṭi kāle śriyā anunnāḥ rajaḥ bhāgam viśanti hi
tamaḥ pariccheda gata rājasa aṇuḥ laye tu yaḥ
sva śata aṃśam tāmasa aṇum gṛhītvā durgayā īritaḥ
rajaḥ bhāgam praviśanti sṛṣṭi kāle samāgate
laye rajaḥ bhāga madhya gata uṇuḥ rājasasya yaḥ
rajaḥ madhye vyaktim eti sṛṣṭi kāle upāgate

original: prakṛtau liṅgadeho 'pi evaṃ yadi guṇasthitiḥ // PS_1,7.39 //
analyzed: prakṛtau evam yadi guṇa sthitiḥ
sāmya avasthām jaguḥ prājñāḥ tayā sṛṣṭiḥ bhaviṣyati
laye satva praviṣṭhāḥ ye daśa etat tāmasa aṇavaḥ
rājasa aṇu śata aṃśa ābhāḥ sātvikaiḥ sva sama aṇubhiḥ

original: yuktāstāmasa bhāgaṃ hi viśanti śrīsamīritāḥ // PS_1,7.41 //
analyzed: yuktāḥ tāmasa bhāgam hi viśanti śrī samīritāḥ
rajaḥ viṣṭaḥ tāmasa aṇuḥ pūrva aṇu satveṇa
tulitaḥ svayam
svatas sa tvāt ca
dviguṇena eva saṃyuktaḥ rājasa aṇunā

original: tatra sthitvā laye bhūyaḥ sṛṣṭikāla upāgate /
analyzed: tatra sthitvā laye bhūyas sṛṣṭi kāle upāgate
bhuvān unnaḥ tamaḥ bhāgam viśanti śrī hari icchayā
eka śuddhaḥ tāmasa aṇuḥ pūrvaiḥ tāmasa sātvikaiḥ
daśābhiḥ ca ekatamasā tathā rājasa tāmasam
prāpya saṃmilitāḥ sarve tamaḥ vaiṣamya nāmakam
sahasra sātvika aṇubhyaḥ daśa rājasaka aṇubhiḥ
śuddhena rajasā ekena rajasā ayukta tāmasaḥ
aṇuḥ yadā ekībhavati rajaḥ vaiṣamye ucyate

original: rajo vaiṣamyataḥ sṛṣṭiḥ tamo vaiṣamyato layaḥ // PS_1,7.47 //
analyzed: rajaḥ vaiṣamyataḥ sṛṣṭiḥ tamaḥ vaiṣamyataḥ layaḥ
iti śrī prakāśasaṃhitāyām prathama paricchede saptamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī haṃsaḥ uvāca
vyatīte laya kāle tu sṛṣṭi kāle upāgate
para kāla ādim ādau tu puruṣaḥ sarva cetanān
vāsudeva īrpayat liṅga baddhān jīvān sṛjyān
vilakṣaṇān
tāratamya yutān sva yogya tām kalitān ca saḥ
sva sva ucita mahā yatna abhimukhān sva sva karmaṇā
janma lābha ucitān vāsudeva sthān vīkṣya cintayan
sṛṣṭi kāla ādi animiṣa sūkṣma deha ucitam hi ajām
liṅga baddhan tu tad pūrva kṣaṇa vaiṣamya saṃgataḥ
ekam gṛhītvā anya jīvān prādāt saṅkarṣaṇaḥ vibhuḥ

original: sa vāyumekaṃ liṅge taṃ gṛhītvānyān sucetanān // PS_1,8.5 //
analyzed: sa vāyum ekam liṅge tam gṛhītvā anyān su cetanān
pradyumraḥ dāttayoḥ bhārye sa gṛhītvā sa liṅgake
tad anya antātvikān sarva pada sthān bhāvitātvikān
vyakta aparokṣiṇaḥ saṃkhyā niyamāt sūkṣma yogataḥ
sraṣṭum prādāt sa carame aniruddhaḥ khila īśvaraḥ
vāsudevaḥ viriñcasya liṅga deham vyacālayat
tad tad liṅga deha stha triguṇebhyaḥ tri bindavaḥ

original: nyapatan tatra yobinduḥ sātvikaḥ sa tu nirmalaḥ / /
analyzed: nyapatan tatra yaḥ binduḥ sātvikaḥ sa tu nirmalaḥ
rajaḥ rajaḥ binduḥ tathā apatat
tamaḥ vaiṣamya kalitaḥ tamaḥ binduḥ abhūt tatas
rajaḥ bindu gataḥ viṣṇu rajaḥ vaiṣamyam ūrjitam
pṛthak sthāpya rajaḥ bindum śuddham cakre jagadguruḥ
tamaḥ bindu gataḥ devaḥ tamaḥ vaiṣamyam utkaṭam
samudhṛtya pṛthak sthāpya tam bindum śuddham ātanot

original: tato māyā prārthitaḥ san vāsudevastadādimaḥ // PS_1,8.12 //
analyzed: tatas māyā prārthitaḥ san vāsudevaḥ tad ādimaḥ
tad rajaḥ guṇa vaiṣamya liṅga baddham ajam vibhuḥ
ajasya sūkṣma deha āptyai rajaḥ vaiṣamyam ūrjitam
nikṣipya ca nigīrya īśaḥ māyāyām mahat āhvayam

original: sūkṣmarūpaṃ tu tadvīryaṃ prākṛtaṃ prākṣipaddhariḥ // PS_1,8.14 //
analyzed: sūkṣma rūpam tu tat vīryam prākṛtam prākṣipat hariḥ
tatra sā suṣuve sūkṣma dehavantam ajam vibhum

original: guṇatrayāṇavaḥ pūrvaṃ sāṃkhyā niyamataḥ sthitāḥ // PS_1,8.15 //
analyzed: guṇa traya aṇavaḥ pūrvam sāṃkhyāḥ niyamataḥ sthitāḥ

original: yāvantaste sadā nityāḥ teṣāṃ nāśo na vidyate /
analyzed: yāvantaḥ te sadā nityāḥ teṣām nāśaḥ na vidyate

original: tatra satvāṇavaḥ sarve daśadhopacitāḥ sadā // PS_1,8.16 //
analyzed: tatra sattva aṇavaḥ sarve daśadhā upacitāḥ sadā
bhavanti rājasāḥ tāmasāḥ aṇavaḥ pāda mātrataḥ
bhavanti upacitāḥ vāyu sarasvatī ādi sūkṣma gāḥ
sattva ādayaḥ tu daśadhā ūrjitāḥ sambhavanti hi
trṛṇa ādīnām sūkṣma gata anadhikāḥ prabhavanti hi
satva aṇavaḥ rājasāḥ ca tāmasāḥ hi aṇavaḥ ca ye

original: ṛjūnāṃ sūkṣmagāḥ pādopacitāḥ prabhavanti hi // PS_1,8.19 //
analyzed: ṛjūnām sūkṣma gāḥ pāda upacitāḥ prabhavanti hi
sa aṃśāḥ sarveṣu sa aṃśeṣu sūkṣma deheṣu kṛtsnaśas
sattva aṇavaḥ daśa ādhikyam yānti eva upacitau satām
rajaḥ tamāṇavaḥ tu ucceṣu alpa nīceṣu ca adhikāḥ
tad rajaḥ guṇa vaiṣamyam ādāya adya anujaḥ svayam
sarveṣām sūkṣma dehānām ante vasati nāśa kṛt
satvam rajaḥ tamaḥ sṛṣṭam viṣṇu brahma śiva ātmakam
śukla rakta ātmikā ānīlāḥ ādāya ananta rūpakaḥ
tat tat sūkṣmaśarīra stha sthāna traya gataḥ hariḥ

original: tadā hyavasthā tritayaṃ tadviśeṣādime sukham // PS_1,8.24 //
analyzed: tadā hi avasthā tritayam tad viśeṣāt ime sukham
ekonaviṃśati mukhau viśva taijasa nāmakau
savya apasavya gāni evam puruṣa āsya animadhya gam
gaja ābham tu tayoḥ asyāḥ mukhānām kṛtyam api uta
dakṣiṇa akṣi sthitaḥ viśvaḥ satva sthaḥ satva bhāgataḥ
uttamānām madhyamānām nīcānām
tribhiḥ mukhaiḥ sattva gataiḥ avasthām jāgrat āhvayām

original: karotyayaṃ madhyagākhya tritayena sa eva hi /
analyzed: karoti ayam madhyaga ākhya tritayena saḥ eva hi
ucca madhya avara amartya dāsānām jāgrat āhvayām
karoti avasthām anta sthaiḥ tribhiḥ āsyaiḥ saḥ eva hi

original: niraṃśānāṃ ca jīvānāṃ jāgratāṃ sampravartakaḥ // PS_1,8.29 //
analyzed: niraṃśānām ca jīvānām jāgratām sampravartakaḥ
puṃsām evam vāmaga āsyaiḥ strīṇām evam kariṣyati
ananta ananta janma ūru martya dehaiḥ kṛtāni tu
jāgrat haśāyām manasā vācakāḥ yena ca indriyaiḥ
kṛtāni sātvika ādīni karmāṇi ucyāvacāni ca
yāni yāni api sarvāṇi saṃcintāni api teṣu alam
naṣṭeṣu tad adṛṣṭāni liṅgāni nivasanti alam

original: teṣu bhogāya dattāni bhuktvā nāśaṃ prayānti hi /
analyzed: teṣu bhogāya dattāni bhuktvā nāśam prayānti hi

original: bhogāya ca pradattāni ardhabhuktāni sarvaśaḥ // PS_1,8.33 //
analyzed: bhogāya ca pradattāni ardha bhuktāni sarvaśas
prārabdhāni ca teṣu eva kānicid bhogataḥ kṣayam
yānti prārabdha śiṣṭāni aparokṣe sati sphuṭam

original: na nayānti ca sarvāṇi bhogayogyānya saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: na ca sarvāṇi saṃśayaḥ
tatra duṣprārabdha jātam bahu alpam karoti ajaḥ
bhagavat bhakti yogena hareḥ icchā hi tādṛśī

original: hariṇā jīvabhogāya na dattāni hyanantaśaḥ // PS_1,8.36 //
analyzed: hariṇā jīva bhogāya na dattāni hi anantaśas
rāśīkṛtāni liṅga stha karma adṛṣṭāni koṭiśas

original: sañcitānyapi tānīha aparokṣe sati sphuṭam // PS_1,8.37 //
analyzed: sañcitāni api tāni iha aparokṣe sati sphuṭam
dagdhāni api vinaṣṭāni bhavanti eva na saṃśayaḥ
martyaḥ jīvan bhārate ismin nityam koṭi sahasraśas
karoti vivaśaḥ baddhaḥ
ananta janmanā ananta ananta āyuḥ parimāṇataḥ
kṛtāni abhuṅkta sva kṛta karmaṇām bhogataḥ layaḥ
sañcitānām ananta uru brahmakālaiḥ api kvacid

original: kvāpi no ghaṭate bhoktuṃ kintu śrīviṣṇudarśane /
analyzed: kvāpi no ghaṭate bhoktum kintu śrī viṣṇu darśane

original: naiṣāṃ phalaṃ hi jīvānāṃ bhavedityājñayā hareḥ // PS_1,8.41 //
analyzed: na eṣām phalam hi jīvānām bhavet iti ājñayā hareḥ
likhitāni api patreṣu citraguptaiḥ punar punar
ramābrahma ādayaḥ devāḥ sarva karma abhimāninaḥ

original: yacchanti na phalaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā tasya karhicit /
analyzed: yacchanti na phalam puṇyam pāpam vā tasya karhicit
cchitvā likhita patrāṇi yamadūtaiḥ hariḥ priyaiḥ

original: bodhayantyapi he jīva na te sañcitato bhayam /
analyzed: bodhayanti api he jīva na te sañcitataḥ bhayam

original: iti kāraṇato nāśaṃ sañcitasya vadanti hi // PS_1,8.44 //
analyzed: iti kāraṇataḥ nāśam sañcitasya vadanti hi
ghaṭa ādi nāśa vat nāśaḥ karmaṇām nā eva śasyate
su prārabdhasya sarvasya bhogāt eva parikṣayaḥ
aparokṣa anantaram tu kṛtam karma śubha aśubham
āgāmi iti uditaḥ sadbhiḥ na ta lopaḥ bhaviṣyati
na likhanti paṭe citra guptāḥ tāni sura uttamāḥ

original: yacchanti na phalaṃ teṣāmato na śliṣyate janaḥ // PS_1,8.47 //
analyzed: yacchanti na phalam teṣām atas na śliṣyate janaḥ
āgāmi karmabhiḥ tat ca aniṣṭam kāmyam hi rāja kṣasāḥ

original: gṛhṇantīṣṭaṃ kāmyapuṇyaṃ tadiṣṭāḥ prāpnuvanti hi // PS_1,8.48 //
analyzed: gṛhṇanti iṣṭam kāmya puṇyam tad iṣṭāḥ prāpnuvanti hi
āgāmi viṣṇu dveṣa ādi kaliḥ gṛhṇāti na itaraḥ
āgāmi bhaktitaḥ prāptavya ānandam aśnute
veda uktam api a veda uktam jñāna ajñāna ādibhiḥ kṛtam
bālya yauvana vārdhikaiḥ kṛtam vāc kāya mānasaiḥ

original: bhītyā prītyā āveśato vā kṛtaṃ karma śubhāśubham /
analyzed: bhītyā prītyā āveśataḥ vā kṛtam karma śubha aśubham

original: jñāyanneva karotyeṣaḥ bhuṅkte jāgṛddhi tatphalam // PS_1,8.51 //
analyzed: jñāyan eva karoti eṣaḥ bhuṅkte jāgṛt hi tad phalam
bhū tale vā api vivareṣu antarikṣake
svarga ādi sarva lokeṣu brahmāṇḍāt bahis antare

original: niraye vā tamasi vā vaikuṇṭhādiṣu vā janaḥ /
analyzed: niraye vā tamasi vā vaikuṇṭha ādiṣu vā janaḥ

original: jāgradbhuṅkte karmaphalaṃ viśvādhīnaḥ sadaiva hi // PS_1,8.53 //
analyzed: jāgrat bhuṅkte karma phalam viśva adhīnaḥ sadā eva hi
ānanta āsana vaikuṇṭha śvetadvīpeṣu saṃsthitāḥ
mahar ādiṣu satya anta lokeṣu aṇḍāt bahis tathā
tātvikāḥ sva adhikāreṣu niyatāḥ na itare janāḥ

original: svaprārabdhaphalaṃ yānti te sarve hyaparokṣiṇaḥ // PS_1,8.55 //
analyzed: sva prārabdha phalam yānti te sarve hi aparokṣiṇaḥ
atātvikāḥ niraṃśānām yogyānām kvāpi karhicit
na adhikāraḥ tu ayogyānām kim vācyam duḥkha bhoginām

original: riyuḥ trīn karmaṇā lokān jñānenaiva taduttarān /
analyzed: riyuḥ trīn karmaṇā lokān jñānena eva tad uttarān

original: tatra makhyā hariṃ yānti tadanye vāyumeva tu // PS_1,8.57 //
analyzed: tatra makhyāḥ harim yānti tad anye vāyum eva tu

original: apakvā ye na te yānti vāyuṃ vā harimeva vā /
analyzed: apakvāḥ ye na te yānti vāyum vā harim eva vā
sthāna mātra āśritāḥ te tu punarjani vivarjitāḥ
jñāna gamyeṣu lokeṣu aṇḍa antar mahar ādiṣu
atātvika niraṃśānām mukta antānām krama unnatām
vāsaḥ prārabdha puṇyena niṣkāmaḥ na bhaviṣyati
ātātvika niraṃśānām sarga martya adhameṣu api
sa tātvikānām prarabdhāt puṇyāt pāpāt ca saṃcitāt
bhoga dattāt puṇya pāpāt sukha duḥkha ādi śasyate
tiryagyoniṣu garbheṣu vāsebhiḥ eṣām prakalpyate
niraṃśa nīca sāṃśānām narake vāsaḥ iṣyate
prārabdhataḥ sañcitāt vā na yogyānām tamaḥ gatiḥ
ayogyānām dveṣa pākāt tamaḥ prāptiḥ bhaviṣyati
deva gandharva paryantāḥ deva śabda uditāḥ kramāt

original: devānāṃ nirayo naiva tamaścāpi kathañcana // PS_1,8.64 //
analyzed: devānām nirayaḥ nā eva tamaḥ ca api kathañcana

original: nā surāṇāṃ tathā muktiḥ kadācit kenacit kvacit /
analyzed: nā surāṇām tathā muktiḥ kadācid kenacid kvacid
bhārata ādi aṣṭa varṣeṣu sapta dvīpeṣu ca adriṣu
sarveṣām pāpa puṇyaiḥ ca mukhya prārabdha sañcayaiḥ

original: tamo mithyājñānayogāt jñānenaiva hareḥ padam // PS_1,8.66 //
analyzed: tamaḥ mithyā jñāna yogāt jñānena eva hareḥ padam

original: teṣāṃ prāgukta karmottha phalaṃ vai jāgratā bhavet /
analyzed: teṣām prāc ukta karma uttha phalam vai jāgratā bhavet

original: jāgratpravartako viśvaḥ so 'ja dakṣākṣigo bhavet // PS_1,8.67 //
analyzed: jāgrat pravartakaḥ viśvaḥ saḥ dakṣa akṣi gaḥ bhavet
sattvam ādāya tad sūkṣma stha tathā caran

original: na dhātuḥ sañcitaṃ kāmyaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ pātakādikam // PS_1,8.68 //
analyzed: na dhātuḥ sañcitam kāmyam na dṛṣṭam pātaka ādikam
na dainya āveśa duḥkha ādi na saṃśaya viparyayau

original: na duricchānānyaratiḥ na bhogecchā kusaṅgatiḥ // PS_1,8.69 //
analyzed: na duricchā na anya ratiḥ na bhoga icchā kusaṅgatiḥ
na deha abhimatiḥ na asat pathe deha indriya udgatiḥ
brahmaṇaḥ hi parasya asya prasādāt sarvadā asukham
svapna nidrā vyādhi pūrvam tat ca duḥkha phalam tyajet

original: sontaraṅgo hareḥ sākṣāt sarvotkṛṣṭa priyo mataḥ /
analyzed: saḥ ntaraṅgaḥ hareḥ sākṣāt sarva utkṛṣṭa priyaḥ mataḥ
pakva śeṣa ādibhiḥ dṛśyam āparokṣeṇa keśavam
anādi kālam ārabhya aja jīva gaṇāḥ sadā
paśyanti ātma ucita hareḥ aparokṣāya janmabhiḥ
yatante śata kalpa antyaiḥ dṛṣṭvā īśam śata kalpakaiḥ
kṛtayā ananta veda ukta guṇa upāsanayā padam
prāpnoti tasya sūkṣmā āpiḥ vāsudevāt tadā bhavat

original: taddhehaliṅgajaṃ śuddhaṃ raja ādāya tejasaḥ // PS_1,8.75 //
analyzed: tat ha iha liṅga jam śuddham rajaḥ ādāya tejasaḥ
tad sūkṣma kaṇṭhe vasati svapna kṛt bhagavān hariḥ
ekādaśa indriyaiḥ karma kartavyam iti vāsanā
manasi utpadyate tat ca na karoti prayatnataḥ
nidrā jñāna unmāda bhaya roga āyāsāḥ vid unmataiḥ
anukūlā bhāvatā avabhavati eva
janma janma antareṣu api
a kṛtānām karmaṇān tu
svapna dṛṣṭāḥ ananta arthāḥ tad kāla sukha duḥkha dāḥ

original: na jāgradṛṣṭipathagāḥ kintu tatkāla kalpitāḥ // PS_1,8.79 //
analyzed: na jāgrat dṛṣṭi patha gāḥ kintu tad kāla kalpitāḥ
svapne svasthasya jīvasya vāsanā ānantyam īśvaraḥ
upādānīkṛtya mukhyaiḥ pūrva uktaiḥ eva taijasaḥ
kalpayitvā bahūn arthān darśayati akhila īśvaraḥ
svapnaḥ satyaḥ tatas yasmāt bhāvīna phala sūcakaḥ
śeṣa ādi sarva jīvānām yogya kāle tathā caran
taijasaḥ svapna kṛt ca iti janasya svapna kṛt bhavet
tad tamaḥ guṇam ādāya
jīvasya liṅga baddhasya pāda sthasya jagadguroḥ
dhyāna avasthām dadāti evam eka āsyaḥ dehu ayonitaḥ
liṅga baddham grasan ardham mūrchā avasthām prayacchati
liṅga baddham mukhe sthāpya

original: yadāśliṣyati taṃ devaḥ tadā nidrāṃ prayacchati // PS_1,8.85 //
analyzed: yadā āśliṣyati tam devaḥ tadā nidrām prayacchati

original: prājño jīveśvarastaṃ vai vinā jīvokṣamaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: prājñaḥ jīveśvaraḥ tam vai vinā jīvokṣamaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: prājñaḥ kaṇṭhasthitaṃ prāpya jīvānāṃ svapnado bhavet // PS_1,8.86 //
analyzed: prājñaḥ kaṇṭha sthitam prāpya jīvānām svapna daḥ bhavet
jīvam gṛhītvā dakṣa akṣi gataḥ asau jaga jāgṛt īśvaraḥ

original: na prājñatejasau dhātuḥ svapnanidrā pravartakau(kā ?) // PS_1,8.87 //
analyzed: na prājña tejasau dhātuḥ svapna nidrā
dhyāna avasthām vinā tasya tat tat duṣkarma varjanāt

original: prājñaṃ jīveśvaraṃ prāhuḥ sa sarvahṛdisaṅgataḥ // PS_1,8.88 //
analyzed: prājñam jīveśvaram prāhuḥ sa sarva hṛdisaṅgataḥ

original: sāṃśajīvaṃ sa vai prājño rūpaiṇyaikena pādayoḥ /
analyzed: sa aṃśa jīvam sa vai prājñaḥ rūpaiṇyā ekena pādayoḥ
hṛdi saṃsthāpya sūkṣma anya rūpeṇa ādāya cetanam

original: saliṅgaṃ sa yadā viśve naikībhūto bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: saliṅgam sa yadā viśve na ekībhūtaḥ bhaviṣyati
sa uṇuḥ prājñaḥ hṛdisthena ekībhūtaḥ bhavet yadi
dhyāna avasthām sañjanayati api jīvapati prabhuḥ
viśva ādayaḥ niraṃśānām avasthā tritaya pradāḥ
vinā ṛjūn sarva surān bhuvijātān jagadguruḥ
avasthā traya saṃyuktān kurvanti prājña pūrvakāḥ
ūrdhva loka sthitānām tu sadā jāgṛt pravartakaḥ
evam sūkṣmaśarīreṇa brahmāṇam asṛjat vibhuḥ
evam saṅkarṣaṇaḥ vāyoḥ jayāyām sūkṣma deha kṛt
vāsudevaḥ sarasvatyāḥ brahmāṇam akarot patim
saṅkarṣaṇaḥ tu bhāratyāḥ mukhya prāṇam vyadhāt patim
sarasvatyāḥ ca bhāratyāḥ pradyumnaḥ sūkṣma deha kṛt
tayoḥ tābhyām sūkṣma tanū vipa śeṣau babhūvatuḥ
veda ādi sarva nityānām arthānām jīva santateḥ
nityānām api sṛṣṭau hi tau ubhau ābhimāninau
te bhārye tau vinā kaḥ cana arthaḥ pi sthitim arhati
brahmā nirabhimāni tvāt śarīrī api aśarīravān
aśarīraḥ vāyuḥ abhram vidyut ityādi nāmabhiḥ
atha aniruddhaḥ kālena brahma vāyvoḥ sa bhāryayoḥ
tri catuḥ tu ekaviṃśati avāram sūkṣmaśarīra kṛt
tri vāram ekaviṃśat sa vāram sūkṣma tanu pradaḥ
tanum pradāt

original: aniruddho vipādīnāṃ nīlādīnāṃ tathaiva ca // PS_1,8.101 //
analyzed: aniruddhaḥ vipa ādīnām nīla ādīnām tathā eva ca
sauparṇī ādi trayāṇām ca kāla deśa krameṇa ca
indra ādi puṣkara antānām tātvikānām aśeṣatas
ekaviṃśati vāram tu aniruddhaḥ tu sūkṣma kṛt

original: yadā yasya ca sūkṣmāptistatpūrvakṣaṇa eva ca // PS_1,8.103 //
analyzed: yadā yasya ca sūkṣma āptiḥ tad pūrva kṣaṇe eva ca
tad tad jīva gaṇasya āsu liṅga vaiṣamyam iti api
pañca saptabhiḥ māsaiḥ bāhya mānena sarvaśas
tātvikānām tu devānām sūkṣma sṛṣṭiḥ abhūt hareḥ
sa satva tamasaḥ vaiṣamya avasthayā ayutām
jaḍa ākhyām prakṛtim samyak ceṣṭayāmāsa viśvasṛj

original: tato bindutrayaṃ jātaṃ satvaṃ ceti rajastamaḥ // PS_1,8.106 //
analyzed: tatas bindu trayam jātam satvam ca iti rajaḥ tamaḥ
ūrdhva deśe satva binduḥ rajaḥ binduḥ tatas api adhas
binduḥ sthūlaḥ ca ādyāḥ tri bindavaḥ
śrī bhū durgā iti rūpā mā kramā triguṇa māninī
viṣṇu brahma aśivaḥ ca iti bindu krama niyāmakāḥ
brahma vāyū sa bhāryau dvau tri rūpau abhimāninau

original: satvādibinduṣu śrīśca śritā naśvareṣu vai // PS_1,8.109 //
analyzed: sattva ādi binduṣu śrīḥ ca śritā naśvareṣu vai
rajaḥ tamaḥ bindu gata vaiṣamye jagat īśvaraḥ

original: brahmā saṅkarṣaṇātmā tu samudhṛtya rarakṣatuḥ // PS_1,8.110 //
analyzed: brahmā saṅkarṣaṇa ātmā tu samudhṛtya rarakṣatuḥ
tatas viṣṇuḥ satva bindu gataḥ saṃvardhayati ajaḥ

original: satvāvaraṇamādyaṃ ca cakre tatra vṛtodyamam // PS_1,8.111 //
analyzed: satva āvaraṇam ādyam ca cakre tatra vṛta udyamam
rajaḥ vindu gataḥ brahma nāmakaḥ tad adhastane
deśe dvitīya āvaraṇam rājasasya eva nāmakam
tamaḥ bindu sthitaḥ rudraḥ tāmasa āvaraṇam vyadhāt
tat hi dvitīya āvaraṇam rajasasya eva garbha gam
viṣṇu brahma śivau dvau dvau brahma vāyū sa bhāryakau
śrī bhū durga āsvādyam ādya tṛtīya āvaraṇeṣu hi
tad tad ātma sthūla deha triguṇeṣu abhimāninau

original: ādyaṃ śuklaṃ dvitīyaṃ tu raktaṃ nīlaṃ tṛtīyakam // PS_1,8.115 //
analyzed: ādyam śuklam dvitīyam tu raktam nīlam tṛtīyakam

original: mahadāvaraṇaṃ cakre brahmanāmā sa bhūpatiḥ // PS_1,8.116 //
analyzed: mahat āvaraṇam cakre brahma nāmā sa bhūpatiḥ
caturtha āvaraṇam tatra viṣṇu brahma śiva ātmakaḥ

original: jātābhyāṃ brahmavāyubhyāṃ jatau dvau dvau trirūpakau // PS_1,8.117 //
analyzed: jātābhyām brahma vāyubhyām jatau dvau dvau tri rūpakau
sa bhāryau brahma vāyū ca mahat tatva abhimāninau
ānanda nāmnaḥ tanayau brahma vāyū mahadgatau

original: rajoguṇasya vaiṣamyāt sarvāṃśena mataḥ kalāḥ // PS_1,8.119 //
analyzed: rajaḥ guṇasya vaiṣamyāt sarva aṃśena mataḥ kalāḥ
rājasa aṃśena indriyāṇām daśānām ca kalāḥ tathā
tāmasa aṃśena tanmātrāḥ kalāḥ pañca mahat gatāḥ
abhavantāḥ kalāḥ nityam ṣoḍaśa api sadātanaḥ
mahat tatvāt vikurvāṇāt brahmaṇaḥ sthūla dehataḥ
ānanda vaśagāt jātaḥ tu ahaṅkāraḥ trivṛt mataḥ
vaikārikaḥ taijasaḥ ca tāmasaḥ ca iti aham tridhā
udyat ravi prabhāva tvāt mahatā aham tri varṇakaḥ
vaikārikaḥ tu satva aṃśa jātaḥ śuklaḥ uda hṛtaḥ
taijasaḥ rājasa aṃśa utthaḥ rakta varṇaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: mano hṛṣīkāṇi mātrāḥ pūrvaṃ sūkṣmasvarūpataḥ // PS_1,8.124 //
analyzed: manaḥ hṛṣīkāṇi mātrāḥ pūrvam sūkṣma svarūpataḥ
mahat tatva gatāḥ ahi etāḥ ahaṅkāra āśritāḥ kramāt

original: gāyatrīśo vidhiḥ satve viriñcastu rajoguṇe // PS_1,8.125 //
analyzed: gāyatrī īśaḥ vidhiḥ sattve viriñcaḥ tu rajaḥ guṇe
sāvitrī īśaḥ bhavati addhā tamasi brahma nāmakaḥ
sarasvatī īśaḥ vasati tādṛś rūpa traya utthitau
tri rūpau vai brahma vāyū tad nāmānau mahat gatau
vidyā ādibhiḥ tribhiḥ tāsu gāyatrī ādiṣu tisṛṣu
kramāt brahmā ca vāyuḥ ca śeṣaḥ ca āsan hari icchayā

original: vipaśeṣau sabhāryā ca mahadrāje rajotridhār // PS_1,8.128 //
analyzed: vipa śeṣau sa bhāryā ca mahat rāje
hari ājñayā eva trividha ahaṃreṣu abhimāninaḥ
vidyā ādi utthaiḥ brahma pūrvaiḥ tribhiḥ rudraḥ tri rūpakaḥ
sa bhāryaḥ trividha ahaṅkṛt mānītu sthūla dehakaḥ
mahat tatvasya garbha stha mahat āvaraṇam matam
lakṣmī nārāyaṇaḥ brahma vāyū bhāryā samanvitau
ukteṣu vakṣyamāṇeṣu sarva tatveṣu sarvadā
vasanti tān vinā śeṣa vīśa ādyāḥ na kṣamā kvacid
vaikārikāt hi kurvāṇāt jagadguruḥ
sṛṣṭvā ahaṅkāra garbha stham cakāra puruṣa ṛṣabhaḥ

original: taijasāttu vikurvāṇāt hariṇā cendriyāṇi ca // PS_1,8.133 //
analyzed: taijasāt tu vikurvāṇāt hariṇā ca indriyāṇi ca
jñāna śaktīni pañca api karma śaktīni pañca ca

original: sṛṣṭā bhāvīni kāle tu sṛjyaṃ vai bhūtapañcakam // PS_1,8.134 //
analyzed: sṛṣṭāḥ bhāvīni kāle tu sṛjyam vai bhūta pañcakam
yatra yatra sthāpyam īśaḥ tatra tāni kramāt vyadhāt
ākāśam tu vikurvāṇāt sparśa mātram abhūt hareḥ
tatas vāyum samutpādya vāyu āvaraṇam ātanot
vāyoḥ ca eva vikurvāṇāt rūpa mātram hi abhūt tatas
tatas vahnim samutpādya vahni āvaraṇam ātanot
vahneḥ api vikurvāṇāt jala mātram vyadhāt hariḥ
tatas salilam utpādya jala āvaraṇam ācarat
jala āvṛtte vikurvāṇāt tu gandha mātrā bhavat vibhoḥ

original: tataḥ pṛthvīṃ sanirmāya cakre bhūmyāvṛtiṃ hariḥ // PS_1,8.139 //
analyzed: tatas pṛthvīm sa nirmāya cakre bhūmi āvṛtim hariḥ
iti śrī prakāśasaṃhitāyām prathama paricchede aṣṭamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī bhagavān uvāca
bhūmi āvaraṇa madhye tu brahmāṇḍa utpādana ucitam
yojanānām pañcaviṃśat koṭi dviguṇa saṃmitam
deśam urvaritam cakre bhagavān deśa kāla vid
asaṃsṛṣṭāni tatvāni brahmāṇḍa ūrdhva gatāni ca
aṇḍam tat antar nikhilam saṃsṛṣṭam parikīrtitam
ākāśa vāyu tejaḥ tu prāṇa nāmā akhila īśvaraḥ
anna nāmā pṛthivyām saḥ jala āvaraṇa gopi ca
guṇāḥ ime
sattva ādi āvṛttayā uṇḍa ūrdhvam sthitāḥ kṣmā āvaraṇāḥ kramāt
daśa uttarāḥ pravijñeyā tamasaḥ dviguṇam rajaḥ

original: rajaso dviguṇaṃ satvaṃ tato na prākṛtaṃ kvacit // PS_1,9.7 //
analyzed: rajasaḥ dviguṇam satvam tatas na prākṛtam kvacid
paścāt ūrdhva pradeśe tu aniruddha ātmakaḥ hariḥ
tasmāt haśa adhika tanuḥ saḥ upi āvaraṇa rūpakaḥ
tatas daśa adhikau pradyumna saṅkarṣaṇa nāmakau
vāsudevaḥ tad ūrdhva sthaḥ tad haśa aṃśa adhikaḥ mataḥ
tatas upi ananta guṇika ananta ananta pradeśake

original: lakṣmīnārāyaṇau vyāptau maryādā na tayoḥ kvacit // PS_1,9.10 //
analyzed: lakṣmī nārāyaṇau vyāptau maryādā na tayoḥ kvacid
śrīḥ deśa kālataḥ unantā a guṇa anantā na hi kvacid
aniruddhāt ṛjubhiḥ tu aparokṣibhiḥ
saha pūrva ukta kālena jātau dvau bhāryayā ayutau
tri rūpakau brahma vāyū triguṇa āvṛtti gau kramat
teṣām sattva ādyāḥ vṛttayaḥ sthūla dehāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
tatas nirūddha sūkṣma dehāt jātau vidhīraṇau
saḥ ṛjūkau catur vāram mahat tatva gatau matau

original: teṣāṃ mahattatvameva sthūladehaṃ vadanti hi // PS_1,9.14 //
analyzed: teṣām sthūla deham vadanti hi

original: tata strirūpau sa ṛjū tau dvau śāntīśajau kramāt /
analyzed: tatas tri rūpau saḥ ṛjū tau dvau śāntīśa jau kramāt

original: trividhāhaṅkṛtigatau sa bhāryau sa ṛjū ubhau // PS_1,9.15 //
analyzed: trividha ahaṅkṛti gatau sa bhāryau saḥ ṛjū ubhau
ekaviṃśat vāra jātau manaḥ ta tva ādi ta tva gau
aparokṣiṇām ṛjūnām ca śatasya aṇḍāt bahis janiḥ
evam rudra ādi tatvā īśāḥ sva saṃkhyāḥ niyama ucitāḥ

original: aṇḍādbahiḥ sṛṣṭiyogyāḥ dṛṣṭeśāḥ netare kvacit // PS_1,9.17 //
analyzed: aṇḍāt bahis sṛṣṭi yogyāḥ dṛṣṭa īśāḥ na itare kvacid
evam tri rūpataḥ jātāḥ prāk śānti īśena kālataḥ
sūkṣmeṇa ṛju janma anantaram śeṣa ādayaḥ trayaḥ
ṣaṣ nīla ādyāḥ kāla yogāt sāparṇī ādyāḥ krameṇa tu
ajeśa ajera śeṣyaiḥ tu ajerābhyām
rūpaiḥ ahaṅkāra tatva ātmaka sthūla śarīriṇaḥ
babhūvuḥ itareṣām tu pada yogya aparokṣiṇaḥ
te tathā eva mahat tatva ādi ekaviṃśati tatvake
tāvat rūpaiḥ sūkṣma tatva ajātau prāk anirūddhataḥ
manaḥ ādīni tatvāni sthūla dehāni bhejire
indra ādi puṣkara antāḥ ca sūkṣma tatva aniruddha jāḥ

original: ekaviṃśadvārataste āsan cittādi tatvagāḥ (āsa śritādita tatvagāḥ)/
analyzed: ekaviṃśat vārataḥ te āsan
tāni sthūla ādi
teṣām āsan krameṇa hi
prāk śānti īśa utthita indra ādyāḥ mana sthūla śarīriṇaḥ
dvi tri abdi pañca ṣaṣ vāram jātāḥ śrotra ādita tvagāḥ
sapta a ṣaṭa nava diś rudra vāra jātāḥ krameṇa tu
indra ādayaḥ puṣkara antāḥ vāc ādi sthūla dehakāḥ
tatas ca pañca vāra utthāḥ prāk śānti īśena kāla yogataḥ

original: śabdādi sthūladehetāḥ tato jātāstu dvādigāḥ // PS_1,9.26 //
analyzed: śabda ādi sthūla deha ītāḥ tatas jātāḥ tu dvi ādi gāḥ
atra uktānām surāṇām tu yādṛśa sthūla dehataḥ

original: bhāvīnāṃ ca padasthānāṃ tadvaśe sthitiriṣyate // PS_1,9.27 //
analyzed: bhāvīnām ca pada sthānām tad vaśe sthitiḥ iṣyate
aniruddhaḥ sūkṣma kartā prāk eṣām ucita sthalam
prāpya eva sṛṣṭim akarot ha īśa kāla artha tatva vid
sarva tatva sthitānām tu ṛjūnām sūkṣma deha gāḥ

original: satvāṇavo daśaguṇādhikā yānti ca sarvaśaḥ // PS_1,9.29 //
analyzed: satva aṇavaḥ daśaguṇa adhikāḥ yānti ca sarvaśas
rajaḥ tamaḥ uṇavaḥ pāda mātrataḥ yānti ca unnatim
bahu vāra jāta rudra indra ādi sūkṣma śarīra gāḥ
satva aṇavaḥ samāḥ ca upāḥ ca upacitāḥ tathā
rajaḥ tamaḥ uṇavaḥ rudra śakra ādi sura sūkṣma gāḥ
dvi tri abdhi pañca ṣaṣ sapta aṣṭa dharma śiva arkakaiḥ
bhāgatas viṃśat antaiḥ vṛddhim yāsyanti vai kramāt
tena eva tad kāraṇena pūrva pūrva ukta kāraṇaiḥ
uttara uttara rūpeṣu buddhi māndya ādi ca iṣyate
mahat ādiṣu ca aṇḍa ūrdhvam daitya āveśa ādi na iṣyate
yathā sūkṣma śarīreṣu abhivṛddham rajaḥ tamaḥ
bhavat teṣām tathā proktam sthūla deheṣu api sphuṭam

original: rajastamoṇavo vyaktiṃ yāsyantyeva tataḥ kramāt // PS_1,9.35 //
analyzed: rajaḥ tamaḥ oṇavaḥ vyaktim yāsyanti eva tatas kramāt
tatvāni pūrvarūpāṇi santi anantāni tāni tu
ṛjavaḥ sarva tatveṣu pratibhāta parāvarāḥ
sa bhāryāḥ nīca ucca sarva tatveṣu saṃsthitāḥ
rajaḥ tamaḥ ṇu upacaya ādhikyāt buddhi viparyayam

original: naiva yāsyanti te sarve hareḥ priyatamāḥsadā /
analyzed: nā eva yāsyanti te sarve hareḥ priyatamāḥ sadā
brahmā sarasvatī viṣṇoḥ sarva aṅgaiḥ sambhavanti hi
vāma nāḍī utthitau śeṣa vipau viṣṇoḥ śivaḥ tathā
nīla ādi āvāruṇī pūrvāḥ indra kāmau manobhavau
sa bhāryau ca guruḥ buddheḥ manuḥ ādyaḥ hi upasthataḥ
dakṣa uṅguṣṭāt kāmaputraḥ manavaḥ kāma pūrvakāḥ

original: marutaḥ śvāsataḥ sūryaḥ cakṣuṣaḥ candramā śruteḥ /
analyzed: marutaḥ śvāsataḥ sūryaḥ cakṣuṣaḥ candramā śruteḥ

original: dharmo hṛdaḥ sabhāryaśca varuṇo rasanotthitaḥ // PS_1,9.41 //
analyzed: dharmaḥ hṛdaḥ sa bhāryaḥ ca varuṇaḥ rasana utthitaḥ
bhṛguḥ tvacā agniḥ mukhataḥ jātāt meḍhrāt manuḥ gateḥ
viśvāmitra marīci ādyāḥ
skandāt bhava gaṇapatiḥ śambhu jayantau nābhi pādayoḥ
nāsatyau nāsikāḥ abhyantu viśvaksenaḥ mukhāt abhūt
padbhyāntu ṛbhavaḥrutavaḥ
rubhavaḥ
kaṇṭhāt dhik devāḥ tu karma jāḥ
rudrāḥ kapolāt lalāṭāt ca vasavat su icchayā vibhoḥ
ādityāḥ tu prakāśa utthāḥ danta paṅkti sthitāḥ api
sanaka ādyāḥ manaḥ jātāḥ pārśvatas
gaṅgā ādi nadyaḥ nāḍibhyaḥ pāda aṅguṣṭa ādibhiḥ prabhoḥ
anukta tātvikāḥ sarve kaṭākṣa utthāḥ budhāḥ matāḥ
śaniḥ śarīrataḥ puṣkara ādyā karmendriya udbhavāḥ
an ukta devatā bhāryāḥ bhartṛbhiḥ saha sambhavāḥ
ete hi aśeṣa tatveṣu
proktyaiḥ aṅgaiḥ kramāt jātaḥ vasanti hi abhimāninaḥ
sṛṣṭau evam bahis ca aṇḍāt muktau evam hareḥ vaśaḥ

original: jātau jātau hi yastasmāt kāmastudgatiḥsutaḥ // PS_1,9.49 //
analyzed: jātau jātau hi yaḥ tasmāt kāmaḥ tud gatiḥ sutaḥ
caṇḍaḥ jaya ādyāḥ dvāra sthāḥ śaśāṅkaḥ dhanapaḥ tathā
gandharva patayaḥ sarve jātiṣu api ca tātvikāḥ
puṣkara uccāḥ budha uccāḥ tu anuktāḥ te prakīrtitāḥ
evam śeṣasya
bahis aṇḍāt samastaśas
nava koṭyaḥ hi devānām satva tatva abhimāninaḥ
ajaḥ vipaḥ tatas nīlāt viṣaṭka vipa vallabhā
tatas indraḥ śaśī tasmāt prāṇa ādyāḥ māruta ukhilāḥ
indrāt dakṣaḥ tatas devarṣayaḥ vai nārada ādayaḥ
indrāt guruḥ tatas sūryaḥ jayau vighnaprabhuḥ tatas
abhavan ca smṛtāḥ sūryāt agniḥ agneḥ tu rudrakāḥ
ādityāvasavaḥ rakṣasā adhipaḥ
parjanya budha śani ādyāḥ puṣkara antāḥ samutthitāḥ
vasanti sarva tatveṣu garutmān mārga devatāḥ

original: uttamānāṃ ca guravaḥ nīcā uttamasevakāḥ // PS_1,9.56 //
analyzed: uttamānām ca guravaḥ nīcāḥ uttama sevakāḥ
iti śrī prakāśasaṃhitāyām prathama paricchede navamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī haṃsaḥ uvāca
sarvatra bhāviḥṛjavaḥ viṣṇoḥ vāyoḥ bhavanti hi

original: aṇḍāntarbahisthā vā nānairjanma labhanti te // PS_1,10.1 //
analyzed: aṇḍa antar bahisthāḥ vā nānaiḥ janma labhanti te
vyāmohāya asurāṇām tu anya jāḥ iva bhānti te
brahma aparokṣiṇaḥ sarve rudra ādyāḥ bhāvitātvikāḥ
ahaṅkāra īśvaraiḥ vāyu jātaiḥ jatāḥ bhavanti hi
uttamaiḥ sarva nīcānām sṛṣṭiḥ aṅga īrdha deśataḥ
evam kramāt sṛṣṭiḥ uktā vyutkrameṇa layaḥ smṛtaḥ
su prārabdhāḥ bahuvidhāḥ doṣa sambandha varjitāḥ

original: ye ye yathā yathā jātāḥ sṛṣṭikāle bhavanti hi // PS_1,10.5 //
analyzed: ye ye yathā yathā jātāḥ sṛṣṭi kāle bhavanti hi
guṇa sṛṣṭi uttaram jātāḥ sarve sthūla śarīriṇaḥ
aṃśa ānanda bala jñāna deśa kāla aparokṣakāḥ
evam caturdaśa mahā tāratamyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
vedeṣu deśa kāleṣu liṅga deheṣu ca akṣare
prakṛtau sarva jīvānām

original: aṃśā ṛjūnāṃ santyeva vipādyaṃśā na teṣu hi /
analyzed: aṃśāḥ ṛjūnām santi eva vipādi aṃśāḥ na teṣu hi
ahaṅkāre vipādi aṃśāḥ na tatra indra ādika aṃśakāḥ
nīca nīca amara manaḥ deha ādiṣu sura uttamāḥ
vasanti aṃśaiḥ na nīcāḥ tu sva uttameṣu viśanti hi
aṇḍāt antar bahis tu evam aṃśa utthā tāratamya dhīḥ
vidheḥ sarva aṅga sāyujyam vāṇyāḥ vāci manasi api
sva utpati aṅgeṣu devānām sāyujyam diśati īśvaraḥ
uttamānām mahā ānandāḥ nīca nīceṣu saṅga tāḥ
śata aṃśāt avarā nīca ānandāt uttama gāmi tat
śata aṃśāt uttamā muktau śvetadvīpa ādiṣu sphuṭam
triṣu sthāneṣu śrībhāge cit mātra ānandam ūrjitam
bhū durgā bhāgayoḥ prāptavya ānanda dam śuddha sātvikaiḥ
dehaiḥ bhoga ucita ananta śuddha sātvika vastubhiḥ
bhū durgābhyām kalpitaiḥ taiḥ bhagavān bhakta santateḥ
uttamānām sa bahulam nīcānām alpam eva ca

original: tattadyogya nijānandaṃ dadāti puruṣaḥ svarāṭ // PS_1,10.16 //
analyzed: tad tad yogya nija ānandam dadāti puruṣaḥ svarāj
muktau tu

original: na vidyate hi svānandapūrṇasya na punarjaniḥ // PS_1,10.17 //
analyzed: na vidyate hi sva ānanda pūrṇasya na punarjaniḥ
duḥkha ajñāna anādikam bhūyas bhagna liṅgasya nā iṣyate

original: śataśabdo daśasahasraparaṃ prāptaṃ vadanti hi // PS_1,10.18 //
analyzed: śata śabdaḥ daśa sahasra param prāptam vadanti hi
uttamānām balam bhūri nīcānām alpam eva tu
garbha udaka āgataḥ śeṣaḥ mūrdhnā ekena akhilam bhuvam
sa dvīpa abdhi sarit śailām dhatte sarṣapa vat sadā

original: taṃ vai śeṣaṃ sahasrāsyaṃ vāyukūrmo mahābalaḥ // PS_1,10.20 //
analyzed: tam vai śeṣam sahasra āsyam vāyukūrmaḥ mahā balaḥ
dhatte puccha agratas śakra pūrvāḥ śeṣāt bala avarāḥ

original: bahavo gomahiṣyādyā eka kuñjara bhojane // PS_1,10.21 //
analyzed: bahavaḥ go mahiṣī ādyāḥ eka kuñjara bhojane
yāvat tāvat kūrma hasti tā upyete hi koṭiśas

original: militā api nāgena yoddhumarhati na kvacitu // PS_1,10.22 //
analyzed: militāḥ api nāgena yoddhum arhati na kvacid tu
tathā uttama suraiḥ nīca surāḥ koṭi sahasraśas
militāḥ prathanena īśāḥ kim umartyāḥ tu rākṣasāḥ
atas balena sarveṣām tāratamyam vivecitam
an ālocya ananta kalpeṣu aṇḍa antar bahis āsthitam
atītam vartamānam ca anāgatam vastu sañcayam
sadā kara tala āmalaka vat vetti viṣṇu anugrahāt
anādi nitya anadhikān nirviśeṣāt anantarān
saḥ api nārāyaṇa guṇān ālocya api ati kālataḥ
ananta kalyāṇa guṇa pūrṇasya ananta bhāgataḥ

original: vibhaktānantabhāgaikabhāga jñaptau na hi kṣamaḥ // PS_1,10.27 //
analyzed: vibhakta ananta bhāga eka bhāga jñaptau na hi kṣamaḥ
vinā īśvara guṇa jñāne jñānam ṛju gaṇasya hi
atīta anāgata jagat viṣayīkaraṇe kṣamam
ālocya vaiṣṇava jñāne pi adhikam sarva jīvataḥ
vipa śeṣa ādika jñānam sarvadā ālocanāt api
sva uttamaiḥ bhinna jagataḥ viṣayīkaraṇe kṣamam

original: na bhavedekadeśena jānantyete na cānyathā // PS_1,10.30 //
analyzed: na bhavet eka deśena jānanti ete na ca anyathā
jaḍam ca acetanam vā api śiva ādyāḥ puṣkara antimāḥ
liṅga baddhāḥ pada sthāḥ ca bhāvinaḥ ca aparokṣiṇaḥ
aṇḍa antare bahis ca api tātvikāḥ bahu rūpataḥ

original: sthitā api na jānanti sākalyena jagadgatam // PS_1,10.32 //
analyzed: sthitāḥ api na jānanti sākalyena jagadgatam
anādi sarva jīvānām jñānam tat vividham matam

original: svārūpikaṃ ca bāhyañca nityaṃ svārūpikaṃ matam // PS_1,10.33 //
analyzed: svārūpikam ca bāhyam ca nityam svārūpikam matam

original: ajanyaṃ śāśvataṃ viṣṇoḥ bandhasya vaśagaṃ sadā /
analyzed: ajanyam śāśvatam viṣṇoḥ bandhasya vaśagam sadā
jīvaṅga īśa adhīna māyā vaśagam krama yogataḥ
sādhanena vyañjyamānam āmukti antam tatas param
eka prakāram ajñānam rahitam sva uttama āśritāt
jñānāt śataguṇa nyūna ṛm iśvare vā jagati alam
ananta veda ukta guṇān viṣṇeḥ jānāti padmabhūḥ

original: padastho vā vimukto vā tadanye tadguṇasthitāḥ /
analyzed: pada sthaḥ vā vimuktaḥ vā tad anye tad guṇa sthitāḥ
krameṇa eva śatam nyūna jñānam viṣṇoḥ upāsakāḥ
prākṛta uprākṛta śarīra āśritasya ṛjoḥ sadā

original: manasyanityaṃ yajjanyaṃ punaḥ punarapi sphuṭam // PS_1,10.38 //
analyzed: manasi anityam yat janyam punar punar api sphuṭam
tad bāhye vṛtti rupam ca yathārtham sarvadā api ca

original: teṣāṃ pañcavidhajñānaṃ kvacideva na sarvadā // PS_1,10.39 //
analyzed: teṣām pañcavidha jñānam kvacid eva na sarvadā
daitya āveśa ādi śūnyāḥ te sadā durviṣaya ujjhitāḥ
sākṣi indriyaiḥ saha api etat liṅga sūkṣma indriya āvṛtaiḥ
sthūla indriyaiḥ su viṣaya āsaktaiḥ prātyakṣakī matiḥ

original: yadārthaiva tayā doṣaśūnyā sadyuktijā matiḥ // PS_1,10.41 //
analyzed: tayā doṣa śūnyā sat yukti jā matiḥ
yukti janyam tu yat jñānam ānumānikam īritaḥ
pratyakṣam anumānam ca āgamaḥ tasya sādhanam
yathārthā eva tathā veda śāstra artha śravaṇāt api
manaḥ jātam sva āgama jam yathā artha jñānam eva hi
deśāt avara deśe tu kramāt tattveṣu saṃśritāḥ
tatva vyāpāra kāle tu svarūpa ucita śaktayaḥ
yathā āgama samudbhūtam trividham parikīrtitam
jñānam manaḥ samudbhūtam bāhya kāryam iti īritam
yat pratyakṣa anumānam ca āgamaḥ tasya sādhanam
jīvaḥ pramātā viṣayāḥ arthāḥ te kāraṇa amatāḥ
rūdra ādīnām tu yat jhānam bāhyam manasi sambhavam
pratyakṣa ādyaiḥ trabhiḥ sadbhiḥ sādhanaiḥ api anityakam
kvacid yathārtham ayathārtham kvacid bhavet
devadāsāḥ krama avarāḥ
deva gandharva paryantāḥ sa aṃśāḥ sarve prakīrtitāḥ
niraṃśāḥ te sadā amartya gandharva ādyāḥ stṛṇān imāḥ

original: jīvā eṣāṃ svarūpantu jñanaṃ nityaṃ yathārthakam /
analyzed: jīvāḥ eṣām sva rūpam tu jñanam nityam yathārthakam
uttama uttamataḥ nyūnam ayathārtha ādikam kramāt

original: bāhyaṃ janyamanityaṃ ca yathārthaṃ prāyaśaḥ sadā /
analyzed: bāhyam janyam anityam ca yathārtham prāyaśas sadā

original: riśvare vā jagati vā kramādalpāvagāhi ca // PS_1,10.51 //
analyzed: riśvare vā jagati vā kramāt alpa avagāhi ca
iti jñāne tāratamyam deveṣu uccāvaceṣu alam
mahat gaṇa trayeṣu aṃśāḥ ṛjūnām santi ca unnate
deśe tatra na rudra ādi deva aṃśāḥ tad adhastane
deśe haṅkṛti rudra ādi devāṃśāḥ santi sarvadā
tatra indra ādyāḥ na tiṣṭhanti tatas upi avara deśa gāḥ
bhūta avyatīnām maryādā yad deśe yādṛśī īritā
kalā ṣoḍaśa tad gāḥ ca tad tadā vṛtti santatāḥ
manaḥ śabdaḥ śrotra vācām kalāḥ tu ākāśa santatāḥ
tvak sparśa pāṇi saṃjñāḥ tu kalā vāyu samāśritāḥ
netra rūpa aṅghri saṃjñāḥ tu kalāḥ tejaḥ śarīra gāḥ
rasanā rasa guhyānām kalā vāri samāśritāḥ
manaḥ mātra indriya kalāḥ bhūteṣu krama yogataḥ
tad adhikārāḥ hariṇā śakra ādyāḥ puṣkara antimāḥ
sūkṣma sthūla utpatti kāle uttamāḥ tu ūrdhva deśa gāḥ
nīca nīcāḥ tu ucca deśa sthita ucca ucca sura āśrayāt
deśāt avara deśe tu kramāt tattveṣu saṃsthitāḥ
tatva vyāpāra kāle tu svarūpa ucita śaktayaḥ
iti deśa ucita mahā tāratamyam vadanti hi
deva mānena abda śatam paurvāparya vyavasthayā
ṛjūnām ca janiḥ proktā sahasra abda antarā matāḥ
vipādyāḥ tu tathā indra ādyāḥ daśa sāhasra vatsaraiḥ
kramāt paurvāparya jātāḥ kālāt nīca ucca bhāvinaḥ
atha sarvasya aparokṣa tāratamyam vivicyate
tṛṇa ādi sarva jīvānām sva rūpa uddhāre āgate
hariḥ ca śrī brahma vāyū sa bhāryau ca tad ājñayā
etad anya dvīpa varṣa jāyāmānān hi sarvaśas
sva karma vaśagān svarga antarikṣa dharān caran
nānā yoni gatān jīvān a tala ādya adhara sthitān
uddhartu kāmaḥ bhagavān bhārate janayiṣyati
tatra mānuṣa yoni utthān tatra api brāhmaṇa uttamān
tatra sarva svarūpa uru vyakti kāraka karmaṇā
saṃyojya sarva sat yogya jñāna dāna guru uttamān
bhinna deśe bhinna kāle yojayati akhilam hariḥ
tṛṇa ādi martya paryanta gandharvāḥ te hi anantaśas
niraṃśāḥ te pratīka ālambanāḥ te karma yoginaḥ
deva gandharva pūrvā astu ājāna ja antā samastaśas
sa aṃśāḥ krama ucca jñāna yoginaḥ
pratīka stham śarīra stham paśyantī iti tathā āhvayāḥ
pratīkāt bahis īśasya darśānāt karmadevatāḥ
apratīka ālambanāḥ ca prāyas vijñāna yoginaḥ
eṣām aṇḍa antare janma a parokṣa ādi praśasyate

original: niraṃśāḥ pakvakāle tu utkrāmyaiva maharādigāḥ // PS_1,10.73 //
analyzed: niraṃśāḥ pakva kāle tu utkrāmya eva mahar ādi gāḥ

original: eṣāṃ laye svottameṣu praveśo naiva vidyate /
analyzed: eṣām laye sva uttameṣu praveśaḥ na eva vidyate
deva gandharva pūrvāṇām bhūmau utkramaṇāt layaḥ
mahālaye sva uttameṣu praveśaḥ lūkṣma dehataḥ
utkrama an utkramān yoginaḥ uhya tatva īśvara vaśān jaguḥ
puṣkara antā tātvikāḥ ca kvāpi na utkramaṇāt layāḥ

original: yānti sthūlaśarīraiste svottameṣu viśanti hi // PS_1,10.76 //
analyzed: yānti sthūla śarīraiḥ te sva uttameṣu viśanti hi
tān anukramaṇāni āhuḥ yoginaḥ bhakti yoginaḥ

original: satkarmajñānabhaktī ca sarveṣāṃ sarvadāpi hi // PS_1,10.77 //
analyzed: sat karma jñāna bhaktī ca sarveṣām sarvadā api hi
avaśyakāḥ te sarve api tad tad prācuryataḥ tathā
niraṃśāḥ sat sādhanāya ucita janma sahasrataḥ

original: jñānantu daśabhiḥ prāpya sadbhaktiṃ tribhirāpya ca /
analyzed: jñānam tu daśabhiḥ prāpya sat bhaktim tribhiḥ āpya ca

original: dṛṣṭvā hṛdisthaṃ mucyante hyataste karmayoginaḥ // PS_1,10.79 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā hṛdistham mucyante hi atas te karma yoginaḥ
sat karma kṛtvā niṣkāmyam labhanti guru santatī
atātvikāḥ deva dāsāḥ sat karma śata janmabhiḥ
kṛtvā daśa sahasra uru janmabhiḥ jñānam āpya ca
bhaktim tri śatakaiḥ āpya mucyante jñāna yoginaḥ
atas te karmadevatāḥ tad ūrdhvam bhakti yoginaḥ
tṛṇa ādyāḥ sva hṛdistham tam paśyanti ucita janmabhiḥ
dīpa kānti viśiṣṭa īśam na devān na eva martya gam

original: ghaṭikārdhaṃ śarīre vā muktau śaktistu tādṛśī // PS_1,10.83 //
analyzed: ghaṭikā ardham śarīre vā muktau śaktiḥ tu tādṛśī

original: teṣārm idṛśa evaṃ syāt apararokṣo hi nādhikaḥ // PS_1,10.84 //
analyzed: idṛśaḥ evam syāt apara rokṣaḥ hi na adhikaḥ
rāma kṛṣṇa ādi rūpāṇi bahis paśyanti api kvacid
mānuṣa tvena paśyanti aparokṣena saṃsmṛtaḥ
sthūla hṛd ga aparokṣāḥ tu bāhyaḥ tāt aparokṣakāḥ
sva svarūpa stha jīva ābha svatantrasya ca darśanam
sva rūpa ābhyā aparokṣaḥ tu sarveṣām evam eva hi
paśyanti krimi kīṭa ādyāḥ pradīpa prabhayā harim
sva rūpa cakṣuṣā adṛṣṭiḥ aparokṣaḥ iti īryate
veda deśa akṣara ukālaḥ jīva īśau prākṛta indriyaiḥ

original: na vedyā hi svarūpeṇa vedyā eva prakīrtitāḥ // PS_1,10.89 //
analyzed: na vedyāḥ hi sva rūpeṇa vedyāḥ eva prakīrtitāḥ
ratna vat bhāsure liṅge tu

original: jīvasya cakṣuṣī vyakto bhavataḥ svena paśyati /
analyzed: jīvasya cakṣuṣī vyaktaḥ bhavataḥ svena paśyati
tejaḥ maya sva rūpa stham sthūla hṛd gam krameṇa tu
yava mātram kīṭa ādyāḥ badarī mitam
aṅguṣṭa agra mitam vṛṣāḥ pradīpa daśa sannibham
harim paśyanti ghaṭikā mitam kālam ramāpatim

original: samaṃ dīpaṃ cidānandaṃ cidānandātmakaṃ mṛgāḥ // PS_1,10.93 //
analyzed: samam dīpam cit ānandam cit ānanda ātmakam mṛgāḥ

original: khagāśca paśavo gāvaḥ hṛdgaṃ jīvagataṃ harim /
analyzed: khagāḥ ca paśavaḥ gāvaḥ hṛd gam jīva gatam harim
ātmā iti iśvaraḥ
vidyut vat mānuṣāḥ vidyuḥ daśa vidyut mitam nṛpāḥ
rājānaḥ tad viguṇa ābham sūrya maṇḍala vat surāḥ
gandharvāḥ pitaraḥ sūrya śata sannibham īśvaram
gopyaḥ kṛṣṇa aṅga saṅga arhāḥ pañca sāhasra sūrya bham
ājāna jā daśa sāhasa sra arka ābham tu agnijāḥ api
catur lakṣa adhika aśīti lakṣa jīva gaṇeṣu api

original: daśaiva puruṣāḥ proktāstātvikāsteṣu pañca ca // PS_1,10.98 //
analyzed: daśā eva puruṣāḥ proktāḥ tātvikāḥ teṣu pañca ca
parjanyāt avarāḥ pañca puṣkarāt uttamāḥ matāḥ
sa strīkāḥ soma hīnāḥ aṇḍāt antar bahis sthitāḥ
triṃśat cāraṇa rakṣāṃsi saptatiḥ sarva jātiṣu
antarāle tu padma utthā brahmā yāvat adhitiṣṭhati
tāvat saṃvatsara gata prati prati dineṣu api
sāṃśāḥ atātvikāḥ sarvesaṃkhyayā vakṣyamāṇayā
mitāḥ tu pratikalpe pi pada sthāḥ hi aparokṣiṇaḥ
urvaśī ādyā ahi apsarasaḥ śataṃśā sva su aṣṭa saṃkhyayā
mitāḥ a ja an ajaiḥ tulyāḥ karma deva samā parāḥ

original: śataṃ pitṝṇāṃ saptaiva teṣūrvaśyādibhiḥ samāḥ // PS_1,10.103 //
analyzed: śatam pitṝṇām sapta eva teṣu urvaśī ādibhiḥ samāḥ
anye ājāna jebhyaḥ tu nyūnāḥ tebhyaḥ varāḥ kramāt

original: gandharvāstu śataṃ teṣu aṣṭau tulyāśca karmajaiḥ // PS_1,10.104 //
analyzed: gandharvāḥ tu śatam teṣu aṣṭau tulyāḥ ca karma jaiḥ
śata koṭi mitāḥ sarve ṛṣayaḥ viṃśat uttamāḥ

original: teṣveva tāvatviṣṭābhiḥ śatakaṃ karmajaiḥ samam // PS_1,10.105 //
analyzed: teṣu eva tāvatu iṣṭābhiḥ śatakam karma jaiḥ samam
tad anye ājāna jebhyaḥ tulyāḥ agni sutāḥ api
dvi aṣṭau sahasrāṇi śatan triṃśat cāraṇa rakṣasām
sādhyasiddhāḥ tathā anyāḥ tu saptatiḥ sarva jātiṣu

original: śataṃ siddhājānajākhyā paśyanti hṛdi jīvagam // PS_1,10.107 //
analyzed: śatam paśyanti hṛdi jīvagam
koṭi sūrya prabham karma devāḥ hṛd gam bahis sthitam
dvi sapta loka samitam te pratīka avalambanāḥ
martyāḥ dvi ghaṭikā mātram tri nāḍī antam nṛpa uttamāḥ
tathā mānuṣa gandharvāḥ caturnāḍī antam īśvaram
ṣaṇṇāḍī antam su gandharvāḥ gopya āyāma antam añjasā
śatona śata koṭyaḥ tu ṛṣayaḥ agni sutāḥ api
kālam jagadgurum
paśyanti karma devāḥ tu madhyāhna antam para īśvaram
sva uttama spardhayā ahīnāḥ duṣprārabdha vivarjitāḥ
bhāva rūpa ajñāna śūnyāḥ daitya āveśa vivarjitāḥ
pūrva ukta kāntyā akāle tam paśyanti jagat īśvaram
pūrva ukta doṣa rahitāḥ tātvikāḥ sarvadā harim
paśyanti diva paryantāḥ doṣāḥ ete hi nīcakaiḥ
uttameṣu uttameṣu alpāḥ tathā ca anyatara amatāḥ

original: brahmaṇo doṣa sambandho na kvāpi kva cad dṛśyate /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ doṣa sambandhaḥ na kvāpi kva cad dṛśyate
rājānaḥ martya gandharva pūrvāḥ ṣaṭdaśa pūrvakān
śatam daśa sahasrān ca lakṣa koṭi mitān guṇān
viṣṇoḥ guṇān arbudān ca sarvān api tatas adhikān
ananta veda ukta guṇān brahma upāsyati na itaraḥ

original: martyoccā hṛdi devāṃśca padasthā pīṭhadevatāḥ // PS_1,10.117 //
analyzed: martya uccā hṛdi devān ca pada sthā pīṭha devatāḥ
tathā āvaraṇa gān devān paśyanti api ca maṇḍalam
suṣumnām sapta kamalāni api tat gaharīśvare
sthāneśam ca eva mūleśam rājānaḥ martya gāyakāḥ
iḍā piṅgala nāḍi sthān krama uccān sarva deha gān
tatvā īśām rūpāṇi ani
khilāni api
dhyātvā upāsya vimucyante devāḥ ājāna ja āhvayāḥ
ime te ca pratīka stha hari pāda avalambinaḥ

original: karmadevā atatveśā api rūpāṇi sarvaśaḥ // PS_1,10.121 //
analyzed: karma devāḥ a tatva īśāḥ api rūpāṇi sarvaśas
upāsya api virāj rūpam mucyante samupāsya ca

original: apratīkālambanāste tu karmadevāḥ surā api // PS_1,10.122 //
analyzed: apratīka ālambanāḥ te tu karma devāḥ surāḥ api
tyakta liṅgasya muktasya tṛṇa kīṭa ādikasya ca
sva rūpa dā iha te sarve daśa yojana santatā
vṛkṣa ādīnām mṛga ādīnām tatas dviguṇa ruj bhavet
vimuktānām tu martyānām śūdra ādīnām atas param
eka dvi tri catuṣpāda adhika ruj santatāḥ sadā
rājanya amartya gandharvāḥ tatas dvi tri adhika prabhāḥ
paritas meru tulya tviṣ deva gandharva santateḥ
pitaraḥ muktāḥ bhuvarloka anta kāntayaḥ
gopyaḥ kṛṣṇa aṅghri saṅga arhāḥ upasantati dīptayaḥ
ājana ajāta tsamāḥ ca svarga antā tad prakāśinaḥ

original: yasya yasya ca jīvasya prakāśo yatra ceritaḥ /
analyzed: yasya yasya ca jīvasya prakāśaḥ yatra ca īritaḥ
daivāt bahis dṛṣṭi gataḥ bhāti martya ucca vat hariḥ
na saccidānanda tanuḥ bāhya dṛś gocaraḥ bhavet
dṛṣṭvā upāsya vimucyante karma devāḥ virāj tanum
tādṛś jotiḥ tāvat antam viṣṇum paśyati cakṣuṣā

original: svārūpikeṇa bādhyena naiva paśyanti ceśvaram // PS_1,10.130 //
analyzed: svārūpikeṇa bādhyena nā eva paśyanti ca īśvaram
paśyanti na eva upāsyanti brahmāṇḍe vyāptam īśvaram
puṣkara ādyāḥ tu śakra antāḥ pūrva ukta akhila rūpiṇam
aṇḍāt bahis pṛthivī ādi manaḥ tatu ādi santateḥ

original: dṛṣṭvādhyātvopāsya sarve muktiṃ yāsyanti kālataḥ // PS_1,10.132 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā a dhyātvā upāsya sarve muktim yāsyanti kālataḥ
ahaṅkāra gatam draṣṭum īśāna upāsane kṣamāḥ
puṣkara ādyāḥ mahendra antāḥ kramāt adhika kāntayaḥ
koṭi arbuda arka ābham devam vāmadeva ādayaḥ harim
upāsya ahaṅkāra tatva vyāpta sat tanum īśvaram

original: mucyate ca mahattatve tamasyapi tataṃ harim /
analyzed: mucyate ca mahat tatve tamasi api tatam harim
na iṣyanti tamasi sthitam
ananta arka rucā sattva āvṛti antam vyāptam avyayam
upāsya gīḥ muktim eti tatas api adhika ruj tatas
vāsudeva āvaraṇa gam brahmā paśyati na itaraḥ

original: yāvatpaśyanti taṃ jīvaṃ tāvatsāmānyaruk sa hi // PS_1,10.137 //
analyzed: yāvat paśyanti tam jīvam tāvat sāmānya ruj sa hi
yau an upāsyaḥ vai viṣṇuḥ tāvat teṣām viśeṣa bhā

original: brahmaṇo naiva sāmānyarugviśeṣaprabho hi saḥ // PS_1,10.138 //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ nā eva sāmānya ruj viśeṣa prabhaḥ hi saḥ
ati alpa sukha rūpa aṃśāḥ jīvānām yogyatā avasan
yādṛśī bhāramāyāḥ tu vyāptāyāḥ sarva deśa gā
bhānu prabhā gatā dīpa prabhā yadvat na rocate
tathā viṣṇuprabhā anunnāmā aprabhā nā eva rocate
evam nīca prabhāsu occa prabhāsu pravilīyate

original: tathāpi ca yathārthajñā muktāptai tatvavettamāḥ // PS_1,10.141 //
analyzed: tathā api ca yathā artha jñāḥ mukta āptaiḥ tatva vettamāḥ

original: yo yāvatīṃ harau kāntiṃ vetyasau tacchatāṃśabhāk /
analyzed: yaḥ yāvatīm harau kāntim vā iti asau tad śata aṃśa bhāj
prabhāti eva prakāśasya tāratamyam vid uttamāḥ
iti śrī prakāśasaṃhitāyām prathama paricchede daśamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī haṃsaḥ uvāca
puruṣeṣu brahma vāyū vipādiṣu ramāpatiḥ

original: puṃ rūpeṇa viśeṣāveśādikaṃ sarvadā hariḥ // PS_1,11.1 //
analyzed: pum rūpeṇa viśeṣa āveśa ādikam sarvadā hariḥ
karoti strīṣu mā
svarūpataḥ
viśeṣa āveśa kṛt viṣṇuḥ yogyatāya anuyogataḥ
āviṣṭaḥ tu uttameṣu ekaḥ viśeṣa ātmā tu taiḥ suraiḥ svakaiḥ
jīvaiḥ asādhya su mahat karma kāra yati īśvaraḥ
uttama uttama jīveṣu āvede
śaḥ yādṛś iṣyate
na tathā nīca jīveṣu tasmāt te hi alpa śaktayaḥ
pada stheṣu sureṣu evam āveśaḥ nā eva mukti gaḥ
na niraṃśeṣu ca āveśāḥ sa aṃśeṣu āja anajeṣu api
vāyoḥ sarva avatāreṣu viśeṣa āveśaḥ eva hi
sva rūpa liṅga sūkṣmeṣu sthūla deheṣu sarvadā
rakṣā artham sarva tatveṣu sarvadā vasati īśvaraḥ

original: āveśo(tha) na tathā viṣṇorviśeṣākhyaḥ sureṣvapi // PS_1,11.7 //
analyzed: āveśaḥ utha na tathā viṣṇoḥ viśeṣa ākhyaḥ sureṣu api
kvacid vyaktim kvacid rāsam sapta āveśa uṇḍa jeṣu api
aṇḍāt ūrdhvam sa t ādese
ṛjuṣu ca iṣyate
nīceṣu uttama devānām āveśaḥ kvacid iṣyate
bala artham asureṣu
āveśam kurvati prabhuḥ
ādāt ājñā tena dṛptā suraiḥ naṣṭā hari icchayā

original: bhavanti nityadā viṣṇuḥ sureṣvantarhito hi saḥ // PS_1,11.10 //
analyzed: bhavanti nityadā viṣṇuḥ sureṣu antarhitaḥ hi saḥ
tṛṇa ādi brahma paryanteṣu api māyā harau api
tathā api nīca nīceṣu guṇāḥ dīpa upama āśritāḥ
sādharaṇāḥ sajātīyāḥ vijātīyāḥ vilakṣaṇāḥ
svantantra tvam sva ramaṇa tvam su guṇa vyāpti tā tathā
para apekṣā ādi śūnya tva rāhityam
sṛṣṭi ādi kartṛ tā ādyāḥ tu vijātīyāḥ harau matāḥ

original: akṣa(ra)tvādayo māyāṃ naiva te brahmaṇi sphuṭam // PS_1,11.14 //
analyzed: akṣara tva ādayaḥ māyām nā eva te brahmaṇi sphuṭam
ṛju tvam prākṛta ucca tvam nitya artheṣu abhimāni tā
