sarva ādhipatya tā liṅga dehe kārya vaśītva tā
niṣkāmya yogya tā pūrvāḥ vijātīyāḥ iti smṛtāḥ

original: ete harīrayoḥ proktāḥ naiva te vipaśeṣayoḥ // PS_1,11.16 //
analyzed: ete harīrayoḥ proktāḥ na eva te vipa śeṣayoḥ
evam eṣu uttameṣu uktāḥ vijātīyāḥ na nīca gāḥ
sati ananta tvataḥ tu eṣām uktiḥ nā eva hi śakyate
karmadevān samārabhya brahmā teṣu śarīriṣu
cakra śaṅkha ādayaḥ rekhāḥ śara śakti aṅkuśa ādayaḥ
prāsa tomara tiryaṅka halabhāgya umṛta ādayaḥ
govindyā tila godhūma chatra cāmara toraṇāḥ
dhvaja ūrdhva vyajana ākārāḥ āndolā gata vāninaḥ
garutmat śeṣa mukharā rekhā dakṣake pade

original: puṃsāntu dakṣiṇepāde strīṇāṃ vāme vasanti hi // PS_1,11.21 //
analyzed: puṃsām tu dakṣiṇe pāde strīṇām vāme vasanti hi
dhenu śaṅkha gadā rekhāḥ vāme puṃsām śubhāḥ matāḥ
nīceṣu aṅga nyūna rūpāḥ uttameṣu ucca rūpakāḥ
sampūrṇāḥ sarva dā rekhāḥ prāṇe māyām harau api
tatra api ucca kramā uccā asti rekhāḥ ca ucca tva hetavaḥ
ṣaṇṇavati aṅgulaḥ yaḥ tu nyagrodha parimaṇḍalaḥ
catur hastaḥ dvātriṃśat lakṣaṇaiḥ yutaḥ
śarīra aṅgeṣu sādhūnām pañca sthāneṣu dīrgha tām

original: hṛsvatvaṃ pañcasu tathā saptasthāneṣu raktimā // PS_1,11.25 //
analyzed: pañcasu tathā sapta sthāneṣu raktimā

original: ṣaḍaunnatyaṃ yasya samyak pṛthutā triṣu yasya tu /
analyzed: ṣaṣ aunnatyam yasya samyak pṛthu tā triṣu yasya tu

original: gambhīratā ca laghutā triṣu sthāneṣu bhāti vai // PS_1,11.26 //
analyzed: gambhīra tā ca laghu tā triṣu sthāneṣu bhāti vai

original: sa sulakṣaṇasampannaḥ sa tu jñānaprado gurūḥ /
analyzed: sa su lakṣaṇa sampannaḥ sa tu jñāna pradaḥ

original: martyottameṣu vai viṃśallakṣaṇāni bhavanti hi // PS_1,11.27 //
analyzed: martya uttameṣu vai viṃśat lakṣaṇāni bhavanti hi
krameṇa ekaikaśas vṛddhāni api salakṣaṇāni ca
sarvāṇi paripūrṇāni lakṣaṇāni vidhīrayoḥ
śarīre ca svarūpe ca sarva sat sādhaneṣu alam
ati bhivyaktāni caḥ
vā ucceṣu avyaktāni itareṣu ca
atha sṛṣṭau tāratamyam śṛṇuṣva prāk atha uttare
ātma sūkṣma guṇa sthūla sṛṣṭayaḥ prāk udīritāḥ
pañca mātra avyakta bhūtāḥ vṛtti pañcakataḥ kramāt
prāk ukta bhāva rūpa ajñāna pañcakam abhūt tatas
bhrāntiḥ bhautika dehānām vyakta ayoniṣu api kvacid

original: aṇḍādūrdhvamiyaṃ sṛṣṭi rasaṃ sṛṣṭeti kīrtyate // PS_1,11.32 //
analyzed: aṇḍāt ūrdhvam iyam sṛṣṭi rasam sṛṣṭā iti kīrtyate
mahat ādi aṇḍa paryantaḥ sargaḥ iti abhidhīyate
saṃsṛṣṭa maṇḍam samastam samprakīrtitam
anusargam janāḥ prāhuḥ aṇḍa antar yat aja utthitam
mahat ādyāḥ surāḥ sarve pi aṇḍa sṛṣṭau aśaktayaḥ
astuvan puruṣam sārdham saptatriṃśat śarad mayam

original: kālaṃ tato hariḥ sarvatatvajātaṃ tadantakaiḥ // PS_1,11.35 //
analyzed: kālam tatas hariḥ sarva tatva jātam tad antakaiḥ
bhāgyaiḥ ādāya saṃyojyaiḥ ekībhūtam karoti ajaḥ

original: tacca tredhā vibhajyeśaḥ teṣvādyaṃ bhāgamīśvaraḥ // PS_1,11.36 //
analyzed: tat ca tredhā vibhajya īśaḥ teṣu ādyam bhāgam īśvaraḥ
gṛhītvā viṣṇu nāma īśaḥ tat nigīrya śriyam svayam
vīryam tad ātmakam tasyām ādhatta puruṣeśvaraḥ
pṛthivī āvṛtti madhye tu suṣuve iṇḍam vidheḥ tanum
pañcāśat koṭi vistāram aṇḍam sṛṣṭvā jagadguruḥ
sarva cit caitya sahitaḥ vīrāṇām aṇḍam āviśat
brahmāṇḍe jala sampūrṇe sarva loka āśrayaḥ bhavet
sa viṣṇuḥ padmanābha ākhyaḥ bhū daṇḍa salile śubhe
prākṛteḥ sva svarūpeṇa ati abhinnaḥ hi īśvaraḥ hariḥ
sarva ābharaṇa sampannaḥ sahasra aṅghri akṣi bāhukaḥ
prāk pratyak
śirāḥ tu ūrdhva mukhaḥ śiśye pīta ambaraḥ samaḥ
aṇḍa sṛṣṭi ādim ekāle tatva jātāt tridhā kṛtāt
adya a daṇḍam abhūt anyam padmanābha ugra sat vibhuḥ
tat sṛṣṭam bhū pradānam nābhau sthāpya hiraṇmayam
padmam vyajanayat tasya kandāt bhūmiḥ atha u bhavat
sapta dvīpa samudra ādi tamaḥ ghana jala anvitā
pañcāśat koṭi vistīrṇā api aṇḍa madhya pradeśa gā
lakṣa yojana saṃkhyāka pṛthula ati dhṛḍha āśrayā
pañcaviṃśat koṭi mita lakṣa ūnam garbhavāri adhas
yojanānām tad upari sthāpitā abhūḥ abhūt hareḥ
vakṣyamāṇeṣu ca ukteṣu jaḍa citsu tad āhvayaḥ
meruḥ tad madhya gaḥ bhūmeḥ caturasraḥ hiraṇmayaḥ
yojanānām lakṣa mitaḥ ucchrāyāt ratna sānukaḥ
atha ṣoḍaśa sāhasra yojana āyāmaḥ
tāvatā bhūri mānaḥsaham ekaḥ sarva surālayaḥ
ūrdham tad viguṇa āyāmaḥ sahasra aśīti yojanaiḥ
caturbhiḥ adhikaiḥ bhūmeḥ ucchritaḥ sarvatas śubham
meroḥ pūrva ādi aṣṭa dikṣu lokapāla sadāṃsi alam
santi eva sarva bhadrāṇi
catur asrāṇi tad madhye tat caturguṇa vistaram
brahmaṇaḥ tu sadasyāni ratna hema mayāni ca
teṣu indra ugniḥ yamaḥ kravyād varuṇāni layakṣapaḥ
śivaḥ ca iti sa bhāryāḥ te sa aṅgāḥ sa parivārakāḥ
tad mad adhye maṇṭapaḥ tasya vidheḥ ājñākarāḥ tathā
tatra vāṇīśvaraḥ nanta bhujagasya suśiraskakaḥ
lokapāla sadaḥ madhye vindhya udikṣu
samanāḥ sarvatobhadrā tārasa ardha aṣṭa sahasrakāḥ
sarit sarovarāṇi atra kañja ādi sumavanti api
nānā nārī sevitāni haṃsa ādi dvijavanti api
ājāna ja samāna eka jātīya paricārakaiḥ
sevita udri varaḥ bhāsvat dīpya divi adri gocaraḥ
divya ābharaṇa vastra ādyaiḥ alaṅkṛta surā dalayaḥ
tasya pūrva ādi aṣṭa dikṣu mandaraḥ merumandaraḥ
supārśvaḥ kumudaḥ ca iti avaṣa ṭambhana gāḥ kramāt
te sahasra strikāḥ yāmāḥ sahasra daśaka ucchritāḥ
cūta jambū kadambāḥ ca nyagrodhaḥ teṣu bhūruhāḥ
ekādaśa śata uccāḥ te gaja upama phala anvitāḥ
suvarṇa ratna saṃkāśāḥ śata śākhā samāvṛtāḥ
tatra nānā pakṣi gaṇāḥ sa gandha kusuma chadāḥ
teṣām tu uparitas svarṇa ratna mandāra bhūmiṣu
nandanam caitrarathakam vaibhrājakam iti īritam
vanāni avarṇanīyāni sarvatobhadra saṃjñakam

original: teṣu vai kāmikāḥ siddhāḥ caranti lalanānvitāḥ /
analyzed: teṣu vai kāmikāḥ siddhāḥ caranti lalanā anvitāḥ

original: teṣu sañcaratāṃ saukhyam adhikaṃ na śramādayaḥ // PS_1,11.64 //
analyzed: teṣu sañcaratām saukhyam adhikam na śrama ādayaḥ
eṣām phalaiḥ nipatitaiḥ viśīrṇaiḥ śubhra sadrasaiḥ
niryat rasam udbhūtāḥ catasraḥ ca catasṛṣu
dvi lakṣa vṛtta dīrgha sthāḥ jarā durgandha duḥsahāḥ

original: nīlaḥ śvetaḥ śṛṅgavāṃśca meroruttarato nagāḥ // PS_1,11.66 //
analyzed: nīlaḥ śvetaḥ śṛṅgavān ca meroḥ uttaratas nagāḥ
yojanānām nava sahasrāyāma akṣmā talasya ca
maryādā girayaḥ sarve pratyak sāgara dīrghakāḥ
uścrayāt haśa sāhasrāḥ pṛthulāḥ dvi sahasrakāḥ
niṣadhaḥ hemakūṭaḥ ca himavān iti dakṣiṇe
pūrva mānena ukta bhuvaḥ maryādāḥ girayaḥ matāḥ
vistārāt ucchrayāt hairghyāt nīla ādīnām samāḥ kramāt
nānā siddha gaṇaiḥ sevyāḥ sarva ratna samākulāḥ
pūrvasyām diśi meroḥ tu gandhamādana parvataḥ
pratīcyām diśi meroḥ tu mālyavān nāma bhūdharaḥ
ā nīla niṣadha āyāmau parvatau deva pūjitau
tau pūrva samitau sarva sadvṛkṣa śobhitau
catur dikṣu api meroḥ tu nava sāhasra yojanaiḥ
vistṛtam bhū talam cela āvṛta varṣam vadanti hi
ramyakaḥ hiraṇmayaḥ ca eva kuruvarṣa ādayaḥ trayaḥ
varṣānīla ādi adribhiḥ te vibhaktā svarṇa bhūmayaḥ
gandhamādanataḥ pūrva bhūmau bhadrāḥ ca varṣake
hari kiṃpuruṣa bhārata varṣāḥ tu krama yogataḥ
dakṣiṇe niṣadha ādi adri vibhakta bhūmayaḥ kramāt
vaivasvataḥ manuḥ martya upāsakaḥ ramyaka īśvaraḥ
aryamāḥ pitṛpaḥ kūrma upāsakaḥ tu hiraṇmaye
bhūmiḥ ādivarāhasya bhāryā vai kuru varṣa gā
hayāsya upāsakaḥ bhadraśravāḥ bhadrāḥ ca varṣake
rati a kāmena arcitau dvau kṛti pradyumna saṃjñakau

original: ketumālye strījanārcyo na jīvaṃ bhadrake khalu /
analyzed: ketumālye strī jana arcyaḥ na jīvam bhadrake khalu
prahlāda upāsitaḥ harivarṣa gaḥ
hanumat pūjitaḥ rāmaḥ nāthaḥ kiṃpuruṣasya tu
bhadrāśvāt dakṣiṇe varṣe bhārata ākhyaḥ guṇa adhikaḥ
bhāratasya asya ca anujaḥ
nārāyaṇaḥ dakṣa putryāḥ tryām
mūrtyā adharma samutthitau

original: tau nāradasya ca ṛṣeḥ jñānadau lokapūjitaḥ /
analyzed: tau nāradasya ca ṛṣeḥ jñāna dau lokapūjitaḥ
ilāvṛtte meru pūrva diśi savya apasavya gau
jaṭharaḥ devakūṭaḥ ca meru pṛṣṭhe ca pūrvatas
gandhamādana saṃspṛṣṭau svarṇa ratna mayau samau
vistārāt tu ucchrayāt ca yojanāḥ dvi sahasrakau
nava sāhasra sat bhūmi madhye jaṭhara nīlayoḥ
bhūḥ devakūṭa niṣadha madhya sthāt tāvatī matā
ṣaṣ sahasra antara bhuvau gandhamādana mandarau
tiryak tad viguṇā bhūmiḥ meru pūrvastha gotrayoḥ
kailāsa karavīrau dvau evam meroḥ tu dakṣiṇe
pavanaḥ pariyātraḥ ca dvau meroḥ paścima āśrayau
śṛṅgaḥ ca makaraḥ ca eva meroḥ uttaratas tathā
niṣadha antau dakṣiṇau uttarau nīla saṃmitau
pāścātyau mālyavat sṛṣṭau pūrvaga adrīva mānataḥ
etaiḥ akhila āvṛtaḥ varṣaḥ vibhaktaḥ ca āṣvadhāmalaḥ

original: sukumāraṃ vanaṃ ramyaṃ sarvatryaiṇyaiva teṣvalam // PS_1,11.89 //
analyzed: su kumāram vanam ramyam teṣu alam
teṣu ca iva astriyaḥ diś unmukhāḥ
aṣaṭ rūpaiḥ ādi śeṣaḥ sahasra vadanaḥ prabhuḥ
vasati asya mahārudraḥ sa aṃbaḥ ca aṣṭa tanuḥ svayam

original: sadopāsta iti śeṣaṃ tadgaṃ saṅkarṣaṇaṃ param // PS_1,11.91 //
analyzed: sadā upāste iti śeṣam tad gam saṅkarṣaṇam param
śambhuḥ bhavānī ābhasma gaḥ bhavaḥ
teṣu aṣṭa bhavaneṣu eva sadā āramati śaṅkaraḥ

original: prārabdhakarmaṇā sāpi patiṃ ramayati sphuṭam // PS_1,11.93 //
analyzed: prārabdha karmaṇā sā api patim ramayati sphuṭam
iti śrī prakāśasaṃhitāyām prathama paricchede ekādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī bhagavān uvāca
antar vaikuṇṭha śikharāt tatas adhas
patat kamaṇaḍule dhātā dadhāra īśa pada ambuje
prakṣālya tad śeṣa jalāt gaṅā gānāmanadī vyadhāt
sā bhū durgā bhāgayoḥ dvayoḥ

original: pṛthak saptāvarṇagā parighā rūpiṇī matā // PS_1,12.3 //
analyzed: pṛthak sapta avarṇa gā parighā rūpiṇī matā

original: nandinī satyaloke sā nalinī ca tapomaye /
analyzed: nandinī satya loke sā nalinī ca tapaḥ maye

original: janoloke mālinīti maharloke tu bhoginī // PS_1,12.4 //
analyzed: janaḥ loke mālinī iti mahar loke tu bhoginī
svardhunī sā svarga loke viyadgaṅgā dhruvālaye
madāpagā sā antarikṣe meroḥ brahmasadā ūrdhvatas

original: nipatantī ca pūrvādi caturdikṣu krameṇa sā /
analyzed: nipatantī ca pūrva ādi catur dikṣu krameṇa sā
ca cakṣuḥ bhadra āhvayā śubhā
sītā khyāti rava udvegāt sarvatra ilāvṛtāt bahis
nipātyamānā hariṇā pūrvam abdhim gamiṣyati
sā eva dakṣiṇa bhāga sthā kālena mahatā kila
sagara ātmaja śuddhi artham bhagīratha samarcitā
bhāgīrathī iti gaditā sarva loka eka pāvinī

original: jahnunā rājaḥṛṣiṇā pītātyaktā ca vākyataḥ // PS_1,12.9 //
analyzed: jahnunā rāja ṛṣiṇā pītā a tyaktā ca vākyataḥ
sā jāhnavī meru nagasya uttara adhas sthala sthitāt
mārgāt atala pūrveṣu sapta lokeṣu saṃsthitā
sā eva tripathagā devī bhāti nārāyaṇa āśrayā
sā eṣā ramyakata
pūrveṣu harivarṣa ādiṣu triṣu
bhadrāśva ketumāle tu carantī sāgarapriyā

original: bhāratesmin mahāvarṣe nadyaḥ santi sahasraśaḥ // PS_1,12.12 //
analyzed: bhārate ismin mahā varṣe nadyaḥ santi sahasraśas
śrīmaṣṇa naimiṣa araṇye gaṇḍakī badarī sthalam
aṣṭau ete svayam vyaktāḥ bhārate sarva siddhi dāḥ
svāmipuṣkaraṇī pūrvāḥ puṣkariṇyaḥ sahasraśas
manavaḥ pitaraḥ siddhāḥ sarva sādhana tatparāḥ
sura asurāḥ bhārate ismin sva sādhana parāyaṇāḥ
atra sat karmaṇā svargam nirayam pāpa karmaṇā

original: miththā jñānena ca tamo jñānenaiva padaṃ hareḥ // PS_1,12.16 //
analyzed: miththā jñānena ca tamaḥ jñānena eva padam hareḥ
prāpnoti puruṣaḥ hi atra pada sthāḥ tatva devatāḥ

original: kecit sarvāvatāreṣu bhūmau bhūtvā bhavantyalam // PS_1,12.17 //
analyzed: kecid sarva avatāreṣu bhūmau bhūtvā bhavanti alam
sarvesurāḥ pada sthāḥ ca rāma kṛṣṇa avatārayoḥ
jātāḥ bhūmau upāsya īśam punar mūla svarūpakaiḥ

original: ekī bhavantyapi surāḥ bhāvinaḥ prāyaśotra tu /
analyzed: ekī bhavanti api surāḥ bhāvinaḥ prāyaśas utra tu
sva sādhana eka niratāḥ devadāsa ādayaḥ api ca
sa aṃśāḥ niraṃśāḥ ca tathā sva sva sādhana tatparāḥ

original: vidhayaśca niṣedhādyāḥ atratyānāṃ bhavanti hi // PS_1,12.20 //
analyzed: vidhayaḥ ca niṣedha ādyāḥ atratyānām bhavanti hi
lakṣa yojana vistīrṇa lavaṇa ambudhi veṣṭitaḥ

original: dvīpoyaṃ jambvākhyo hi merustasyaiva madhyamaḥ // PS_1,12.21 //
analyzed: dvīpaḥ ayam jambu ākhyaḥ hi meruḥ tasya eva madhyamaḥ
sumerā uparitas cela āvṛtam tat gavanam śubham
sukumāra abhidham rudra śāpāt tatra gataḥ pumān
nārī bhavati pārvatyā ārantu kāmaḥ tathā akarot
etasmāt viguṇaḥ plakṣaḥ tu ikṣu uda ambudhi veṣṭhitaḥ
sthūlāḥ ca parvatāḥ santi tatra śrī hari saṃmitāḥ
tāḥ te kṣīrābdhim ārabhya ikṣu sāgara saṃspṛśāḥ
bhārata ādi aṣṭa varṣeṣu ṣaṣ dvīpāḥ aparāḥ api
madhyaḥ tad kāmya puṇyānām bhoga artham hari nirmitāḥ
pāpāt atra janīnā eva puṇyāt eva hi kāmyataḥ

original: na tatra cāyurnayamo yāvatpuṇyantu jīvanam // PS_1,12.26 //
analyzed: na tatra yāvat puṇyantu jīvanam
nara anāryaḥ sundara aṅgāḥ santi bhoga ucita artha dāḥ
vṛkṣāḥ ca puṇya ratnāni gṛhāḥ ca svarṇa bhūmayaḥ

original: vinaiva kālamaraṇaṃ tatra duḥkhādikaṃ na hi /
analyzed: vinā eva kāla maraṇam tatra duḥkha ādikam na hi
icchā mātreṇa sarva atha siddhiḥ tatra īśa nirmitaḥ
sūrya ātmakam harim tatra pūjayanti vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: tato hi dviguṇodvīpaḥ śālmalaḥ sarvavartulaḥ // PS_1,12.29 //
analyzed: tatas hi dviguṇaḥ dvīpaḥ śālmalaḥ sarva vartulaḥ
yojanānām catur lakṣam madhu abdhi sama veṣṭitaḥ

original: jāmbavaṃ puṣkaraṃ tyaktvā madhyadvīpeṣu pañcasu // PS_1,12.30 //
analyzed: jāmbavam puṣkaram tyaktvā madhya dvīpeṣu pañcasu
sarveṣu sapta nadyaḥ syuḥ parvatāḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ
sapta dvīpa gatāḥ nadyaḥ dad bāhya ambudhi gāminaḥ
bhoga upayuktāḥ nikhilāḥ padārtha jana saṅkulāḥ
tatratyāḥ parvatāḥ pūrvottara sāgara saṃspṛśaḥ
taiḥ vibhaktāḥ sapta varṣāḥ tad tad manu sutra āśrayāḥ

original: candrāntaryāmiṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ śālmalasthā bhajanti hi // PS_1,12.33 //
analyzed: candra antaryāmiṇam viṣṇum śālmala sthāḥ bhajanti hi
krauñcadvīpaḥ tad viguṇaḥ dvi aṣṭa lakṣa arṇave na tu

original: varuṇāntargataṃ viṣṇuṃ bhajanti hi tatotra hi /
analyzed: varuṇa antargatam viṣṇum bhajanti hi tatas utra hi

original: tato hi dviguṇāḥ śākadvīpaḥ kṣīrābdhiveṣṭhitaḥ // PS_1,12.35 //
analyzed: tatas hi dviguṇāḥ śākadvīpaḥ kṣīrābdhi veṣṭhitaḥ
dvātriṃśat lakṣa vistāraḥ samīra upāsaka uditaḥ
śākadvīpasya madhye tu ananta rūpī hari svayam
ardha lakṣa sthala tanuḥ sapta lakṣa unnataḥ prabhuḥ
cakra prākāra rūpa ātmā tad dvīpe paritas sadā
lakṣa unnata stheṣu jagaccakṣuḥ sūryaḥ carati asau
merum pradakṣiṇī kurvan rūkṣa cakraḥ unuvegataḥ
dine dine tu eka vāram sahasrāṃśuḥ prakāśa kṛt
taila yantram iva ulitaḥ
luptam anyat cakra yutam mānasottara parvate
paribhramanti tad madhye nasi bhūmeḥ sama unnate
catvāriṃśat yojana ūrdhva pradeśa spraśi madhyataḥ
tāvat parimita ani akṣa sambandho tāvat antarāḥ

original: stambhāḥ ṣaṣṭhisahasrāśca catvāraḥ santi sadṛḍhāḥ // PS_1,12.42 //
analyzed: stambhāḥ ṣaṣṭhi sahasrāḥ ca catvāraḥ santi sadṛḍhāḥ
śata yojanakāḥ sthūlāḥ dīpya dhvajra mayāḥ śubhāḥ
tad ūrdhva maṇṭape pāda lakṣa ucca maṇi dīpite
dedīpya maṇḍale
ahar karaḥ sarva sat sādhana kṛt phala dos yamā
meroḥ pūrva sthitaḥ bhārata sthānām udayaṅkaraḥ
meroḥ dakṣiṇa go madhya dhyam
dinakṛt sapta sandhayaḥ
meroḥ paścima gaḥ bhārata tsthānām astamāna kṛt
meroḥ uttara gaḥ ca ardha rātri kṛt bhārate nṝṇām
evam eva catur dikṣu vidyamāna janasya tu
nārāyaṇa viśeṣa āveśa edhita ātma gatiḥ svayam
ekam eva pṛthak nāma bhedena śrī hari icchayā
sapta dvīpeṣu
savyena bhramatām bhānām tri lakṣa unnata vartinām
tiryak ūrdhvam ca ṣaṭpañcāśat lakṣa adhika koṭitaḥ
dīrghābhiḥ ca śalākābhiḥ nirmite rūkṣa cakrake
śata yojana vistīrṇam śalākā agreṣu bhānti alam
vasanti tad mārga gatāḥ sañcaranti nava grahāḥ
te śalākāḥ vajra mayāḥ aṣṭottaraśata ātmakaiḥ
chidraiḥ ca kalita a pāśaiḥ dhrava adhīnaiḥ ca vāruṇaiḥ
sambandha agrābhiḥ aṃśena kḷpya ekaikena bhā āśrayāḥ
catur cit rayutāḥ sarva śalākāḥ teṣu vāruṇāḥ
pāśāḥ ca antar praviṣṭāḥ ca bhūmeḥ lakṣa unnata antare
sthitasya sūrya ratha agra itas akṣa koṭyaḥ tathā agratas
dhura agra akṣa agrayoḥ baddha pāśa agreṇa samanvitāḥ
pāśādhruvasya nakṣatra pādaiḥ eva apasavyataḥ
saṃvatsareṇa eka vāram bhramantam bhrāmayati alam
dhruvaḥ tasya hayāḥ sapta harit varṇāḥ mahā javāḥ
anuktaḥ tātvikaiḥ tulyāḥ tad yantāḥ garuḍāgrajaḥ
saḥ nūruruḥ tu aruṇaḥ sarpa pāśaiḥ tān yojayati alam
mānasa uttara meroḥ tu saṃspraṣṭākṣa sumadhyage
aneharmya kalita vajra sambhāvyagra maṇṭape
carataḥ bhāskarasya āsya tva ādhāraḥ śāka madhya gaḥ
hariḥ meroḥ sārdha sapta uttara saptati lakṣakaḥ
tāvat tad uttara gata mānasottara parvate
yojanānām ṣaṣṭhi sahasra unnatam cakram ūrjitam
madhya chidra anvitam vajra mayam bhramati viṣṇunā
dvādaśa aram hi tri nāḍī antar bahis sthale
yuga kūbara akṣa trayasya rekhāsu tithi vāra pāḥ
apareṣu māsāḥ tiṣṭhanti ṛtavaḥ tasya nemi gāḥ
caturmāsyāḥ trinemi sthāḥ dvi pariḥ ced ageyane
vatsaraḥ sarva cakra sthaḥ tu ekacakrorathasya tu
sa karkaṭa ādiṣu caran eka ūhnā ahnām
kṣaya kṛt raviḥ
ṣaṣ surātra dīrghyamānaḥ kārayan dakṣiṇāyanam
karoti nakra ādiṣu ṣaṭsu caran
ahnāni abhyedhayan ekaḥ ca uttarāyaṇa kārakaḥ
vināḍikānām pañcāśat māsi māsi edheya iti asau
rātri kāla ṛdhi kṛt tathā
yadā tu meṣa tulayoḥ carati eṣa samā niśā
vṛścika ādyeṣu pañcasu api niśā ardhi kṛt
vṛṣa ādi pañcasu caran divā kāla samardhi kṛt
tri lakṣa unnata nakṣatra śalākā agra aṣṭa viṃśake
udak dakṣiṇa koṇa ādyāḥ kṛttikā ādyāḥ samāśritāḥ
tiryak ūrdhvam sapta sapta śalakābhiḥ vinirmitam
dvābhyām dvābhyām koṇayoḥ tu rekhābhyām upakalpitam
nakṣatra maṇḍalam bhūmeḥ ūrdhvam lakṣa trayeṇa hi

original: ekaikasyāṃ śalākāyāṃ chidrāṇi ca pṛthak pṛthak /
analyzed: ekaikasyām śalākāyām chidrāṇi ca pṛthak pṛthak

original: catvāri tāni daṃsrakṣādyādikāni vanāni ca // PS_1,12.71 //
analyzed: catvāri tāni daṃsra kṣa ādi ādikāni vanāni ca
meṣa aṅkāni vṛṣa aṅkāni nṛ yugmakāni vai nava
karka siṃha aṅgakanyāni tulakāḥ vṛścikāni vai
dhanuḥ nakṣatra śaṅkhāni mīna aṅkāni ca vai nava

original: teṣu teṣu praviṣṭāśca pādadyaṣṭottaraṃ śatam // PS_1,12.73 //
analyzed: teṣu teṣu praviṣṭāḥ ca pādadyaṣṭa uttaram śatam
pādaiḥ dhuvaḥ sa sūryaḥ tu apasavya krameṇa vai
sarva nakṣatra pādeṣu kramāt vṛddhau bhaviṣyati

original: ekaika nakṣatrapāde baddho bhavati vai kramāt // PS_1,12.75 //
analyzed: ekaika nakṣatra pāde baddhaḥ bhavati vai kramāt
sa ardha trayodaśa ādinaiḥ eka nakṣatra gaḥ raviḥ

original: māsena navapādāni bhuñjan dvādaśa rāśiṣu // PS_1,12.76 //
analyzed: māsena nava pādāni bhuñjan dvādaśa rāśiṣu
saṃvatsareṇa carati hi apradakṣiṇatas raviḥ
meṣa adhyaṅkita randhrāṇi meṣa ādyāḥ rāśaya smṛtāḥ
dhruva pāda agra gaḥ raviḥ
dvi lakṣa unnata deśa stha dhruva pāda agratas śaśī
candra sūryau deśa gatau matau
kuja ādayaḥ ca pañca api ṛkṣa cakra ūrdhva vartinaḥ
dhruva pāśaiḥ sadā ābaddhāḥ sañcarati apasavyataḥ
jñaḥ pañca lakṣa unnata gataḥ sapta lakṣa unnataḥ kujaḥ
nava lakṣa unnataḥ śukraḥ lakṣa ekādaśakaḥ guruḥ
trayodaśam tu parikīrtitam
lakṣa pañcādaśāt ūrdhvam śani maṇḍalam asti hi
ṣaḍviṃśati su lakṣāṇām ūrdhvam saptarṣi maṇḍalam
dhruvaḥ saṃsthaḥ haripriyaḥ
sa viṣṇoḥ śiṃśumārasya mahā cakra pada āsthitāḥ

original: dhruvādīn grahān viṣṇuḥ cakre sarvān suvāruṇaiḥ /
analyzed: dhruva ādīn grahān viṣṇuḥ cakre sarvān suvāruṇaiḥ
śrīmān śalākā randhra saṅga tāḥ
sarve hi ete bhānu samā pradeśeṣu uttarottaram
caranti ṛkṣa pāda stha pāśaiḥ eva tu tad mitaiḥ
eteṣām rāśi sañcāraiḥ kālam yojayati īśvaraḥ
candraḥ rāśi dvādaśakam māsena ekena vartate

original: kujo māsārdhato rāśiṃ bhuktvā rāśiṃ sameṣyati /
analyzed: kujaḥ māsa ardhataḥ rāśim bhuktvā rāśim sameṣyati
guruḥ dvādaśabhiḥ māsaiḥ triṃśat māsaiḥ śanaiścaraḥ
māsena eva budhaḥ śukraḥ prati rāśim bhajati alam

original: sadā samagatī vakraśūnyau dvau śaśibhāskarau // PS_1,12.88 //
analyzed: sadā sama gatī vakra śūnyau dvau śaśi bhāskarau
bhānu maṇḍala gaḥ candraḥ bhavet

original: evaṃ kujādayaḥ pañca astaṃ yāsyanti bhānugāḥ // PS_1,12.89 //
analyzed: evam kuja ādayaḥ pañca astam yāsyanti bhānu gāḥ
śukra gurū dvau paścima udayau

original: pratyagastaṅgatau tau dvau tu pūrvadiśyuditau matau // PS_1,12.90 //
analyzed: tau dvau tu pūrva diśi uditau matau
evam anye api sūryasya na astamānam svabhāvataḥ

original: meruchāyāgataṃ cāstaṅgataṃ sūryaṃ vadanti hi // PS_1,12.91 //
analyzed: meru chāyā gatam ca astaṅgatam sūryam vadanti hi

original: candrārka kavyastamaye laukike tu śubhaṃ tyajet /
analyzed: ka vyastamaye laukike tu śubham tyajet
pūrvasyām diśi māsa dvaya utthitaḥ
pratyak astaṅgataḥ kāvyaḥ sapta ahobhiḥ udeti alam
guruḥ māsena ubhayatra hi uditaḥ bhavati dhruvam
kuja ādīnām vakram ādya āstambhaḥ śīghrataḥ
gatayaḥ vividhāḥ santi kālasya aśubha sūcakāḥ

original: na samā hi gatisteṣāṃ kvacideva samāgatiḥ /
analyzed: na samā hi gatiḥ teṣām kvacid eva samāgatiḥ
pura sthām raja yojitāḥ
tad vādaśa aṃśa dhuragāḥ sapta aśvāḥ bhaskarasya hi
nava koṭi su vistaram
sārdham pradakṣiṇam kartum yojayanti mahā javāḥ

original: itthaṃ navagrahaiḥ kālacakraṃ paramaḥ pumān // PS_1,12.97 //
analyzed: ittham nava grahaiḥ kālacakram paramaḥ pumān

original: sūryasya gatyā meṣādīn māsān saureṇa mānataḥ /
analyzed: sūryasya gatyā meṣa ādīn māsān saureṇa mānataḥ
kalpayati api candrasya gatyā caitrādīkān hariḥ
cāndramāsān kalpayanti nakṣatram ṛkṣa santateḥ

original: āvṛtyaṃ caturorāptiṃ cārān mānaṃ bṛhaspateḥ // PS_1,12.99 //
analyzed: āvṛtyam caturoḥ āptim cārāt mānam bṛhaspateḥ
sārasvatam tu gāndharvāḥ pakṣa ahar rātrayaḥ matāḥ
sārasvatam tu gāndharva mānam āhuḥ vicakṣaṇāḥ
māsena syāt ahorātram maitram mānam viduḥ budhāḥ
daiva mānam vatsara ahar rātri kālena tāvatā
manuḥ mānam mānava ākhyam brāhma mānam ajasya hi
mānāḥ ca nava mānānām viṣṇuḥ ekaḥ pravartakaḥ
dvātriṃśat lakṣa vistīrṇa kṣīrābdheḥ madhyadeśataḥ
tad ardha vistara uccakrama prākāra rūpakaḥ
daśa lakṣa unnataḥ bhūmeḥ śvetadvīpaḥ rama ātmakaḥ
veda avarṇāḥ deśa kālau nitya vyāptāḥ jaḍa amatāḥ
vāyu ākāśaḥ saura dīptiḥ anityāḥ tu jaḍā a matāḥ
dravyāni apratighātāni ca
lakṣmī nārāyaṇau śuddha cit rūpau vyāpta vigrahau
sarvārthapratighātā ca śvetadvīpā ādayaḥ trayaḥ
lokāḥ tu apratighātāḥ ca stambha ādhyaiḥ loka rūpakāḥ
durgā bhāgaḥ tad upari bhū bhāgaḥ tu tad ūrdhvatas
śrī bhāgaḥ tu tatas tu ūrdhvam śikharam tu tad ūrdhva gaḥ
bhāga traye pi bhūkandāḥ pañca lakṣa unnata ayutāḥ
ramā deśa harmya svarūpiṇī
harmyam pradeśa bhū bhāgāḥ lakṣa yojana kandakāḥ
upari āvarttayaḥ bhāgaḥ trayaḥ bhū kanda saṃmitāḥ
bhāga traye api ca
sārdha dvi lakṣa samitā nānā maṇi virājitā
cit mātra ananta muktā īḍyaḥ svargāt upari vartate
sthānam traye tripād viṣṇoḥ divi svarga unnata sthale
durgā bhāgaḥ tu tad mitaḥ
bhū bhāgaḥ tu tad ardha itas śrī bhāgaḥ tu tad ardhataḥ
aneka toraṇa aṭṭāla vedī catvāra śobhitāḥ
maṇimatna nadī adrisaraḥ vāpī ādi saṃkulāḥ
nānā yādaḥ gaṇa upeta svarṇa kañjābu bhāsvarāḥ
haṃsa kokila barha ādi śuka svana samākulāḥ
ati sundara siṃha ādi nānā mṛga samākulāḥ
racita aneka maṇṭapāḥ
nānā svādu svana upeta nara nārī gaṇauḥ yutāḥ
siddha cāraṇa gandharva apsaraḥ gāna maṇitāḥ
nānā vādya mahā vīṇā śaṅkha dundubhi nisvanāḥ
gaja aśva ratha pādāti dhvaja chatra ādi lāñchanāḥ
sarva ābharaṇa vastra āḍhyāḥ vimāna āvali saṅkulāḥ
nānā krīḍā sādhana etāḥ nānāḥ gandha upabṛṃhitāḥ
aneka haṃsa tūle tu maṇi śayyā samāvṛtāḥ
bhoga strībhiḥ samākīrṇāḥ maṇi vyajana darpaṇāḥ
anukta ananta sarva upaskaraṇaiḥ upaśobhitāḥ
tulasī puṣpa sat ratna muktā mālā upaśobhitāḥ
ghṛta dadhi ambu rūpā sā pūrva ukta artha svarūpiṇī
ananta rūpiṇam viṣṇum sat ārādhayati īśvaram
svabhāvāt eva na asya arthaḥ prāptavyaḥ kaścid eṣyate
pūrṇa kāmaḥ hariḥ prītyā tad pūjām svīkaroti ajaḥ
sthāna traye pi sā devī hi ananta ukta artha rūpiṇī
sarva deśeṣu kāleṣu sarva rūpa āśritā ramā
iti śrī prakāśasaṃhitāyām prathama paricchede dvādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī haṃsaḥ uvāca
ye proktāḥ deva gandharva karma jñānāḥ tu atātvikāḥ
pakva adhikāriṇaḥ bhūmeḥ utkrāntāḥ mahar ādiṣu
sthitāḥ vipa śeṣa ukta mārgeṇa sva uttameṣu te
bhoga deha pratiṣaṭhāḥ tu aṇḍa anta dvis ajā tale
yuti akta liṅgāḥ turya vaśāḥ aṇḍa nāśe upāgate
para aṣṭama aṃśa avaśiṣṭa kāle śra hari garbha gāḥ
muktāḥ api na mukta ākhyāḥ punar brahmāṇḍa sambhave
viṣṇoḥ bahis gatāḥ kukṣeḥ śuddha sātvaka dehakaiḥ
ramā dattaiḥ bhoga yogya pūrva ukta ananta sātvikaiḥ
arthaiḥ abhyunnatā aśveta dvīpa sthā harim añjasā
dṛṣṭvā natvā prasādya īśam muktā ākhyām prāpya ca ājñayā
avyāhata iṣṭa gatayaḥ vaikuṇṭhe śuddha sātvikaiḥ
dehaiḥ modanti bhū durgā bhāgayoḥ śrīśa lālitāḥ

original: cinmātradehaiḥ śrībhāge na cātra jaḍasaṃsthitāḥ // PS_1,13.7 //
analyzed: cit mātra dehaiḥ śrī bhāge na ca atra jaḍa saṃsthitāḥ
vṛkṣa pakṣi mṛgāḥ hi abdhi nadyaḥ api nava koṭayaḥ

original: sarāṃsi nānāvidhabaddhā api lokeṣu vai hareḥ // PS_1,13.8 //
analyzed: sarāṃsi nānāvidha baddhāḥ api lokeṣu vai hareḥ
śrī bhū durgā bhāge ete sevante harim añjasā
sva ādhikyasya sidhi artham sva ānanda ādhikya kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
kevalam liṅga dehena bhogabhāge vasanti hi
bhū bhāge saṃvasanti hi
niraṃśānām sūkṣma dehāḥ aṇḍa antar satya loka gā tu
aniruddhāt alpa kāla vyatyayāt prabhavanti hi
laya iṇḍa nāśāt puratas na tad sū nāśaḥ sū
kṣma tanoḥ bhavet
tṛṇāt ārabhya sat martya gandharvāḥ tanta
sya kṛtsnaśas
eṣām sūkṣma tanuḥ sṛṣṭiḥ kramāt yukta mata layaḥ
devatāḥ
durgā bhāga stha aniruddhāt sūkṣma yuktāḥ bhavanti hi
sṛṣṭi kramāt vyutkrameṇa nāśaḥ tatra gatāt hareḥ
aṇḍa nāśāt purā eva ete kevalam liṅga mātra gāḥ
bhū bhāge saṃvasanti hi
eṣām śrībhāga parikhā bhūta śrīvirajāḥ jale
aṇḍa nāśāt purā bhagna liṅgānām turya saṃśrayam
prāptānām śrī hareḥ gabhe tad āvāsaḥ bhaviṣyati
bhūmau utkramamāṇāḥ tu dehan tyaktvā mahar janāḥ

original: tapaḥ satyeṣu durgākhyabhāge nīcoccakāḥ kramāt // PS_1,13.17 //
analyzed: tapaḥ satyeṣu durga ākhya bhāge nīca uccakāḥ kramāt
vasanti deha bhogaiḥ te bhoga dehaiḥ
niraṃśānām tu bhogataḥ

original: śīrṇā bhavanti hi aniruddhena ye cate // PS_1,13.18 //
analyzed: śīrṇāḥ bhavanti hi aniruddhena ye cate

original: praviṣṭāni bhavanti hi aniruddhena ye cate /
analyzed: praviṣṭāni bhavanti hi aniruddhena ye cate
aniruddhe praviṣṭāni saṅkarṣaṇa jayāya te
sṛṣṭāni atas liṅga muktāḥ prabhavanti hi a tātvikāḥ

original: bhogedehaiḥ svottameṣu praviṣṭāḥ prabhavanti hi // PS_1,13.20 //
analyzed: bhoga dehaiḥ sva uttameṣu praviṣṭāḥ prabhavanti hi

original: gandharvāṇāṃ kuberantu pitṝṇāṃ yama eva hi /
analyzed: gandharvāṇām pitṝṇām yamaḥ eva hi
kṛṣṭa aṅga saṅga gopīnām sarva jātiṣu saptateḥ
mitānām ājāna jānām sa strīkāṇām dhanādhipe
tad samānāḥ tu ṛṣayaḥ śata ūna śata koṭayaḥ
eteṣām tulayā udakṣe hi agni putra gaṇasya tu

original: vahnau karmajadevānāṃ layaḥ svāyambhuve mataḥ // PS_1,13.23 //
analyzed: vahnau karma ja devānām layaḥ svāyambhuve mataḥ
tasmin ekādaśa mitā manavaḥ vidhya tātvikāḥ

original: tātvikau dvau saptamādyau yau tau manupadeśvarau // PS_1,13.24 //
analyzed: tātvikau dvau saptama ādyau yau tau manu pada īśvarau
nārāyaṇaḥ svayam viṣṇuḥ tāpasaḥ manuḥ īritaḥ

original: vinā tān strīn manūn svāyambhuve laya udīritaḥ // PS_1,13.25 //
analyzed: vinā tān strīn manūn svāyambhuve layaḥ udīritaḥ
ādyaḥ indraḥ hariḥ yajñaḥ vāyu dharma uśvinau kramāt
ṣaṣṭaḥ tu mandradyumna nāmā saptamaḥ tu purandaraḥ

original: dvau śacīramaṇāṃśau tau ṣaḍaite tātvikāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: dvau śacī ramaṇa aṃśau tau ṣaṭ ete tātvikāḥ smṛtāḥ
bhāvi indrāḥ karma ja ābhāḥ te teṣām ādya manau layaḥ

original: saptakānāṃ ṛṣīṇāntu śatasya ca layaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: saptakānām ṛṣīṇām tu śatasya ca layaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: dakṣe dharme ca tattulyapitṝṇāṃ saptakasya tu // PS_1,13.28 //
analyzed: dakṣe dharme ca tad tulya pitṝṇām saptakasya tu
tad samāḥ tu aṣṭa gandharvāḥ tu aṣṭa ūna śata yoṣitaḥ
urvaśī ādyāḥ tat samāhi kuberam praviśanti hi
atas niraṃśāḥ tu utkrānti yoginaḥ tu tanaḥ tad uttamāḥ
atātvikāḥ tu bhū lokāt utkrānta mahar ādi gāḥ
bhoga dehaiḥ uttamaiḥ tu bhakṣitāḥ prabhavanti hi
utkramān utkrameṇa gāyan yoginaḥ tān atho jaguḥ
nitya saṃsāriṇaḥ pṛthvyām tyaktvā sūkṣmataḥ
dharme praviśya santyakta anādya vidyāḥ bhavanti hi
kecid atrā eva mucyante kecid vaimeru mūrdhani

original: vaiśvānare dyunadyāṃ vā sūrye vā deha eva vā // PS_1,13.33 //
analyzed: vaiśvānare dyu nadyām vā sūrye vā dehe eva vā
tyaktvā avidyām miśra pāka ālaye nābhau hareḥ gatāḥ
svarga bhūmi ādiṣu sṛṣṭau bhramanti śrī hari icchayā
pātāle nitya narake bhagna sūkṣma kalevarāḥ
vāyoḥ gadā prahāreṇa bhagna liṅgāḥ tamonugāḥ

original: laye sṛṣṭau tamasyandhe patanti śrī harīcchayā // PS_1,13.36 //
analyzed: laye sṛṣṭau tamasi andhe patanti śrī hari icchayā
tatva abhimāninaḥ devāḥ hi aṇaḍa antar bahis rūpataḥ
anutkramāḥ sva uttameṣu mārgataḥ
tyakta dehāḥ sūkṣma dehaiḥ satya loke vasanti hi

original: naṣṭe satye brahmadehe naṣṭe taiḥ saha padmajāḥ // PS_1,13.38 //
analyzed: naṣṭe satye brahma dehe naṣṭe taiḥ saha padmajāḥ
aṇḍa nāśe upāvṛtte viśeṣam yātitaiḥ saha
atra sthitaiḥ sūkṣma daihaiḥ sarva tatrastha sūkṣmakaiḥ
ekībhavanti evam ekaviṃśat tatva gaṇātāḥ api

original: vyutkrameṇa tu bhūmyādi tatvopādāna sañcaye // PS_1,13.40 //
analyzed: vyutkrameṇa tu bhūmi ādi tatva upādāna sañcaye
sthale tathā na abhimāni vaśa ge sati viṣṇunā
annādi nāmnā adevaiḥ tat ūrdhvam ūrdhva gata kramāt
tyaktāni āvaraṇāni ete pūrva mānena nāśanam
yanti pūrva ukta mānena aniruddha ādi vat kramāt
saṅkarṣaṇāt vinaṣṭeṣu
tu sūkṣma deheṣu kṛtsnaśas
tadā satva ardha śrī bhāga stha lakṣmī alakṣmī ātmake jale
pradhāna virajāḥ nadyām iti arthaḥ
nīca kramāt bhagnaliṅgāḥ viśanti jaṭhare hareḥ

original: punaraṇḍe samutpanne śvetadvīpe samāpya ca // PS_1,13.44 //
analyzed: punar aṇḍe samutpanne śvetadvīpe samāpya ca
muktau bhavati asau lokaḥ kṣīrasāgara madhya gaḥ
lakṣmyaiḥ catuṣaṣṭhi mitaiḥ vistṛtam visṛjaḥ
dvīpaḥ kṣīrābdhi paritas maṇi vajra maya dyutiḥ
tad madhya deśa paritas vartulaḥ mānasa uttaraḥ

original: dhṛḍho vajramayaḥ saptarathacakraṃ raveḥ sthitam // PS_1,13.47 //
analyzed: dhṛḍhaḥ vajra mayaḥ sapta ratha cakram raveḥ sthitam
tad antar martya saṃsāraḥ tad vāhyaḥ martya gocaraḥ
tasya api paritas vajra lepikā svarṇa bhūḥ śubhā
catur lakṣa nyūna koṭi vistarāt tad gataḥ nagaḥ
paritas giriḥ
maṇi svarṇa mayaḥ prākāra ākāraḥ nirmalaḥ mahān
sa pañcāśat sahasra itad pañcāśat lakṣa vistṛtiḥ
tāvatā eva ucchritaḥ tasmāt ardha lakṣa adhika unnataḥ
nānā vṛkṣa āśrayaḥ yatra bhāti pūrva uditam jagat
tad aṣṭa dikṣu śikharāṇi api chidra anvitāni ca
śatā unnatāni digdanti gaṇāḥ tad upari sthitāḥ
tad chidra veṣṭitaḥ
gotra ante ca antarikṣa sthāḥ hari āveśa yutāḥ śubhāḥ

original: te ca pūrvādyaṣṭadikṣu garbhodasthāgataṃ(tā) bhuvam // PS_1,13.54 //
analyzed: te ca pūrva ādi aṣṭa dikṣu bhuvam
ūrdhvoḥ citraiḥ ātma hastaiḥ dharanti śrī hari icchayā

original: te mānasottare merau svarge rūpāntarasthitāḥ // PS_1,13.55 //
analyzed: te mānasa uttare merau svarge rūpa antara sthitāḥ

original: kurvanti śrī harerājñāṃ dikpālānāṃ ca vāhanāḥ /
analyzed: kurvanti śrī hareḥ rājñām dikpālānām ca vāhanāḥ
ananta rūpaiḥ bhagavān upari tat naga ūrdhva gaḥ
ūrdhva adhas śikhara spṛṣṭa anantam ūrdhvā uti yaḥ hariḥ
lokāloka antarāle tu sūrya indu ṛkṣa graha prabhāḥ
vasiṣṭha nārada atri ādya ananta gam svarṇa bhūmi gam
vadanti pūrva dvīpeṣu yathā
yathā tathā eva giri śṛṅge maitreya pūrvakāḥ
svarṇa bhūmim atītya eva sthitam āhuḥ naga uttamam
tat uktam āhuḥ paiṅgya ādyāḥ tat na iti āhuḥ mṛkakuṇḍajaḥ
meru lokāloka madhya pradeśaḥ tu tri koṭikaḥ
yojanānām sārtha koṭi saṃmitaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
loka aloka dhara
bhūmyā asahitaḥ parimāṇataḥ
andhantamaḥ tat nagasya paritas sapta koṭikaḥ
yatra mithyā jñāna yuktāḥ patanti śata koṭiśas
harīra sura guru āyar viṣṇu vaiṣṇava vidviṣaḥ
niṣkāraṇam sādhu yoṣit veda śāstra vidūṣakāḥ
bhakti leśa vihīnāḥ ca nitya naimittika ujjitāḥ
ananta pāpa karaṇe bhaya leśa vivarjitāḥ
jīva abhedaḥ nirguṇa tvam apūrṇa guṇa tā tathā

original: sāmyādhikye tadanyeṣāṃ bhedastadgata eva ca // PS_1,13.64 //
analyzed: sāmya ādhikye tad anyeṣām bhedaḥ tad gataḥ eva ca
prādurbhāva viparyāsaḥ tad bhakta dveṣaḥ eva ca

original: tatpramāṇasya nindā ca dveṣā etekhilā matāḥ // PS_1,13.65 //
analyzed: tad pramāṇasya nindā ca dveṣāḥ ete akhilāḥ matāḥ
samprāpya bhārate janma viṣṇu dveṣa ādi pākataḥ
yathā yogyam vaiparītyā parokṣa guru vidviṣaḥ
pakva sva rūpa vidveṣāt vyudasya ātmīya sañcitam

original: bhuktvā duṣprārabdhaphalaṃ pūrṇaṃ pramādikā gatam // PS_1,13.67 //
analyzed: bhuktvā duṣprārabdha phalam pūrṇam pramādikāḥ gatam
su prārabdha phalam viṣṇu dveṣāt alpīkṛtam hareḥ
bhuktvā āgāmi vyudasya eva hi āgāmi
prāptavya duḥkham icchanti sthūla dehān viṣa agnibhiḥ
śastra tyaktvā yātanā ādyaiḥ
aṇḍa nāśāt purā sūkṣma dehān tatra visṛjya ca
vāyoḥ gadā ghātataḥ ca liṅga bhaṅgaḥ bhaviṣyati
ciram śrī hari ūru deśe kḷpta duḥkha bhujaḥ khalāḥ
punar aṇḍe samutpanne tamasi andhe patati alam
martya adhamāḥ niraṃśāḥ ca piśācāḥ su alpa tāmasāḥ
teṣu kecid tatva deva ābhāsa rūpāḥ tu adhastane
svarga ādiṣu carantaḥ te pāpa karma abhimāninaḥ
daityāḥ ca rākṣasāḥ ca eva sa aṃśāḥ te bahu rūpiṇaḥ
rasātala sthāniruddhāt prāk sūkṣmam deham āśritāḥ
karma anuvaśataḥ sthūla dehān prāpya mahā asuraiḥ

original: svayaṃ naṣṭā parān sādhūn nāśayanti kusādhanaiḥ /
analyzed: svayam naṣṭā parān sādhūn nāśayanti ku sādhanaiḥ
tamasi andhe sthitāḥ
prāptavya duḥkham bhuñjanti śuddham tāmasa vigrahaiḥ
pūya asṛj mūtra viṣṭa ādyaiḥ tapta taila astra śastrakaiḥ
adṛṣṭa aśruta duḥkha āpti sādhana ucita vastubhiḥ
durgayā akalpitaiḥ ghoraiḥ nirghāta ādyaiḥ anekaśas
siṃha vyāghra ādi rūpiṇyā saha tādṛś sva rūpavān
avarṇanīya duḥkha ogham vāyuḥ dāsyati tān prati
tat prāptavyam iti prāhuḥ kḷptam duḥkham tatas api adhas
bhuñjanti sva sva rūpa stham sarva roga vraṇa ādikam
sarva kṣata ādikam nityam pūrṇa duḥkham vrajanti alam
tatas
ghana udaḥ paritas sthitam
yatra nārāyaṇa unanta tanu rūpa ātmaka śriyā

original: sadā viharati śrīśo brahmādyairapi sevitaḥ // PS_1,13.81 //
analyzed: sadā viharati śrīśaḥ brahma ādyaiḥ api sevitaḥ
tatas ūrdhva koṭi samitam ananta āsanam īśituḥ
vedimat

iti śrī prakāśasaṃhitāyām prathama paricchede trayodaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

ayuta unnāha vistāraḥ talātala mahātalau

original: yacchanti svacchasalilaṃ cāpi tattadgataṃ śubham // PS_1,14.5 //
analyzed: yacchanti svaccha salilam ca api tad tad gatam śubham
na tatra āyāsataḥ saukhyam anāyāsāt sukha āvahaḥ

original: bhūmau bhāratagā ye ca kṛte lakṣāyuṣaḥ smṛtāḥ // PS_1,14.7 //
analyzed: bhūmau bhārata gāḥ ye ca kṛte lakṣa āyuṣaḥ smṛtāḥ

ādhi vyādhi jarā vārdhikya āyāsa iti abhidhā ādayaḥ

tatrasthayoḥ sat asatoḥ bhakti dveṣau vinā kvacid

original: tathā vidhiniṣedhau ca na ca varṇāśramādayaḥ /

varaiḥ suradviṣaḥ viṣṇu vāyubhyām avatārakaiḥ

original: śubhaṃ bhuñjanti niṣkāmyaśubhaṃ teṣāṃ na vai kvacit // PS_1,14.12 //

original: tajjale tu tataḥ snātvā liṅgabhaṅgaḥ pradṛśyate /
analyzed: tad jale tu tatas snātvā liṅga bhaṅgaḥ pradṛśyate
laye pṛthivī āvaraṇam vyutkrāmat gacchatām satām
prathama āvaraṇam proktam sattva āvaraṇam antimam
tat ucca avyākṛta ākāśaḥ vyoma śabdena bhaṇyate
anantā aantimā
varaṇa vyomnoḥ antarā virajā iti atas
sa utpati aṅgeṣu devānām aṅga sāyujyam iṣyate
śrī bhāga vaikuṇṭha tad ga vāsudevasya cakriṇaḥ
ananta rūpe sarva aṅga sāyujyam brahmaṇaḥ bhavet
muktasya ca svarūpeṇa hi aṇoḥ vṛddhiḥ na yujyate
nohāniḥ punarāvṛtti duḥkha ajñāna bhaya ādayaḥ
nīca nīca alpa muktānām pūrtiḥ sva ānanda mātrataḥ
na eva uttama mud ākāṅkṣā sevā dhyāna ādikam ka phalam
na hareḥ na parasya api mud bhujaḥ te sva mud bhujaḥ

original: pralayatvaṃ kvacitsṛṣṭiḥ kāle śrībhāga eva hi // PS_1,15.36 //
analyzed: pralaya tvam kvacid sṛṣṭiḥ kāle śrī bhāge eva hi
brahmā cit mātra dehena hi anta prākāra gaḥ mataḥ
rudra ādayaḥ ṣaṣṭama gāḥ indra ādyāḥ pañcama sthitāḥ
caturtha sthāḥ sūrya ādyā tṛtīya sthāḥ marut gaṇāḥ
dvitīya prākāra saṃsthāḥ parjanya ādyāḥ sura uttamāḥ

original: ete muktāstu bhūbhāge durgābhāge tathaiva ca // PS_1,15.39 //
analyzed: ete muktāḥ tu bhūbhāge durgābhāge tathā eva ca
śuddha sātvika dehaiḥ tu prāptāḥ tu sukhinaḥ hareḥ
catur lakṣa adhika aśīti lakṣa jīva gaṇasya tu
bimba ātmā sadā tad gaḥ prarakṣati
sarva jīva gaṇa āmuktāḥ santi vaikuṇṭha mandire
jīva ānanām pāti apāyo
pi hariḥ sa hi rūpa antara aivibhuḥ
sarva jīva sama ati alpa rūpaiḥ sthūlaiḥ ca tādṛśaiḥ
tādṛś rūpa ananta yukta śriyā saha carati asau
tau tatra
tatra svārūpika kirīṭa ādi śaṅkha cakra ādi sādhanaiḥ
sudarśana ādi āyudhyaiḥ ca gandha mālya ādika arhaṇaiḥ
naivedya vastra āsaṅga ādyaiḥ
śayyā ādyaiḥ rūpaiḥ svaiḥ svayam arcitaḥ
śriyā asat aikyam āpannaḥ moda rūpī anumodate
śrīḥ devavi
taiḥ viṣṇum pūjayati alam
viṣṇudattaiḥ ramā ekī bhavati sphuṭam
bhū durga bhāgayoḥ evam śuddha sātvika sādhanaiḥ
tad māninī śrīḥ sampūjya tad nirmālyaiḥ aja ādikān
muktāḥ toṣayati prājñāḥ gandha mālya ādibhiḥ śubhaiḥ
te vimāna ratha aṇḍolā ḍolā lola viśeṣakaiḥ
śayyā ābharaṇa vastra ādyaiḥ kari hari ādibhiḥ kvacid
samānaiḥ uttama janaiḥ phala puṣpa akṣata ādibhiḥ
sva svī eṣṭa taruṇībhiḥ ca jala krīḍā ādibhiḥ tathā
a vyāhṛta iṣṭa gatayaḥ sat kathā ādibhiḥ
punarāvṛtti rahitāḥ namanti nikhilāḥ api
nava koṭyaḥ hi devānām pada sthāḥ devatā gaṇāḥ
liṅga sūkṣma sthūla deha yuktāḥ sarve sa bhāryakāḥ
sevā artham śrī hareḥ durgā bhāge samyak vasanti hi
te kāmadhuk kalpavṛkṣa cintāmaṇi samutthitaiḥ
pūjyā upayuktā
tayā sampūjita hari nirmālyaiḥ punar ārpitaiḥ
pavitrita aṅgā paritas sañcaranti api modinaḥ

original: sāyujyamapi sālokyaṃ sāmīpyaṃ sarvadā hareḥ // PS_1,15.55 //
analyzed: sāyujyam api sālokyam sāmīpyam sarvadā hareḥ
sārūpyam api muktiḥ hi caturthā kila bhaṇyate
viṣṇuḥ muktān sva deha sthān sva sva ānanda eka bhojinaḥ

original: karoti taddhi sāyujyaṃ tatsurāṇāṃ ca nīcagam /
analyzed: karoti tat hi sāyujyam tat surāṇām ca nīca gam

original: sāmīpyādi trayaṃ karmadevānāṃ yujyate kvacit // PS_1,15.57 //
analyzed: sāmīpya ādi trayam karma devānām yujyate kvacid
tad bhinna devadāsānām sārūpya ādi dvayam matam
eka loka nivāsa ākhyam sālokyam itarasya tu
śuddha sātvika deheṣu catur bhuja samanvitāḥ
darāri pīta ambariṇaḥ yadi sārūpyam īritam
jayaḥ ca vijayaḥ ca eva balaḥ ca prabalaḥ tathā

original: caṇḍaḥ pracaṇḍaśca tathā nandaścāpi sunandakaḥ // PS_1,15.60 //
analyzed: caṇḍaḥ pracaṇḍaḥ ca tathā nandaḥ ca api sunandakaḥ
kumudaḥ kumudākṣaḥ ca tathā bhadra subhadrakau
sudhāma dāma nāmānau viṣvaksena vaśe sthitau
rūpaiḥ caturbhiḥ sarve api catur dikṣu api saptasu
antar prākāra ga dvāram ārabhya dvārapālakāḥ

original: parighā sa tu vaikuṇṭhaścaturasraḥ prakīrtitaḥ // PS_1,15.63 //
analyzed: parighā sa tu vaikuṇṭhaḥ catur asraḥ prakīrtitaḥ
koṭi ucchrita ananta mūrdhnaḥ mukhe mūrdhni sucityate
svaratasya ananta āsana ākhyaḥ kaṭiḥ pīta ambara ātmakaḥ
ghanodakam kaṭi taṭī meruḥ tad nābhi madhya ge
yojanānām pañcaviṃśat koṭi gam meru parvatāt
ajāṇḍa kharparam dikṣu vidikṣu ūrdhvam adhas smṛtam
mahī ādibhiḥ āvaraṇyaiḥ daśabhiḥ tu daśa ādikaiḥ
dattam ca āvaraṇāni eti anyūrdhva śiṣṭāni sarvaśas
adhas pādāni tat viṣṇoḥ sthalāni āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ
śilā vat pratimāḥ viṣṇoḥ aja ādeḥ abhimānataḥ
aṇḍaṃlokāḥ ca devānām kramāt hehāḥ tu māninaḥ
evam vidhā jāṇḍa koṭi ananta ātmaka rūpakaiḥ
sa avakāśam sañcaradbhiḥ vilāsadromakūpataḥ
hareḥ evam jagat tasya vaśe jñātvā viśeṣataḥ

original: virāḍrūpasya ca hareḥ satyalokaḥ śirasyalam // PS_1,15.71 //
analyzed: virāj rūpasya ca hareḥ satya lokaḥ śirasi alam
lokālokaḥ tasya hareḥ kaṭi sūtre vicintyate
kaṭi pradhāna asthi gaṇe cintayet mānasa uttaram
mūlādhāre jāmbava ākhyam kesareṣu ilāvṛtam
jaṭhara ādyāḥ tu tad rekhā meruḥ tad nābhi madhya gaḥ
bhavanāni ca sarvaśas
bīja kośeṣu sañcintya mucyate puruṣa ṛṣabhaḥ

original: bhuvarlokaṃ tasya nābhau svarlokaṃ hṛdi cintayet // PS_1,15.75 //
analyzed: bhuvar lokam tasya nābhau svar lokam hṛdi cintayet
mahar lokam uraḥ sthāne janalokam gale hareḥ

original: tapolokaṃ mukhe dhyātvā satyalokaṃ tu mastake // PS_1,15.76 //
analyzed: tapolokam mukhe dhyātvā satyalokam tu mastake
ṣaṣ aṣṭa dvādaśa advi aṣṭa dvi sahasra dalāni api

original: nābhyādikāni padmāni bhuvarādīni vai hareḥ // PS_1,15.77 //
analyzed: nābhi ādikāni padmāni bhuvara ādīni vai hareḥ

original: pātālaṃ tasya pāde tu prapadeṣu rasātalam /
analyzed: pātālam tasya pāde tu prapadeṣu rasātalam
mahātalam tu jaghane jaṅghayoḥ ca talātalam
sutalam jānu deśe tu tu
stu vitala atale
virāj rūpasya ca aṅgeṣu lokāḥ cintyā su cetanaiḥ
padmanābhasya nābhi uttham prākṛtam padmam ūrjitam

original: ādyaḥ brahmāṃśato jāto viṣṇunaiva caturmukhaḥ // PS_1,15.81 //
analyzed: ādyaḥ brahma aṃśataḥ jātaḥ viṣṇunā eva caturmukhaḥ
sṛṣṭaḥ svayam draṣṭum icchan catur dikṣu vidhiḥ harim

original: mukhāni lebhe catvāri nāpaśyaddhikṣu vai svayam // PS_1,15.82 //
analyzed: mukhāni lebhe catvāri na apaśyat hikṣu vai svayam
tatas tad nāla madhyam tad chidrāt antargatam harim

original: iti śrī prakāśasaṃhitāyāṃ prathamaparicchede pañcadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ sampūrṇaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī prakāśasaṃhitāyām prathama paricchede pañcadaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ sampūrṇaḥ
śrī kṛṣṇa arpaṇam astu
atha prathamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī haṃsaḥ uvāca

original: kañjasthitaḥ svayaṃ brahmā nāpaśyat sarvagaṃ harim /
analyzed: kañja sthitaḥ svayam brahmā na apaśyat sarvagam harim
yatnavān api tat pūrva manasi ittham acintayat
bhāva rūpa ajñāna māninī api durgā jagadguroḥ
nitya anugraha pātra tvāt
tvāt ca ramā mama
sva upāsana ārata tvāt ca na ajñānam bhāva rūpakam

svakīyasya indiḥ īṣat me hi abhiprāyam śiva ādayaḥ
a viditvā anyathā brūyuḥ durgā jñāna pradā eva sā
na samartha ajñāna dāne vidheḥ iti asura āśrayāḥ
iti ajñā vākyaiḥ mātuḥ me yaśasaḥ kāraṇam vacaḥ
mehya yaśaḥ kāraṇam na ca

original: tatrāhaṃ saṃmato mātuḥ kīrtyarthaṃ prārthayāmi tām /
analyzed: tatra aham saṃmataḥ mātuḥ kīrti artham prārthayāmi tām

original: durgāmiti tathā cakre tenādātsasya saṃśayam // PS_2,1.6 //
analyzed: durgām iti tathā cakre tena adāt sasya saṃśayam

original: bhayaśokau ca tenāsāvajñobhīto babhūva hā // PS_2,1.7 //
analyzed: bhaya śokau ca tena asau ajñaḥ bhītaḥ babhūva hā

original: śoko dvivāraṃ ramayā prārthito jagadīśvaraḥ // PS_2,1.8 //

daśāyām niyamaḥ kṛtaḥ

tatas tu ittham tri vāram padmajanmanaḥ
svatas padmam idam jātam kiṃpuṃsa anyena kenacid

original: iti sañcintya puṃsyaiva jātaṃ naiva jaḍasya tat // PS_2,1.11 //
analyzed: iti sañcintya puṃsya eva jātam na eva jaḍasya tat

original: ahaṃ padmena vā jātaḥ matsṛṣṭiḥ puruṣeṇa vā // PS_2,1.12 //

original: iti saṃścitya matsṛṣṭiḥ puruṣeṇai no vā /

original: iti niścitya sa pumān svatantro vāsvatantrakaḥ // PS_2,1.13 //
analyzed: iti niścitya sa pumān svatantraḥ vā asvatantrakaḥ

original: tasmāt svatantrājjātohaṃ taṃ pasyāṃ punarutthitaḥ (paśyeyaṃ) // PS_2,1.14 //

original: kañjastha āsa tajjñānaṃ viparītamajasya hi // PS_2,1.15 //

original: tato dhyānaṃ jagaddhātuḥ kṛtvā paśyat sasarvagam /

original: brahmā dadarśa vaikuṇṭhaṃ harerlokaṃ mahādbhutam // PS_2,1.21 //

original: dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭāva natveśaṃ kṛtārthobhūt sakañjajaḥ // PS_2,1.22 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭāva natvā īśam sa kañjajaḥ

original: yathā tathā rātrikālaṃ vyabhajadbhagavān vibhuḥ // PS_2,1.24 //

rātri dvitīya bhāge tu padmanābhasya nābhitaḥ

original: tacchāntiṃ tasya tadbhaktyudrekaṃ tasya tapasthitim // PS_2,1.27 //

original: sa dṛṣṭvā taṃ vidadhyau muktāmukteśvaraṃ harim // PS_2,1.29 //
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā tam vidadhyau mukta amukta īśvaram harim

original: yathottaratra sthūlopi na dṛṣṭastena tacchrutam // PS_2,2.5 //

kaṭi ūru dvitaye jānu jaṅgha gulpaḥ bhaya aṅghriṣu
dehe deveśa sevakāḥ
mitra agni astra pa vārīśa maya manda yamāḥ kramāt
dehe api evam virāj deha dhāriṇam
piṅgala ile rakta nīla varṇe savya apasavya ge
garbha chidra anvite ṣaṭtriṃśat sahasra prabhedinī
pṛthak pṛthak savya nāḍyaḥ mahat tatva ātmikāḥ matāḥ
tridhā vibhaktāḥ pāda antam dvi ṣaṣ sāhasra saṃmitāḥ
dakṣiṇe dakṣa pāda antam nāḍyaḥ tāvat mitāḥ kramāt
piṅgalāḥ ūrdhva deheṣu vyāptāḥ tāvat mitāḥ śubhāḥ
adhas madhya ūrdhva gāḥ tāḥ tu saptā asya patham āśritāḥ

original: saptasantyeva vivarāḥ ghrāṇāsya śruti netragāḥ // PS_2,3.45 //
analyzed: sapta santi eva vivarāḥ ghrāṇa āsya śruti netra gāḥ
sapta āsya patha nāmānaḥ golakāḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ
sapta ūrdhva nāḍyaḥ hṛd kañja adhasthalāt vāma pārśva gāḥ
punarhṛtkam ca ūrdhva deśāt savyam āvṛtya piṅgalāḥ
sapta asya pathagāḥ tatrasūryo
vahni ādyāḥ vatsara īśvarāḥ
uttarāyaṇa māsa īśāḥ dina īśāḥ śukla pakṣapāḥ
para śukla trayam hi asmin hi ete eva abhimāninaḥ
sūrya ādi sarva devānām nāma vācyāḥ tu piṅgalāḥ
tasyām brahma abhimānī gī ṛjavaḥ tu aparokṣiṇaḥ

original: prāṇāpānā vilāyāṃ ca piṅgalāyāṃ ca vartataḥ /
analyzed: prāṇa apānā vilāyām ca piṅgalāyām ca vartataḥ
rūpaiḥ ṣaḍviṃśat sahasraiḥ tāsu tau bhāratī yutau
tathā aniruddha pradyumnau dakṣiṇe pum svarūpataḥ

original: strīsvarūpeṇa vāme tu tāvadrūpaiśca tāsvalam // PS_2,3.51 //
analyzed: strī sva rūpeṇa vāme tu tāvat rūpaiḥ ca tāsu alam
tādṛś pāṇa sva rūpa sthau brahma rudra ādi upāsitau
dakṣiṇāyana māsa īśāḥ rātri īśāḥ ca eva devatāḥ
kṛṣṇa pakṣa īśvarā rudra vipa śeṣāḥ sa bhāryakāḥ
ahaṅkāra ātmaka ilāyām devāḥ sarva abhimāninaḥ
ānanda vijñāna mayau piṅgala ilā adhipau kramāt
vyāna ātmā sarva sandhi sthaḥ udānaḥ brahmanāḍi gaḥ
suṣumnā brahmanāḍī iti samānaḥ sarva deha gaḥ
adhas madhya ūrdhva gāḥ sapta sapta ilā nāḍikā kramāt
sapta aśvamārga patha gāḥ ūrdhva ilāḥ piṅgalāḥ yathā
hṛd kañja adhobhāgataḥ tāḥ savyam prāpya tad ūrdhvatas
apasavyam punar prāpya sapta aśva patha gāḥ kramāt
bhūmyādhūmā
di devatā śabdaiḥ ilā vācyā samastaśas
ṛgveda sūkta bhāgeṣu
sūtra dvi aṣṭādaśa ekonaiḥ pūrṇaruc prabhaviṣyati
pādaḥ tu nava varṇa ātmā tādṛś pāda catuṣṭayaiḥ
ruj tad saṃyukta akṣa retaḥ avarṇā dvāsaptati īritāḥ
dvāsaptati sahasrāṇi varṇāḥ sarva ruj āśritāḥ
dvāsaptati sahasreṣu piṅgalā ilā āhvayāsu ca
nāḍīṣu tad tad vargeṣu vācya rūpāṇi a cintayet
suṣumnāyāḥ catur dikṣu hṛd kañja adhas samāśritam
manaḥ buddhiḥ ahaṅkāraḥ cittam ca iti caturvidham
tatra indra kāmau bhāryau tau tad viśeṣa abhimāninau
śrotre diś devatāḥ candraḥ tvac ca aham prāṇa nāmakaḥ
netrayoḥ bhāskaraḥ jihvā mānī varuṇaḥ
daśrau ghrāṇa āśritau ete tad viśeṣa abhimāninaḥ
vaktrā iva āci
vahniḥ karet akṣaḥ jayantaḥ pādayoḥ ūrdhvayoḥ
mitraḥ svāyaṃbhuvau pāyu upasthayoḥ abhimāninau
ghrā prāṇaḥ marut śabdam ānītu apānaḥ sparśa gaḥ tatas
rasa mānī hi udānaḥ gandha saṃsthitaḥ
samāne ete mātrāsu viśeṣāt abhimāninaḥ

original: bhūdevī māninī pṛthvīḥ abātmā varuṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: bhūdevī māninī pṛthvīḥ abātmā varuṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
agniḥ tejaḥ mayaḥ vāyau pravahaḥ prabhuḥ īśvaraḥ
ākāśa mānī vighneśaḥ bhūteṣu ete viśeṣapāḥ
keśa ali sthi
tvak māṃsa nakha rūpā bhūḥ deha gāḥ matāḥ
vāri rakta ātmakam deha jaṭhara agniḥ tu taijasam

original: vāyuḥ śvāsātmakaḥ kāye hyavakāśo nabhastanau // PS_2,3.69 //
analyzed: vāyuḥ śvāsa ātmakaḥ kāye hi avakāśaḥ nabhas tanau
pratyakṣa siddha sarveṣām sattvam bābo
dhyam na hi kvacid
su durgandhau ghrāṇa vedyau dehe jihvā indriya priyaḥ
śubha aśubha rasaḥ rūpam cakṣuḥ vedyam kalevare
śīta uṣṇa ādiḥ tvacā āvedyaḥ sparśaḥ śabda ibdaḥ
śrutipriyeyaḥ
mātrā dhṛṣīka viṣayāḥ
vacana ādāna gamana utsarga bhoga ādi sādhanam
karmendriya pañca ca artha kriyā kāra iti riṇa
bābadhyate
satyam śṛṇoti spṛśati paśyati atti ca jighrati
śretra tvac netra rasanā ghrāṇaḥ ta tvāni tāni atas
artha kriyā karāṇi eva vibodhyāni iha veda gam
manaḥ ca śruti hetu tvāt saptaṃtyam
ca śarīra gāḥ
ahaṅkāra āpādaka tvāt piṅgalā mamatā āspadā
nāḍyaḥ daurbalya samaye bhānti savya apasavyayoḥ
puṃsām strīṇām āyā ādi vyañjakāḥ prabhavanti hi
a taḥ satya a caḥ ca
bahuṣu jñāna ajñāna pravartakāḥ
guṇāḥ sattva ādi deha sthāḥ satyāḥ tad abhimāninaḥ
devāḥ satyāḥ kevalasya jaḍasya asthiti ayogataḥ
dehānām ca sa dehānām deha bandha mati kṛtām
duḥkha āsvada tvāt deha āpti kāraṇam satyam eva hi
karmāṇi dvividham vedeṣu ukta anukrama sat ca sat
sukha duḥkha pradam tena

original: deśe kāle kṛtaṅkarma phaladattvena tau vṛtau // PS_2,3.80 //
analyzed: deśe kāle kṛtaṅkarma phaladat tvena tau vṛtau
tad karma phala bhoktāraḥ jīvāḥ satyāḥ saliṅgakāḥ

original: bhagnaliṅgā vimuktāśca śrutyuktāśca kṛtāḥ smṛtāḥ // PS_2,3.81 //
analyzed: bhagna liṅgāḥ vimuktāḥ ca śruti uktāḥ ca kṛtāḥ smṛtāḥ
iha anyatra alpa bahula jñāna ajñāna ādi yogibhiḥ
sat asat tāratamyam ca
mā ete svatantrakāḥ
cit cetya rūpāḥ eteṣām deha yoga vivarjitāḥ

original: niyantā puruṣaśreṣṭhaḥ na ca etat prayujyate // PS_2,3.83 //
analyzed: niyantā puruṣa śreṣṭhaḥ na ca etat prayujyate
tasmāt lakṣmīpatiḥ vyāptaḥ svatantraḥ śruti coditaḥ

original: nirdeṣo nityasuguṇaḥ sadā nārāyaṇo hariḥ // PS_2,3.84 //
analyzed: nitya suguṇaḥ sadā nārāyaṇaḥ hariḥ
evam ādhyātmikam satyam ptam
adhibhūtam bahis sthitam
sarva aṅkura utpādaka tvāt bhūḥ sattva atyā
khila kāraṇāt
vahniḥ ca śoṣakaḥ vāyuḥ avakāśa pradāniyat
tad kāraṇāni mātrāḥ ca tad gatāni indriyāṇi ca
satya āptāni evam samastāni saṃsṛṣṭāni aṇḍa gāni ca
etad mūlāni asaṃsṛṣṭāni api satyāni sarvaśas
saṅgṛhya etat vinirmāyāḥ yāti satyaḥ sahatyajaḥ
kecid niraṅgāḥ nirdehāḥ jñāna ādi guṇa varjitāḥ
niraṃśaḥ khaṇḍa rūpaḥ ca sarva adṛśyaḥ nirūpitāḥ
phala daḥ tu anupāsyaḥ vicāritaḥ

original: brahmaikantu jaḍaṃ sarve brahmaṇyāropitaṃ mṛṣā // PS_2,3.90 //
analyzed: brahma ekam tu jaḍam sarve brahmaṇi āropitam mṛṣā
śuktau rajata vat rajjau sarpa vat pratibhāti ca

original: ajñānaṃ kalpitaṃ taddhi śuktijñānāddhi bādhyate // PS_2,3.91 //
analyzed: ajñānam kalpitam tat hi śukti jñānāt hi bādhyate

original: vicārite sati hi sā śuktirnarajataṃ bhavet /
analyzed: vicārite sati hi sā śuktiḥ na rajatam bhavet

original: ato bodhyaṃ mṛṣābhūtaṃ mithyā tadrajataṃ yathā // PS_2,3.92 //
analyzed: atas bodhyam mṛṣābhūtam mithyā tat rajatam yathā
vastu svarūpam jñānena kalpita tvāt ca tat tathā
ajñāna kalpitam brahmaṇi etat viśvam prakalpitam
brahmaṇi āropa kṛt jīvaḥ brahma anyaḥ nā eva vartate
niraṃśam api tat brahma tva jñāna āvṛtam añjasā
ananta rūpakam bhuṅkte nānā yoni samudbhavam
tasya jñānam upādhi uttham satya upādhiḥ na vidyate
mithyā sa ajñāna jata tvāt na ajñānam satya tvam ucyate
tadā ajñānena jīva stham jīvasya abhāvataḥ svatas
nirviśeṣa brahmaṇi tu jñāna ajñānena vartataḥ
atas na brahma niṣṭam tad tad jñāna tad upādhi jam
evam mithyā bhūta kāla karma deśa āgama ādibhiḥ

original: bhramadbrahma ca kalpānte brahmamūla svarūpakam // PS_2,3.98 //
analyzed: bhramat brahma ca kalpa ante brahma mūla sva rūpakam
jñātvā tatra aikyam āpannaḥ na punar jāyate bhuvi

original: muktasyāpi na cājñānaṃ nendriyāṇi na kvacit // PS_2,3.99 //
analyzed: muktasya api na ca ajñānam na indriyāṇi na kvacid
nirviśeṣe pare brahmaṇi aikyam etādṛśam khalu

original: tadajñānaṃ na sannāsatsadasanna ca tarhikam // PS_2,3.100 //
analyzed: tat ajñānam na sat na asat sat asat na ca tarhikam
anirvācyam tad nivṛttiḥ muktiḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: pūrvāpareṣu kāleṣu sṛṣṭinmetyapi te jaguḥ // PS_2,3.101 //
analyzed: pūrva apareṣu kāleṣu sṛṣṭinmā iti api te jaguḥ
etat hi durmatam santaḥ na aṅgīkurvanti tātvikāḥ
iti śrī prakāśasaṃhitāyām dvitīya paricchede tṛtīyaḥ adhyāyaḥ
śrī haṃsaḥ uvāca
sa aṅga jñāna ātmaka tanum ananta guṇa pūritam
sāṅga asat bhīṣayantu īśam vedyaiḥ śāstraiḥ nirūpitam
ananta nāma rūpa āḍhyam sva sva yogya phala pradam

original: vicāritamupāsyaṃ ca ramā brahmādibhiḥ sadā // PS_2,4.2 //
analyzed: vicāritam upāsyam ca ramā brahma ādibhiḥ sadā

original: sevitaṃ śrīpatiṃ vyāptaṃ cetanācetanasya tu // PS_2,4.3 //
analyzed: sevitam śrīpatim vyāptam cetana acetanasya tu
satyasya sṛṣṭi kartāram harim duḥkha ādi bhoginam

original: jānanti tasya cājñānaṃ kvacit kvāpi na yujyate // PS_2,4.4 //
analyzed: jānanti tasya ca ajñānam kvacid kvāpi na yujyate
mithyā bhūta ajñānam asti iti atra mānam na vidyate
ajñānāḥ yujyate

original: siddhau jñāne tu tajjopādhiḥ siddhai tadanvaye /
analyzed: siddhau jñāne tu tad ja upādhiḥ siddhai tad anvaye
sarvasya ajñāna yogaḥ tad abhāvāt tat eva na
adhikā adhi na vidyate
ajñāna abhāvataḥ tad nivṛtti rūpam na hi kvacid
ajñāna kalpitam śāstram na eva ajñāna nikṛntanam

original: iti heyaṃ tanmataṃ hi baddhasyeśo vimuktidaḥ // PS_2,4.8 //
analyzed: iti heyam tat matam hi baddhasya īśaḥ vimukti daḥ

original: viśvaṃ satyaṃ naiva mithyā na bādhyaṃ satyakāraṇam /
analyzed: viśvam satyam na eva mithyā na bādhyam satya kāraṇam
pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇyaiḥ tu siddham na āropitam jagat
na arthakriyā kāri śuktau pratītam rajatam jagat

original: arthakriyākāri tena taddṛṣṭānto na yujyate // PS_2,4.10 //
analyzed: artha kriyā kāri tena tat dṛṣṭāntaḥ na yujyate

original: na bhavet tanmate brahma dṛśyatvācca tathā bhavet // PS_2,4.11 //
analyzed: na bhavet tad mate brahma dṛśya tvāt ca tathā bhavet
mita ākāśa ādi veda uktam viṣṇunā iti na tat mṛṣā

original: na ca nyāyoktamithyātve mānaṃ tanmatāpi na // PS_2,4.12 //
analyzed: na ca nyāya ukta mithyātve mānam tad matā api na
śrutiḥ nityā apauruṣeyā durvākyaiḥ na ca dūṣyate
iti jñātvā vidhiḥ viṣṇoḥ māhātmyam jñāna abodhayat
satya aśeṣa jagat nāthaḥ satya sat sādhanena ca
satyaiḥ jīvaiḥ sadā upāsyaḥ satya satya vimukti daḥ
iti meru sthitaḥ brahmā niśā ante yajñam īśvaram

original: abhiṣicya sapatnīkaṃ sarge sampārthya yojayat // PS_2,4.15 //
analyzed: abhiṣicya sa patnīkam sarge sampārthya yojayat

bhāvīnaḥ ca padasthāḥ ca upadevāḥ sahasraśas

original: manuṃ paryacaran prītyā te niraṃśāstato bhavan /
analyzed: manum paryacaran prītyā te niraṃśāḥ tatas bhavan
vidhiḥ tatas mayasū
sutamanata
sa tu ṣaṇṇavatī prā
māyāḥ sva vijṛmbhaṇataḥ sṛjat

original: svairiṇyaścaiva kāminyaḥ puṃścalya iti tridhā // PS_2,4.19 //
analyzed: svairiṇyaḥ ca eva kāminyaḥ puṃścalyaḥ iti tridhā

original: adho lokeṣu viharaḥ etābhiḥ saha durmadāḥ /
analyzed: adhas lokeṣu viharaḥ etābhiḥ saha durmadāḥ

kaiścid rakṣau gu
gaṇaiḥ yuktāḥ bhava
vantyāḥ te bhavaḥ kila
tayā sadā ramati saḥ tad vīryā dhāṭaka ādibhiḥ

original: ḥ nadī tadantagā tatra śuṣmatyapyagnivāyubhiḥ // PS_2,4.23 //
analyzed: nadī tad anta gā tatra śuṣmatī api agni vāyubhiḥ
yat nadī vāri pānena adhas lokeṣu saṃsthitāḥ

original: madoddhatā narānāryaḥ krīḍanti suciraṃ sadā // PS_2,4.24 //
analyzed: mada uddhatāḥ nara anāryaḥ krīḍanti su ciram sadā
tad adhastāt ca su tale pratimanvantareṣu api
nāma rūpa vibhedena prahlādaḥ sa anugaḥ vasat
vaivasvata antare viṣṇoḥ vāmanāya pada trayam
yācamānāya putrāya kaśyapasya mahātmanaḥ
baliḥ virocana sutaḥ dadau loka trayam vibhuḥ
saḥ upi indrāya pada sthāya tasmāt ādāya dattavān
loka trayam hi devānām anujaḥ vaṭu rūpa dṛś
payovrata prabhāvenyā eva āvirbhūtaḥ sa kaśyapāt
indra pravāsataḥ khinna mātṛ tuṣṭyai jagatpatiḥ
balim virocana sutam mahā bhāgavata uttamam
sthāpayāmāsa tat loke svayam tad vārapālakaḥ
babhūva vāmanaḥ sarve sva rūpa amara sevitaḥ
tasya tri koṭi lomabhyaḥ vāyuḥ tāvat svarūpakaḥ
vāṇyā tāvat rūpavatyā vāmanasya arca kokā bhavat
vindhyāvalī patiḥ tatra baliḥ tiṣṭhati sa anugaḥ
tad adhas tad pri
viṣṇuḥ bhaktaḥ api akhila dānavaiḥ
arthitaḥ dānava kule jātaḥ takṣā bhavat purā
tat lokapaḥ sa daityānām tripurāṇi vyacīklapat
abheda abhedya rūpāṇi svarṇa raupya āyasāni ca
sa nirmame purāḥ tisraḥ svarṇa raupya āyasī mayaḥ
kāmayā teṣu teṣu ete saṃsthitāḥ tripuraukasaḥ
vihāra antare hi asmin sarvān jantūn apīḍayan
surāḥ tad pīḍayā rudra śaraṇam yayuḥ ūrjitāḥ

original: rudraḥ pṛthvīrathaṃ kṛtvā rathāṅgaṃ śaśibhaskarau // PS_2,4.36 //
analyzed: rudraḥ pṛthvī ratham kṛtvā rathāṅgam śaśi bhaskarau
devān kṛtvā hayān abja bhavam kṛtvā eva sārathim
śeṣam maurvyām
ca khageśvaram
kṛtvā viṣṇum bāṇa rūpam svayam eka kṣaṇe haraḥ

tripura asura putra ādyaiḥ sahā vasati tatra hi
vaivasvata intare dakṣa patnyāḥ kaśyapa bhāryakāḥ
trayodaśa a saṃśāḥ
tāsu putrān avāpa saḥ
vivasvān śakra varuṇa mitrāḥ pūṣā aryamā abhagaḥ
savitā tvaṣṭṛ parjanyaḥ dhātāyām vāmanaḥ vaṭuḥ
aditeḥ tanayā adityām hiraṇyākṣa hiraṇyakau

original: danau tu dānavā gāvo mahiṣyaḥ surabhīsutāḥ /
analyzed: danau tu dānavāḥ gāvaḥ mahiṣyaḥ surabhīsutāḥ
tān māyā pakṣiṇoḥ iṣṭā yātudhānāḥ ca nirṛtiḥ

original: poṣṭāyā caiva betālāḥ kārdraveyā mahāhayaḥ // PS_2,4.43 //
analyzed: ca eva betālāḥ kārdraveyāḥ mahāhayaḥ
etad manvantare ṣaṣṭhi sahasrāṇi bhujaṅgamāḥ
kardru jāḥ teṣu kecid tu tātvikāḥ śeṣa sevakāḥ
apare karma jājānaḥ stulyāḥ tad putra pautrakāḥ
sastrīkāḥ maṇibhūdhanyāḥ mahātala nivāsinaḥ
mahāviṣāḥ mahāghodhā
rāḥ kāma rūpa dharāḥ khalāḥ
sarasvatyām sa patnīkaḥ kaśyapaḥ tapaḥ ācarat
tasyāḥ vidūre patnīnām bhavanāni vyacīkḷpat
tad bhṛtyāḥ teṣu ca avasan
kadācid mahimavat pārśvam viyāhi vipāhi
pati mātarau
gatvā dṛṣṭvā uccaiśravasam nīla vāla mahī prasūḥ
prāha svacchanda vinatāka drute vacanam yadi

original: satyaṃ dāsī tavāhaṃsyāmanyathātvaṃ mameti ca // PS_2,4.49 //
analyzed: satyam dāsī tava ahaṃsyām anyathātvam mama iti ca
adyā sa rātriḥ ca prātar iti te gṛham īyatuḥ

original: tadbālanailyavarṇye tu sutānāha ca sādhavaḥ // PS_2,4.50 //
analyzed: tad bāla nailya varṇye tu sutān āha ca sādhavaḥ

original: krūrāhayāstathākṛtvā tā cakrurmātṛ kiṃ karīm // PS_2,4.51 //
analyzed: krūra ahayāḥ tathā kṛtvā tā cakruḥ mātṛ kim karīm
śapta ahayaḥ śeṣa vākyāt sva rucyāt sva stryākṣa
kṣamam ātmanaḥ

original: jñātvā dadurjaratkāroḥ sanāmnīṃ bhaginīṃ muneḥ // PS_2,4.52 //
analyzed: jñātvā daduḥ jaratkāroḥ sanāmnīm bhaginīm muneḥ
sa viraktaḥ api santaptaiḥ nirāśyaiḥ naraka āsthitaiḥ

original: pitṛbhiḥ prārthito gṛhṇaṃstadgarbhe tvāstikaṃ vyadhāt // PS_2,4.53 //
analyzed: pitṛbhiḥ prārthitaḥ gṛhṇan tad garbhe tu āstikam vyadhāt

original: nidrābhaṅgakarā gacchetyāhu tatyāja tāṃ muniḥ // PS_2,4.54 //
analyzed: nidrā bhaṅga karā gaccha iti āhu tatyāja tām muniḥ

original: sa āpadi smṛto yāmītyuktogānmātulaṃ prati // PS_2,4.55 //
analyzed: saḥ āpadi smṛtaḥ yāmi iti uktaḥ ugāt mātulam prati

original: śaptā hīnā tātvikāno tenātyanvipa saṃmatāḥ // PS_2,4.56 //
analyzed: śaptāḥ saṃmatāḥ

original: śaśāsa pṛthivīṃ tasya sutaḥ sa janamejayaḥ // PS_2,4.57 //
analyzed: śaśāsa pṛthivīm tasya sutaḥ sa janamejayaḥ

original: ityuktogāt puraṃ tasya mārge gomayabhakṣaṇam // PS_2,4.59 //
analyzed: iti uktā ugāt puram tasya mārge gomaya bhakṣaṇam

original: yācayetyāha tāṃ gehe henāyasya śaptumārabhat // PS_2,4.60 //

original: nṛpaṃ na śapa māṃ brahman śuddhaḥ paśyasi bhāminīm /

original: tata ācamya gatvā tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ prāpa saṅkuṇḍale // PS_2,4.61 //

hantuntuṃ

iti saḥ upi aśapat munim

analyzed: śiṣyaḥ bhūtvā granthivāhaḥ saḥ viśat ca rasātalam

vantasya go mūtram netrayoḥ vyadhāt

original: taṃ prāhatvaṃ vṛthājāto pitṛmṛtyuṃ na cāvadhīḥ /

aham mantra pravaktā asmi sambhārān chaṭayāḥ calam

original: tato ṛṣiḥ sahendrotra takṣakaḥ patatāmiti // PS_2,4.70 //

dāsya īrthitam iti prokte dehi mātula jīvanam

ya takṣaka ādīn vadhoḥ vyadhāt

original: yajñaprāpya phalaṃ rājñe datvā sarpān athāśapat // PS_2,4.74 //

original: anyathā vaḥ śiraḥ śīrṇaṃ bhavediti yayau muniḥ // PS_2,4.75 //

uru pṛṣṭhe purā jātān ūru pāda vivarjitān

original: kālena garuḍo jāto viṣṇorvāho babhūva ha // PS_2,4.78 //

original: dāsyānmokṣe mātaraṃ ca ityepāstu na cādhikam // PS_2,4.80 //

original: prākṣipatṛṇavataṃ ca vidhūya ca sudhāṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: ca vidhūya ca sudhām punar

tasya kardrum atha avadat

original: mātā tvayā vañcitā me mayā tvaṃ tena vañcitaḥ // PS_2,4.83 //

iti śrī prakāśasaṃhitāyām dvitīya paricchede caturthaḥ dhyāyaḥ

rasātala idha sthāt dānavāḥ śata koṭiśas
daityāḥ ca yātudhānāḥ ca paulomāḥ kālakeyakāḥ
nivātā kavaca adhīrāḥ rākṣasāḥ ca surāṇakāḥ
piśācāḥ antyaja asṛkyāḥ mahākumati mudinaḥ jarāḥ
vasanti cakra bhayataḥ hareḥ sarva bhayāt api
ye kecid tātvikāḥ tatra saṃvasanti sura ṛṣabhāḥ

original: nitye vasanti narake hatā haryādi daiḥdvagddha // PS_2,5.5 //

original: vasanti nityanarake kālādyāsyanti vai tamaḥ // PS_2,5.7 //

original: sadārtān bhīṣayanti daityān yamasya vaśavartinī // PS_2,5.8 //

nām saḥ āśrayaḥmaḥ

original: sadaikakuṇḍalo bhāsvan musalaḥ sahalaḥ prabhuḥ // PS_2,5.13 //

minyām puras prabhuḥ

ūrdhva keśāḥ virūpa akṣāḥ nīla varṇa bhayaṅkarāḥ

original: sa tānabhyagatān dṛṣṭvā yamadaṇḍaṃ paretarāṭ // PS_2,5.23 //

droga ādyāḥ tad antike

original: nityau dvau narakau tatra gatāyānti tamaḥ kramāt // PS_2,5.40 //

analyzed: gate rājani sā devī vastra ābharaṇa sañcayam

original: svayaṃ tadāhṛde snātvā babhau sarvamanoharaḥ // PS_2,6.11 //

original: tuṣṭvā sa satayā sārdhaṃ remebdaśatakaṃ ṛṣiḥ // PS_2,6.12 //

iti enaṃratyeta

autpatti brahmacārī tu tasmin bindusaraḥ taṭe
sva mātre kapilaḥ tatvam uktvā amuktim dadau muniḥ
marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ jajñe iha vaivasvata antare
punar jātasya dakṣasya trayodaśa sutāsu saḥ
kaśyapāya pradattāsu dityā dityā āditya ādikāsu ca
pūrva uktāḥ tanayāḥ āsan pūrva manvantareṣu saḥ
kaśyapaḥ nāma bhedeṣu marīceḥ tanayaḥ bhavat
anyasyām api bhāryāyām dakṣa jāḥ ṣaṣṭhi kanyakāḥ
pratimanvanteḥ eṣvāsuḥ kaśyapāya trayodaśa
tāḥ jātāḥ sura asurāḥ
asmin kaśyapa nāmā āsīt bhāryā putrāt ayaḥ dhunā
prokta vyāpāra nāmānaḥ pūrvavat bhāvi kālake
sa tātvikaḥ ṛṣi prokta puṣkarāt ca śata avarāḥ
ajā asya dakṣa tanayāḥ pūrva manvantareṣu ca
saptaviṃśati saṃkhyākāḥ indoḥ bhāryāḥ babhūvire
aśvinī ādyāḥ tārakāḥ te kālacakra pravartakāḥ
sa rohiṇyām pakṣapātāt anyāsu viparīta dṛś
dakṣa śāpāt asantānāḥ sarva manvantareṣu api

original: bhūtāṅgirakṛśāśvebhyo dve dve datte ca bhānujāḥ // PS_2,6.30 //
analyzed: bhūta aṅgira kṛśāśvebhyaḥ dve dve datte ca bhānujāḥ
bhānunām nakṣatrāṇām manujaḥ

original: dattāścataśro dakṣāya daśadharmāya tāsu vai // PS_2,6.31 //
analyzed: dattāḥ catasraḥ dakṣāya daśa dharmāya tāsu vai
babhūvuḥ tanayāḥ prāyas jñāna bhakti ādi māninaḥ
atri netra udbhavaḥ candraḥ sarva manvantareṣu api
vṛkṣāṇām auṣadhīnām ca nakṣatrāṇām ca vallabhaḥ
nirāśa karaḥ
edhamāna kalā nāthaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ loka bāndhavaḥ
anasūyā sutau atre datta dūrvā sasau ubhau
yoga pravartakaḥ yogāt brahmaṇyau brahmacāriṇau
saṃcaṇḍa kopaḥ pṛthayā pūjitaḥ manum ādiśat
tena eva karṇa dharma ādīn trīn asūta su pūjitā
sombarīṣāt alpa śiṣṭa dvādaśyām bhojana īrthitaḥ

original: omityuktvā tu kālindyāṃ magno nāgācciraṃ nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: om iti uktvā tu kālindyām magnaḥ nāgāt ciram nṛpaḥ
vipra ājñayā ambhasā cakre pāraṇam sādhana icchayā
tat jñātvā atha adiśat kṛtyam rājñe saḥ upi asmarat harim

original: pūrvamāptaṃ hareścakraṃ kṛtyāṃ hatvā vibhīṣayat // PS_2,6.39 //
analyzed: pūrvam āptam hareḥ cakram kṛtyām hatvā vibhīṣayat

original: sa ṛṣiḥ sarvalokeśaiḥ viṣṇunā ca nirākṛtaḥ /
analyzed: sa ṛṣiḥ sarvalokeśaiḥ viṣṇunā ca nirākṛtaḥ

original: ambarīśaṃ prāpya tena mocito bhojitobhyagāt // PS_2,6.40 //
analyzed: ambarīśam prāpya tena mocitaḥ bhojitaḥ abhyagāt
sa dūrvā sāḥ rāma kṛṣṇau prāpya kṛṣṇām ayācata

original: sadyonnaṃ dīyatāmahyam iti taistuṣṭa āvrajat // PS_2,6.41 //
analyzed: sadyas unnam dīyatām ahyam iti taiḥ tuṣṭaḥ āvrajat
śraddhayām aṅgirāḥ prāpa gurum agnim ucathyakam
saṃvartaka agni tanayāḥ prāc uktāḥ ca guroḥ abhūt
bhūmau ucathya bhāryāyām antarvarti riraṃsataḥ
garbha stha dīrghatapasaḥ pāda ācchanna ibhage bhuvi
patitāt retasaḥ jātaḥ muniḥ parama dhārmikaḥ

original: bharadvājo marudbhiḥ sa pālitobhūt purā kila // PS_2,6.44 //
analyzed: bharadvājaḥ marudbhiḥ sa pālitaḥ bhūt purā kila
vaivasvata intare candra vaṃśe bharata nāmake

original: niḥsantāne sati tadā marutastasya taṃ daduḥ // PS_2,6.45 //
analyzed: niḥsantāne sati tadā marutaḥ tasya tam daduḥ
saḥ utthāpya ca
punar tapaḥ carat dhīrgha kālam bharata vaṃśa je
śantanau śyāśita jagat gaṅgāyām carataḥ tapaḥ
bharadvāja skanna mūrvaśī darśanāt anu
retaḥ dadhāra droṇīṇe
saḥ tasmāt roṇaḥ bhavat guruḥ

original: tasmāt kṛpī śaṅkarāṃśamaśvatthāmā samāpa hi // PS_2,6.48 //
analyzed: tasmāt kṛpī śaṅkara aṃśam aśvatthāmā samāpa hi

original: bṛhaspatestu tārābhyāṃ kaca āsīt sutaḥ purā /
analyzed: bṛhaspateḥ tu tārābhyām kacaḥ āsīt sutaḥ purā
vaivasvata intare tapaḥ nidhiḥ

original: niṣiddhā tena sā vidyā nasyātta iti śāsayat /
analyzed: niṣiddhā tena sā vidyā nasyāt te iti śāsayat
kāma ātura āpatiḥ mā astu tāni vā iti attha
śapan muniḥ
mṛtasañjīvinīm āpa tena yātāḥ tatas kvacid
devayānīm guru sutām vane tad yogam aicchata
saha vidhi adya
stu śiṣya itas bhartāteḥ tu dvijetaraḥ
iti āha ato kavi prokta śiṣyeṣu api adhikam bhavet
deva yādhānī hṛde putryā rājñā veda ṣaya gharṣaṇaḥ
nikṣiptā śukra śiṣyasya tayā ambu krīḍana itarā
sva vastra dhāraṇāt ātma kṣiptayā duḥkhitā abhavat
hrade sat devayānī rāja kanyā hṛta ambarā
gatāyām rāja nandinyām puratas samupāgataḥ
yayātiḥ candra vaṃśa utthaḥ mṛgayā artham tadā ācarat

original: tāṃ vivastrāṃ samudhṛtya svottarīyaṃ dadau nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: tām vivastrām samudhṛtya sva uttarīyam dadau nṛpaḥ

original: taṃ dhṛtvā sā gṛhaṃ prāparājāgāt svapuraṃ tadā // PS_2,6.56 //
analyzed: tam dhṛtvā sā gṛham prāpa rājā āgāt sva puram tadā

original: tadarthaṃ kupitaṃ śukraṃ rājānatvā prasādya ca /
analyzed: tad artham kupitam śukram rājā anatvā prasādya ca
guroḥ sutāyai sva sutām dāsī tve kalpayan nṛpaḥ

original: śukro yayāti nṛpateḥ kanyāṃ svāṃ pradadau mudā /
analyzed: śukraḥ yayāti nṛpateḥ kanyām svām pradadau mudā

original: dāsyā śarmiṣṭayā yuktāṃ dāsī rājñe bhavet satī // PS_2,6.58 //
analyzed: dāsyā śarmiṣṭayā yuktām dāsī rājñe bhavet satī
yaduḥsutaḥ devayānyām tad vaṃśaḥ kṛtavīrya jaḥ

original: arjuno yo daśagrīvaṃ nigṛhya punarāpa tat // PS_2,6.59 //
analyzed: arjunaḥ yaḥ daśagrīvam nigṛhya punar āpa tat
hṛtaḥ datta avitobāhu sahasra yuj api sphuṭam
tad vaṃśa ja apsara sutāt vasudevāt abhūt hariḥ
iti śrī prakāśasaṃhitāyām dvitīya paricchede ṣaṣṭhaḥ dhyāyaḥ
